string.value: The true measure of a Mapler can be found not when they're at their best, but at their worst.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Fun Fact: Skunks actually enjoy walks on the beach.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: When are we visiting the Affluent Tower in New Leaf City?

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Often times, I ask myself, what exactly is in the special sauce?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Next thing, you'll be asking me to play fetch!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Yes, I can talk. Get over it.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Sometimes, just sometimes, I smile at you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I only spray my enemies as a last resort.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Fun Fact: I'm pretty close to blind. I just hear extremely well.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Friends don't let Friends say "Mesos plox".

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Don't make me get anal on you.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I got nothing for you. Nothing!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: In order to speak, I need energy. For energy, I must eat. Is that clear?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I think I'm ready for something new.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I try to keep an open mind about these things.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'd believe your words, yet your actions lie.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Let me guess, Moony divorced you.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm quite easy to fall in love with.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: All it takes is a few weeks.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I feel something for you too.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm beginning to feel something...gas! Did you think it was something else?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: No, you just think you do.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: My heart beats a tiny bit faster whenever you're near.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I only wish I could better show the depths of my affection for you.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I'm just not ready for that kind of commitment yet.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You just love me for my tail.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Fascinating...you have fallen in love with a Skunk!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I feel a lot closer to you, now.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I wanted a hug from you, too.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Hugging is a talent, and you definitely got it!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: No food, no hug. Simple concept.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: It's a rare treat to find one who can express so much through a hug.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Space is what I need right now. Thanks for understanding.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm of the mind that we can express ourselves...at a distance.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: That's just not what I'm looking for right now.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Should've laid off those cherry pies. And grilled cheese. And Cakes. And...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: So...what are you trying to say?!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I believe the proper term is overweight.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Let me know when you see a fat skunk.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Gaining weight is fun, but keeping it on isn't.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: And I thought I actually lost weight...

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Nothing but roots and berries from here on out!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Right. Time to polish your glasses.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: The fault lies not just with me, but with you as well.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I can find it, just bear with me!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I think it's over here, wait. Never mind.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: One does not insult a skunk, for various reasons.

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: There's something around here..I know it!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I feel like I'm closing in on something...

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I feel bad, thanks a lot!

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: It's not easy being me, you could be nicer!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Stop. It's not what you think it is.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What, may I ask, did you expect?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: You should try smelling yours one day.

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: You know, your breath isn't exactly 'sweet-smelling' either.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: I ate snail burgers. Sue me.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I do not have bad breath!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Ready for a night on the town?

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Long night last night, so I need rest.

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Uh, that other Skunk did it.

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Would you rather have it out here or indoors.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: And what? Yours smells like roses and chocolate?

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Contrary to popular belief, yours stink too.

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: Why don't you nap with me?

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: I can go all day and all night!

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: I'm going to get some zzzz.

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Got to keep an eye out for monsters...

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: The ground is too hard here.

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: It's a bit cold here for me.

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: I guess this is as good a spot as any...

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: I'm the best. You know this.

string.name: c34_s1
string.value: When the going gets tough, the tough call a skunk!

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: Boldness isn't always a strong suit.

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: Stop trying to kiss my tail.

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: So, what are you really after?

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: Hold on, getting some dirt off my shoulder.

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Remember, you're dealing with the best.

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Flattery is often seen as a ploy of those with nothing else to offer.

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: There's a point where flattery begins to sound hollow.

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I don't know what you're after, but you won't get it from me.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: A meal fit for a ruffian. Take it away!

string.name: s2
string.value: Kyuu... I am not gonna say that.

string.name: s3
string.value: I am not the kind of Rabbit who speaks of evil words,~

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit, KROWL? Like this? Easy... KROWL

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Like this, KROWL? Give me something harder, KROWL...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It's a piece of cake, KROWL.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I wanna do something else, KROWL~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, KROWL~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, because someone peed the ground, KROWL~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, instead of that...give me some food~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, let's do something else for fun~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't wanna sit right now~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Master, you're talking funny, and I can't understand you~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Master, whaddaya think? I'm good right?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy...let me do something else.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe...I was daydreaming, so I couldn't hear you...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Please don't make a scary face like that...KROWL...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: What did I do wrong, KROWL?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You're just going off on me, KROWL...!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, KROWL...!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're just doing this because you're bored, KROWL...!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, are you really mad at me...? KROWL...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do anyway~! KROWL!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master that wasn't cool at all! KROWL~!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find an obedient pet like me? KROWL~!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Master! If you keep doing that, I may one day get out of here! KROWL!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Master...please give me that scary face...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, though!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Man...going off on me again for no reason...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master must be bored...so I'm treated like crap...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: It's not coming out well, KROWL...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet, KROWL...

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How can I poop if I don't feel like it, KROWL...

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for bathroom, KROWL...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, it hasn't been long since I last pooped...KROWL...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: It's not time to poop yet, master...KROWL...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel like pooping yet...KROWL...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Ahhh...that was good...but it's still embarassing...hehe

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Ahh...whoa, my breakfast just came out like that...hehe

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Phew~ Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Phew~ Haven't taken a crap in 3 days and look at this!! Yowza!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to poop out in the first place...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Master...can I do it later in the dark? I don't wanna do it in public...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Master...how am I gonna crap on purpose??

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I like you very very much! KROWL!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Ah...I was thinking of something else...KROWL

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Don't be lying to me like that~!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: That sounds good! I felt like resting anyway~

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Yawwwn ... I feel like going to bed.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: It'd be nice to take a nap under the sun.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ahhh, I told you I'm bored!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't like being bored. Let's do something!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: How about leveling up? Need my help?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Ooohhh... where's a nice comfy cushion when I need one?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Sounds like music to my ear. I needed some rest!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No, play with me! Play with me!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Tell that to a lazy fat pig, not to a tiger like me!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I don't like hearing that, KROWL...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Take back what you just said, KROWL!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What? I can't believe you said that...KROWL!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Do you really mean that? KROWL?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Take back what you said! KROWL!!!!!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: I know you say this every now and then, but it still hurts...

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: You aren't gonna leave me out hanging like this, right?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Success_04 Do you really not like me??

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: The next time you say that, I may really flip out on you!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: The harder you go hunting, the better the items you'll find, KROWL...

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, KROWL...

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I need a nap right now... KROWL...

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I'm too depressed to talk right now, KROWL~

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you...KROWL...!

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to talk? I'm a tiger, KROWL!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today! KROWL!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Master, you'll get me some goood food today, right? KROWL~

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Let's go to the beach today! I wanna do something fun!!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say...KROWL...

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I'm not...

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: How's Ludibrium? I heard that place is nice...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I'm hungry, why doncha just feed me?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: You must be really really really bored...

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I can't hear you~ I can't hear you~

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I'm tired, and I don't feel like talking today.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: My gosh, I feel ...really... sad right now.

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Even I have to admit, THIS is a sad look...

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: No way! I don't feel like doing it right now!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Why don't YOU do it, stupid!

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Sniff ... I've never felt so sad in my life.

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: Alright, I'll show you my whole repretoir today!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: I don't feel like acting right now...

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I know I'm good at making sad faces, but now's not the time.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: I'm not in a good mood!

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Sniff ... I've never felt so sad in my life.

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Alright, I'll show you my whole repretoir today!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: I don't feel like acting right now...

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I know I'm good at making sad faces, but now's not the time.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: I'm not in a good mood!

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: I'll just leave my paws out here and wait for ya~

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: How am I supposed to know how long I should wait here?

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Okay~ I'll sit here and wait!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: I'll just sit here and wait til you come back, master~

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: Arrgh...I don't feel like doing this.

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: 까칠이에게 예쁨 받고 싶어서 앉는 거 아냐!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: 까칠~ 까칠~ 시키는 대로 했으면 쓰다듬어 줘야지!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: 싫다! 이런 일은 다른 펫에게 시켜!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: 까칠이 말 잘들으면 뭐가 좋은데? 우선 말해봐~ 도치~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: 앉아? 난 3살 때부터 앉다라는 것을 잊어버렸어~!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: 내가 앉으면 까칠이도 앉아야지! 까칠이가 힘들가봐 앉는거 아냐!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: 도치~ 도치~ 이쁨 받고 싶어서 이런다고 생각하지마!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: 까칠~ 내가 앉을거라고 기대하진마! 하지만 난 앉겠어~!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: 단지 다리가 아파서 앉는 거뿐이야! 까칠이, 착각하지 마!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: 까칠! 까칠! 이제 내 성격을 알 때가 되지 않았어?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: 까칠이는 내가 말 잘 듣는 펫이라고 생각해? 그렇다면, 까칠한 착각이야~!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: 도치! 도치! 정말 지겨워~! 왜 나만 앉으라고 그러는 거야?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: 내가 까칠하다고......, 까칠이까지 이럴 필요는 없잖아!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: 흑....... 더 까칠해 질 거야! 까칠~

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: 도치! 내 털이 서 있는거 안 보여?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: 내가 이런 말을 듣고 살아야 한다니! 까칠!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: 까칠? 그런 말 하지 마! 이젠 말 잘 들을게! 까칠.......

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: 까칠이? 왜 그래? 오늘 기분이 안좋아?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: 미워! 까칠이가 내 마음에 바늘을 꽂았어! 도치!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: 설마 나에게 한 말은 아니지? 잘 생각해봐! 도치~

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: 도치! 도치! 나 분노 중이야! 건드리지마! 도치!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: 지금 그말 취소 못해? 나 까칠한거 몰라? 까칠!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: 분명히 까칠이가 잘못 말한 거야! 나에게 이럴 수는 없어!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: 까칠이! 그런 말 하지 마! 이젠 주인님이라고 부를게? 응?

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: 내가 까칠이 말에 상처받아서 우는 게 아니야! 그냥 눈물을 흘리고 싶을 뿐이야!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: 주인님! 미안해! 이젠 까칠하게 말 안 할게! 이제 마음 풀어!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: 왜 이러지? 왜 눈물이 나지? 그냥 까칠이가 말한 것뿐이잖아.......

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: 자꾸 그런 말 하면, 이 까칠한 털로 확~ 찔러버릴 거야!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: 까칠! 까칠! 내가 이런 말 듣고 살아야 하나....... 확 굶어 죽어야지.......

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: 까칠~ 그런 말은 까칠한 내 가슴에 통하지 않는다. 좀 더 심한 말 좀 해봐!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: 알았어! 알았다고! 도치~ 이제야 나를 파악한 건가? 도치~

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: 메~ 롱! 어때? 까칠이 슬슬 화가 나지? 도치~

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: 까칠이에게 이러는 거 기분 좋은데~ 까칠~

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: 어때~ 까칠이? 난 메롱도 예쁘지~ 도치~

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: 내가 까칠해서 까칠이를 놀리는 건 아냐! 내 마음 알잖아?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: 까칠하게 말하는 것을 좋아하는군! 그래, 메롱이다!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: 메롱~! 메롱~! 어때? 내 약 올리기 솜씨가~! 까칠~

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: 이런 장난은 멋진 고슴도치에게는 어울리지 않아!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: 도치~ 난 내가 놀리고 싶을 때만 까칠이를 놀리겠어!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: 실망이야! 난 다른 사람을 놀리지 않는다고! 도치!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: 고맙지~? 세상에서 가장 멋진 고슴도치의 혓바닥을 구경할 수 있어서~!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: 어떠냐~? 나의 까칠한 카리스마가! 까칠이 부럽지? 까칠~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: 난 지금 너무나 까칠이를 놀리고 싶다고~! 받아주란 말이다!!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: 까칠~ 메롱~! 어때? 생각보다 귀엽지 않아? 까칠~ 까칠~

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: 까칠이나 많이 해! 나는 내밀고 싶지 않거든! 까칠~!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: 자꾸 이런 거 시키면 확 안겨버린다. 무지 따가울걸~ 도치~

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: 도치~ 도치~ 자꾸 귀찮게 하지 말라고! 자꾸 귀찮게 그래!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: 메~~ 할 줄 알았지? 참 속이기 쉬운 까칠이라니깐~!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: 배가 아팠는데~ 말 한번 잘했네! 까칠~

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: 그렇게 똑바로 바라보고 있는데 쌀 수 있겠어?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: 별로 까칠이가 시켜서 싸는 건 아냐!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: 까칠~ 까칠이는 내가 배에 힘 주는걸 보고 싶어?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: 도치! 이런 누추한 곳에서 볼일 볼 수는 없잖아~!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: 밥부터 먹여주고 싸라고 그래! 배고파 죽겠다. 까칠~!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: 까칠~ 난 이미 싸고 있다! 까칠이는 치울 준비를 해라!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: 이렇게 맛있는 걸 먹여주니까, 나오는 것도 많은 거야~! 고맙군~ 까칠~

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: 배가 너무 아팠는데~! 정말 고마워! 까칠~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: 좋아~ 좋아~ 시원하다! 기분이 좋아서 주인님이라고 한번 불러주지~!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: 까칠! 지금 나에게 뭘 시킨 거야? 자꾸 까칠하게 만들래~?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: 배가 너무 고파서 나올 것도 없어! 내게 이래도 되는 거야? 까칠~

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: 도치~ 도치~ 난 내가 싸고 싶을 때만 싼다! 그것이 곧 내 길이야~! 도치!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 까칠! 지금 싸면 나오는 게 적어! 나중에 모아서 쌀래!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: 까칠~ 내가 까칠이를 좋아해서 말하는거 아냐!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: 도치~ 털이 많이 따가운데~ 항상 안아줘서 고맙다. 도치~

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: 까칠~ 항상 힘을 내라 까칠이! 까칠이는 강해질 수 있다! 나처럼~

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: 고슴도치의 말을 알아듣는 까칠이는 참 대단하다. 까칠~ 까칠~

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: 까칠~ 지금은 별로 말하고 싶지 않아! 기분이 안 좋거든!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: 왜 날 더 까칠하게 만드니~! 까칠이아~!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: 까칠~ 말은 하겠어! 하지만, 마음만은 주지 않겠어!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: 긴 시간 함께 했는데....... 이제 주인님이라고 불러줄까? 까칠~!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: 도치~ 평생 주인님하고 여행했으면 좋겠다~ 도치~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: 까칠이! 항상 예뻐해 주고 사랑해줘서 고맙다고~ 까칠!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: 난 필살기술을 가지고 있어! 몸을 둥글게 말고 털을 세운 롤링어택~!!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: 까칠~ 내 성격 알자나! 알면서 왜 시켜~!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: 도치~ 이제 그만~! 말하는 것도 그만~! 밥도 그만? 그런 안돼!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: 까칠이가 먼저 고슴도치 언어를 말해봐~! 까칠~

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: 까칠~ 까칠이의 마음 정말 고맙다. 까칠~

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: 난 까칠이를 좋아하는 건 아냐~♡ 정말이라고~♡

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: 이런 말 듣기 싫어! 정말 듣기 싫어~♡ 도치!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: 까칠~! 까칠이의 마음과 내 마음은 같구나~♡

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: 미안하지만 아직 우린 그런 사이가 아니잖아! 도치~!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: 까칠~ 내가 까칠해서 반응 안 보이는 건 아냐~! 까칠!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: 도치~ 도치! 내 마음도 항상 까칠이를 향할 거다~ 도치!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 까칠~ 내가 이렇게 까칠한 것은 말이지~ 다 까칠이가 좋아서다~♡

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: 안돼~ 흔들리면 안돼! 하지만, 왜 이렇게 까칠이가 좋지?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: 까칠이♡ 이제는 덜 까칠하게 대할게~! 까칠~

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: 사랑? 사랑 따위는 주니어 리퍼에게나 주라고 그래! 까칠!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: 도치~ 말은 좋아한다면서 눈은 다른 펫을 쫓고 있는 거 다 알아!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: 도치! 그럼 어디 나를 꼭 안아봐! 도치~!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: 알았어~ 알았어~ 마음만 받아둘께~ 까칠~ 까칠~

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: 나도 항상 까칠이를 멋진 주인님이라고 생각하고 있었다. 까칠~!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: 도치~ 지금까지 함께한 시간보다 더욱더 긴 시간을 함께 하자고~ 도치~

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: 이제 나도 내 마음을 표현할래~ 주인님~♡ 주인님~♡ 어때? 좋아?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: 이젠 아주 조금만~ 아주 조금만~ 까칠하게 행동할게~♡ 까칠~

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: 주인님이라고 말하려고 했는데~ 그냥 하지 않을래~ 까칠이!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: 까칠~ 까칠~ 지금 나 많이 까질 하다! 조심해라 까칠이~! 까칠~

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: 까칠이는 사람이 다 좋은데~ 너무 고백을 쉽게 한단 말이야~! 까칠~

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: 지금은 내가 힘이 없어! 나중에 말해줄게! 힘들어! 도치!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: 까칠! 까칠이가 시끄럽게 하니까 잠이 안 온다! 까칠!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: 잠이 안 오는데 어떻게 자? 도치~

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: 까칠이! 먼저 잠들어서 미안해....... 너무 말을 많이 해서.......

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: 도치~ 도치~ 오래 함께하니 내 잘 시간도 딱 맞추네~!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: 까칠~ 너무 까칠하게 행동했더니 힘이 빠진다. 아~ 쓰러진다~

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: 도치~ 이젠 잠자리까지 챙겨주네~ 제법인데~ 도치~

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: 까칠! 싫어! 잠들기 싫어! 강요하지 마~!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: 까칠~ 까칠이가 함께 잠들지 않으면 나도 안자~! 까칠~

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: 도치~ 내 털에 나도 찔려서 잠들기가 쉽지 않아! 도치~

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: 까칠이! 우선 밥부터 좀 먹여줘. 배고파서 잠이 안 와! 까칠~

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: 내가 졸려서 잠드는 거 아니다....... 진짜 졸려서 쓰러지는 거 아니다.......

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: 더 오랜 시간 함께 해야 하는데, 나 지금 너무 졸려! 미안해~ 주인님~!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: 도치~ 잠들기 전에 좋은 일 하나 해준다~ 주인님이라고 말할게~ 도치!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: 까칠~ 내가 잠들어도 주인님은 즐거운 메이플 여행이 되었으면 좋겠어~

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: 까칠~ 자꾸 명령하면 삐뚤어질거야! 아니~ 더 까칠해질거야!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: 도치! 내가 잠들면 좋겠어? 하긴, 아주 좋겠지!

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: 도치~ 지금은 전혀 피곤하지 않아! 그런데 자라고 하면 어떡해?

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: 까칠~ 까칠이가 먼저 잠들지그래? 사냥은 내가 할게!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: 도치~ 지금은 배가 너무 부르거든! 도치!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: 내가 지금 먹고 싶어서 먹는거 아냐♡ 정말이야♡

string.name: f3_f
string.value: 같은 것만 계속 먹이면 질린다 까칠!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: 이젠 주인님이 주는 음식보단, 그 정성이 더 좋다~ 도치~

string.name: f4_f
string.value: 까칠~ 지금은 다이어트 중이다! 살 뺄 거다! 알겠어? 까칠~

string.name: s2
string.value: 까칠! 그런 말은 하는 게 아냐!

string.name: s3
string.value: 나 까칠한 거, 까칠이도 알지? 그러니까 그런 말 하지마! 나 까칠해져!

string.name: s4
string.value: 까칠이가 예쁜 말만 할 때 난 주인님이라고 부를 거야♡

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: The ground is nice and warm here.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Trying to lure me into a trap? I don't think so.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: No pillow, so I can't sit.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You picked the perfect time to relax, Master!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Time to chill. Got any Mapleade?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: All I need now is a snack...

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Look a bit closer, you'll see why I'm not sitting.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Did you see the sign? "Porcupines forbidden to sit".

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: If only I had a chair...

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Somehow, I will blame you for this.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Quit looking at me like that.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Nonsense-you told me to do it!

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: No way is this my fault, no way!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Don't be mad with me, Master!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Blaming me again? I refuse to cover for you this time!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Wait, I have something for you...the world's smallest violin.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: When in a fit, just knit!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'll finish the socks I was making for you!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I just got the best cloth...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You threw away the last thing I made...

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: I got a new design to show you!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Time to make my Master a new pair of undies!

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Maybe I'll make you a pair of pants...

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: How about a sock...in the mouth?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: If the knit don't fit, it's time to quit!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: What do you think I am, an animal?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I hope someone steps in it!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: There's some on your shoe if you're looking for it.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You want me to stink up the joint? No!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Nothing compares to the feeling of a great dump. Nothing!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Let me show you how to make a "prickly bush".

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: This is as good a spot as any...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Fresh out. Try back later-like after dinner.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I could end battles with this gas...

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: When the going gets tough, the tough get going!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Do not ever mistake me for a hedgehog.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: The Mapler next to me is almost broke.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Doesn't that guy owe you money?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I charge 5000 mesos per word. Pay up.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: No time like the present! Let's go!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I could get used to this...

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You never know what's around the corner-be prepared!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I'll talk when golden pigs fly.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: My spikes are sharp-if you lean close, I can give you a shave.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love it when you level!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: When the going gets tough, I've seen you run away. Fast.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You don't need a breath mint, you just need to get socked in the face with a mint glove.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Say something? How about "I'm not talking right now?"

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Put your mesos where your mouth is!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: There is no spark in our relationship.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Amusing. Do you do tricks, too?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I can see it in your eyes...it's not true!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I've waited so long to hear you say that!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Your love keeps me going, Master!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I love you just as much!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I can feel a spark-no, wait. Something was in my foot...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: How funny! HAHAH-wait, you were serious?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I've got a lotta love to spread around!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Let's not and say we did.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I feel a bit uncomfortable now...

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I should throw one at you...

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I've got all the pins you need!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Why do you hurt me so?

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I got plenty of sleep last night.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: The ground is cold and hard, I'm not sleeping here!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: *YAWN* I think I'm ready for bed.

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: So now you notice I'm tired?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: No way, you're going to try something.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Yea, right, sleep. I don't need any.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: I knew I could do it!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Your orders aren't exactly clear you know...

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: You talk, I ignore you-it's a great combo!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Who's the brains behind this operation again?

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I guarantee this is your fault.

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I'm a stickler for perfection. HA!

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: Porcupines do not speak that language.

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Tell me how good I look...

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: What do I look like? A store?

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: You need more than a comb.

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: It's mine, and you can't have it.

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: Got a camera? I'm going to strike a pose.

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: I love being one of the beautiful people!

string.name: c32_f4
string.value: You can't have mine, get your own.

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: I need coconut milk before I do anything.

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: Have you fed your porcupine today?

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: I love to play with this ball!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Ninja do not reveal themselves in the day time.

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: What make you think I can do that?

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: Try again. This time with FEELING!

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: And I would do this because...

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Um, did you run over that?

string.name: f4_f
string.value: But I'm not hungry..I don't want to eat!! Waahhh!!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit like this? bark?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I get sleepy sitting down, bark!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Ahh... this is easier~ BARK BARK~

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I can't understand what the master is saying~ BARK BARK!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: It's too hard to understand~ BARK BARK!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I have no clue what you said! Bark bark!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No. I don't want to sit! BARK BARK!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, this is how you sit, right? Woof!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Master, I'm doing well, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I hope the master keeps asking me to sit...woof woof~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I have short legs, so it's easy to sit~ Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, I can't tell what you're saying~ Woof woof~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, do I HAVE to sit right now? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Let's do something else right now~ Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's too dirty to sit here! Woof woof!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Still telling me to sit? It's waaay too easy...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My hind legs are so short. I feel more comfortable sitting like this... hehe...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You want me to sit? Here... this is the right way, right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ahh... itchy... (acting like I didn't hear it...)

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting is waaaay too easy. Give me something harder.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: (scratching) Whoa? What did you just say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please don't give me that look... bark bark!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Krrr...Do you want to be punished by ME?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I was just sitting here... BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Krrrr...One of these days, I won't take it anymore... BARK BARK!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I'll be careful from here on out... wooof...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master! Things like that happen at times... why so mad? Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, boredom doesn't give you the right to abuse me! Woof woof!!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find a cute pet like this? Krrrr...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Woof woof!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master... I'll be more careful next time...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man, master's going off on me again and I didn't do a thing...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Master, things happen sometimes... why so mad??

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Rrrr... master's not happy over nothing...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'll be better... bark... much better...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm hurt inside... pretty bad... bark...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: How can you say such thing... bark...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Huh? I was too itchy to hear that... bark...!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy... I'll just pretend I never heard that... bark...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: What did the master just say? bark...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing... woof woof...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Master, I'm really really hurt... woof...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Master, are you for real...? Woof...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Master, you didn't really mean it... right? Woof...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, was that a joke? Woof~

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You didn't mean that, right? Woof woof...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ey... You mean that for real? Woof???

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Ey... you were just saying that because you're bored, right? Woof?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You say that everyday... that hurts you know...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I'll be good... just don't leave me alone...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Whatever you tell me, I'll still be following you and only you...sigh...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: How can you... you don't really mean it, right?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I can't hear you~~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy... stop saying that and bathe me instead!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that now... hehe...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Now, THAT was embarassing~ Bark bark~

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Oh man, this smells... bark bark...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't feel like pooping... bark

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Still a long way to go before coming out... heh

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: So may people around here, how am I gonna poop in public?? bark bark...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I just pooped a few min. ago... bark bark...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhhhh... whoa, I almost stepped on it... bark bark

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I almost got constipated... bark bark

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good... bark bark

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master... the poop isn't coming out... bark bark!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to go poop yet... bark bark

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel it yet... bark bark

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master...pooping should only be at the bathroom... bark bark

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...the poop looks really good today

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Ahh...master you can't step on it!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good... whoa, master...you stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't poop what I didn't eat...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Can you poop even if you don't feel like it?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I had nothing to eat all day, so no poop for me...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I must be constipating right now...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It's a secret, just between you and me...I have a hidden bone around this area... bark bark!!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What's the latest on radio? bark bark bark!?!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully it's something that involves me... hehe... bark!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard in one of the hidden streets at Henesys ther's a huuuuuge mushroom called Mushmom, am I right? bark!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How's a dog supposed to talk? bark!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking! Bark bark!!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Bark!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I feel like crap! Bark bark!!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Please change the menu every once in a while... I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, I feel like riding a boat to some other island... woof woof~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Right? Good!! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You better be careful not to get ripped off when doing business with someone else... woof woof...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say... woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking... I'm really depressed... woof woof...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm depressed... everything's annoying... don't feel like talking... woof...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's the menu for today? Can I get something nice?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head! hahha

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there... haha

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ey... how about feeding me right now?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying~~must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Man... do I have to talk again? Don't feel like it...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think? Good? GOOD? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Well, I'm smart. What can I say? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark!!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe... this is really easy~ Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like... this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Master, I did well... right? Right?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry. just feed me!!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here... woof~!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: My... my legs are short, that's why it's hard... woof!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I won't do it... woof woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa... with these shorties?? I'm incredible, yo!!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus??

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? bark bark...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too master~! Woof woof!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe... I feel good... woof woof!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I know you're lying, master... woof woof!

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else... and I didn't hear it... woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you too master very very much!!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Haha! Just tell me what to do, and I'll do it!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: This is waay too easy! Bark!

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: We huskies don't have hands! Bark!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I don't want to do it~ bark!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm so full I can't eat anymore... woof...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is really delicious! Woof woof...

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore... woof woof...

string.name: s3
string.value: Don't make me say bad words! Woof!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I get sleepy from sitting down, but...kyu..

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I should just sit here instead of roaming around~kyu~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: So I just need to sit here, right, kyu??

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Keeps making me do the same thing over and over again...anything else? kyu...?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Huh? I was thinking of something else for a sec...kyu...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, sitting is waay too easy~!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You keep asking me to do some easy thing...KYU~!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, you can't say it right, right? KYU?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: It's too dirty to sit around here...KYU...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I gotta do one for the master every once in a while...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Now that I sat, you need to feed me~

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: No more of that scary face...please...kyu...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Man, just letting out on me, kyu!!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I wasn't doing anything! WHAT, kyu!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, what exactly did I do wrong? KYU!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You won't find a more obidient pet around you! KYU!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I was just sitting there! KYU!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: So you're mad at me cuz you're bored, right?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: This is too easy for me, key!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: What do you think, master? I'm good, right? KYU?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: If my master wants me to...KYU!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Hahh...I've just gotte much taller! KYU!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Ey...I don't wanna do something boring like that...KYU

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master what do you think? I'm good, right?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You won't find a bunny that can stand like I do.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Now that I'm up like this, I can see things from afar.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Standing up is sooo easy now...

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Ey...keeps asking me to do the same thing...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I can't hear you...I can't hear you.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It's still a long way to go before coming out...heh

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: So may people around here, how am I gonna poop in public?? kyu...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I just pooped a few min. ago...kyu...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhhhh...whoa, I almost stepped on it...KYU

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to go poop yet...KYU

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master...pooping should only be at bathrooms...KYU

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...the poop looks really good today.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Ahh...master you can't step on it!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good...whoa, master...you stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't poop what I didn't eat...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Can you poop even if you don't feel like it?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I had nothing to eat all day, so no poop for me...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I must be constipating right now...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Is something wrong with you these days...? Don't worry, I'll be there for you, kyu...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: When you're buying items, you need to make sure you're not being deceived...kyu...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: If...you starve me, I may just crawl back into my home...so don't starve me too much...kyu...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I love the phrase "I love you" more than anything else in the world! kyu...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You ever see a rabbit talk? kyu...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I can't talk to you about things...kyu...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! kyu...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm in no mood to talk...kyu...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: How about going from place to place instead of staying at a same place? KYU

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Isn't it not fun playing by yourself? I like hanging out with people...KYU...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: There's a lot of ppl on this island so make sure you don't forget about being courteous to everyone around you...KYU...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I heard there's a dungeon in the middle of this island...KYU...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I feel like crap, so I won't talk...KYU...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: We pets are created by Cloy of Henesys.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I know it's precious, but you need to take those potions while you fight to get stronger fast!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Go do some quests and something good may happen~

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: There's not much to say but...feed me!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying...I have nothing to say...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm tired, so I'll tell you later...

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: NO! You haven't showered in days! kyu...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, I'll go hug you up~! Kyu!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, I can feel your heartbeat~! KYU!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Master...please go take shower right now!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: NO~! I don't want to hug you! KYU!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I like how you embrace me, master

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Master? You really think I'll hug you up?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: And you were scolding me just now...

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: If you feed me, I will

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Master, you smell! I don't wanna hug you~

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Play time~ Play time! PLAY TIME!!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Who sleeps in the middle of the day...kyu?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Ahh...I'm sleepy...master, give me your arm as my pillow...kyu...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Please don't have delicious food all to yourself while I'm asleep...kyu...

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Master! I feel fine~! Hang out with me!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: If you sing me a song, then I'll fall asleep.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: You know you're gonna write all over my face while I fall asleep...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I can't sleep cuz I'm hungry! FOOD! FOOD!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Really? Nice! I feel good~ kyu~

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: That wasn't for me, right? kyu?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: That was a typo, right? kyu?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I love you too, master! KYU!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe...I'm gonna tell everyone about this...KYU!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Master, I know you're lying. KYU!

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You're just saying that, right? KYU?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: One minute you're all over me, now you say you love me...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you love me, how come you aren't feeding me?

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for it again...?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master this is soooo delicious! Kyu!

string.name: s2
string.value: Kyuu~ I am NOT gonna say that!

string.name: s3
string.value: I am definately not a bad rabbit!

string.name: s4
string.value: Don't make me say those words~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Maybe you should have a rest too Master!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: How about a song as well?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Don't you ever want to do anything else?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I can't understand a word you say!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: How did you know I wanted to rest?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I need to take a rest now!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You are the best master ever!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I don't want to sit here.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: No... All this lying around is making me fat....

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Hey, it's something I'm good at!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I am getting fat because of all this resting!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Don't you want to play with me?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Don't look at me like that!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I will be better, really... Kiii…

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master I won't do it again...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I'm good, you're bad... Yes that's it!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Bad! You don't love me anymore!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm the most obedient pet around! AHHH!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: One more of that and I'll ignore you!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Ahh… I must have drank too much.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You expect me to pee in public?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: No, I don't need to now.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhh I feel so much better...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Wow! I must have drank a lot!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I don't feel like it! ARP! ARP!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: It isn't nice for a monkey to pee here…

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ah that is what I call real Monkey Business!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: How am I supposed to pee when you didn't even feed me?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Why don't you pee in public too?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Don't you have anything better to do than asking me to pee all the time?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Ah, that's so nice of you!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Then why don't you feed me?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Hmm, I feel all warm inside.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I love you too! Give me a hug!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't think that you do!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You're referring to somebody else, right?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You're the best Master I could hope for!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I love you too! what about going for a hunt together?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I sure am a lucky monkey!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I love eating more than I love you!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Are you sure? You haven't hugged me for ages!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You probably love your new weapon more!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't feel like it right now.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I can stand! I can stand!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll stand if you feed me!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Have you ever seen a monkey standing so straight?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Look Master! I'm good at this!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I did it! Master! I'm standing!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm already standing?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Monkeys don't stand... we hang by our tails!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm tired from running after you all day!

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: I think I see some food over there…

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I love it when you talk to me! Ki ki…

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I love you master! Do you love me too?

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say at all.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: You can do quest instead of just killing monsters all the time.

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Monkey's are the best pet there is, I think so anyway…

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Don't you hate people that don't take care of their pets?

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: If you don't feed me, I'll go back home and not come out!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: It is rude to wake a monkey from its sleep! ARP!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What's a monkey got to say?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! ARP! ARP!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: If you don't keep me fed, I'll run away to the circus!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: If you buy me a meso magnet and item pouch I can collect all your loot for you!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Please try to appreciate me while I'm around, I don't live forever you know?

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: What do you expect me to tell you when I'm always following you around?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Don't you have any other things to do?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Why don't you talk to someone else?

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I'm sure you can find someone else to talk to.

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: I want to play all day long!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: How about we go somewhere else first?

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm busy now?

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Feed me first... then I will think about it.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: But I'm too hungry to play…

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Who sleeps in the middle of the day? Not me!

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: How can I sleep on an empty tummy?

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: Yawn... It is time for bed…

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: I'm not sleepy, I want to climb trees!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I'm not as lazy as you think Master...

string.name: c32_f4
string.value: If you don't want to train, I'll just go alone!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master! I like this a lot!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Master... are you trying to stuff me?

string.name: s3
string.value: I thought you were a better Master than that!

string.name: s4
string.value: Oh no! I can't hear such bad words!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't sit on the street!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Unless you give me something to eat!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Why don't you take a seat too? Oink?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I am losing so my weight nowadays! Oink...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Oink! I took a seat. Give me food?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Oink oink oink! I'm a loyal Golden Pig.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Oink! Sitting down is so comfortable.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ah... I feel so lazy today. Oink!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I bring luck to you! Oink!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'm cuter when I am sitting down, aren't I?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: You want me to sit down? Oink?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Now I sat. Buy me some delicious food!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Won't give you any luck if you stay mad all the time!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Are you making fun of me?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: What did I do this time? Oink?

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Don't be angry. You are scaring me, master.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'm sorry! You'll still feed me, right? Oink?

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm sorry! I won't eat dinner tonight... Oink!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why am I getting punished? Oink?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: What did you say, oink? I was busy eating!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I eat a lot, but I'm not a bad piggy! Oink!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Just don't hit me please... Oooink...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Oink... I don't eat that much... Oink!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Because I'm a PIG! Did you forget? OINK!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: OINK! That won't even make me blink! OINK!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Oink oink oink... So yummy. Want some too?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I won't do it again, master. Oink?

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Don't be mad. Forgive me? Oink?

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I can't just make golden poop anytime you want!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I not a pooping pig! OINK!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I am not full enough to take a dump!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Not ready to take a dump yet, master. Oink!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: If you collect golden waste, it will bring you luck!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: My poop is golden poop... O...ink!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: OINK! I am not ready to go yet!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Do you want my golden poop? Oink?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Gimme more yummy food, so I can poop!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Oink. My poop is golden poop!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Look at my shy golden poop!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I feel great! Now I can eat some snack!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Forget about poo-poo. Let's go for a walk.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Oink... I wanna play with a ball.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I don't feel like pooping right now. Oink.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: NO! Let's go eat something delicious! Oink?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I feel dizzy after taking a dump.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: My golden poop will bring you luck!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I-I feel so skinny after taking a dump!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: First thing's first. Please feed me!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I need to get some rest today... Oink...

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Oh, I want a cup of yummy icy cold Power Elixir! Oink!

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Oink! I want something delicious today!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I see some good items coming your way today, master.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I am the Golden Pig and I bring luck to my master!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Oink, oink. Look at my charming tail!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Always hungry! I miss food already!!!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Not ready to take a dump yet, master. Oink!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: How about some more hunting if you got time to chat with me? Oink?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Go east, you'll meet a nobleman...

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Go west, you'll get something very valuable...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Master, how about a nice dinner party after hunting today?

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: If you collect golden waste, it will bring you luck!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I might die of hunger... o...i...n...k

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I lost my appetite lately... Oink...

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Oink... Need to sit down now.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Grandma Yeon's favorite Shrimp Meat is so yummy! Oink!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Is Dry Treat really that yummy?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Have you seen a speaking pig? Oink?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I got hungry so I ate. I ate and now gotta go to the bathroom! Oink!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Oink! Gotta level up! No sleep for you tonight!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Gotta get some rare items! Wake up, master!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Wanna go get some Red Potion from the General Store in Henesys?

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Oink. I was very sleepy anyway...zZZ

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Dream sweet dreams of me, master!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Oink... Gotta go to bed. Zzz

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I am too hungry to sleep! Oink!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why don't we go hunt? Oink?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I don't want to go to bed now, OINK!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Can I sleep with you? Oink?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I am gonna have pretty dreams! Oink.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You should go to bed too. Oink...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Buy me a decent bed or something, jeez... Oink

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: When is Mrs. Ming Ming's party going to end? Oink!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I want some delicious Dry Treat. Oink!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Good night to you too! Oink!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Time for bed. Good night! Oink.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I am so sleepy. Sweet dreams, master! Oink...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: It's time for piggy to go to bed. Zzz

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Well, that's enough. Let' go eat something!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am so, so, so happy!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Okay. Who should I tell that, oink?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Give me food. Then I believe you!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I have been in love with you as well, master!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: What I need is some snacks!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What? Can't really hear you... oink!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I am so hungry... I feel like I'm gonna pass out! Oink!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about some White Potion first? OINK?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I can't perform at the drop of a hat...

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Can I just have a day off? OINK?

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: One, two, one, two! Oink oink!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I'll do it just for you! Oink!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Trick? What is it? Can I eat it?

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: I'll do it a little later!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Golden Coin Chocolate is the best!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Great sense of balance comes from my perfect S-shaped body! Oink!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Look, master! I can do this!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Sure! Anytime for you, master! One, two, one, two!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Way better than Dry Treat! Oink!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: So delicious, I might cry! Oink!

string.name: s4
string.value: Oink oink! No luck if you use bad words!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Why don't we sit together master?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I'm so nice, listening to your every need.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I don't just sit on the street.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: What's that? Is that something I can eat?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: How does Ducky look right now?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Hey, don't you order me around.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Uh, where's my cushion? I won't sit without it!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Ducky don't want to do it right now.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Ducky is very scared of you now.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Is Ducky being yelled at right now?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Ducky don't understand why you're mad.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Ducky's scared when you get mad.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: It hurt Ducky's feelings when you're being mean.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Ducky won't do that EVER again.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Ducky won't do it again. Give me a chance.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Can't you see my tears? Please, have a heart... Ducky...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: If you keep punishing Ducky, Ducky will turn BAD!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You strange. You keep punishing Ducky without feeding Ducky!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Ducky will call police if you keep harassing Ducky! QUACK!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You do that one more time, you see Ducky no more!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I'm so happy. Say it again, please?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Quack... Put more emotion into it next time.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Sorry but I'm taken. Find another duck.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Master, I'm serious. Snap out of it.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Love... Is this feeling love? I think I'm falling for you, master.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: This little duck loves you too!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Quack!! Your words are not very convincing.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I'm so happy you're my master, quack!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Tell me that ten times every day!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I hope you never, ever change!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: It's not you, it's me... I'm a duck, quack. Give up.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Do you even know what love means?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Meh... I'm not feeling it... Quack...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I love you like a family, too!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I think I'm going to have a wonderful dream tonight, quack!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You can sleep right next to me, quack!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: How did you know ducky was sleepy?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: It's much too early for that! Quack!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: You want me to sleep all day long? Quack!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I'm already falling into sleep. Quack...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I'm going to take a short nap.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You are telling me to sleep at a place like this. Master, you are mean!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Are you planning a party for after I fall asleep?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: It's no time for sleeping, you must level up!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: My snuggly pillow is making me...fall..asleep...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Stand by me while I sleep, please?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Lately, the more I sleep, the sleepier I get...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I just wanna sleep all day long!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Why are you forcing me to sleep? You're suspicious....

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Are you plotting to abandon me when I fall asleep?! I won't fall for that!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I will sleep when I sleep. Bug off!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: No, no... I won't let you get something yummy while I fall asleep! Never!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I am talented at talking, I know.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Nice weather out. How about taking me for a stroll in the Strolling Path?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Have you not seen a talking duck before?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I don't want to talk right now.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: What do you think about this red muffler? I'm a fashionista!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I just wanna talk with you all day long!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Anything you wanna hear from me?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Don't wanna talk. Why don't you talk?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: You don't have any friends, do you?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I am enjoying the solitude right now.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Scuba Pepe and I are nothing. It's not what you think. Quack!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: This is a secret, but I can transform...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I love spending time with you, master.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Once upon a time there was a duck named Ducky...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I talked too much today. Let's talk again tomorrow.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Are ya bored, master? Go hunt more!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: This is the dance that'll make you move!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Everybody! Dance, with, me. Oh yeah.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Shake it, shake, shake it. Boom boom boom.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Dance? I need some music, please!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Why don't you give it a try first? Quack!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I dance til the end of night! Quack, quack, quack!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Compliment me, and I shall dance more!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Look at this crazy steps I'm doing!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: My dancing is so good you might fall in love with me!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: You're gonna make fun of me, aren't you?!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Dancing is not my thing. Nope. Nada.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: That doesn't just happen out of nowhere!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What are you going to do for me?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I can only do it when no one's around...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'm too sleepy to do that... Quack.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: This is a once in a lifetime event!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I practiced every day for this moment!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: You might just fall in love with my transformed self!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I don't feel like it. Quack...

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Quack, quack. You're not even looking at me. I'm pooped...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: You give best food, master! Quack!

string.name: s2
string.value: Quack! How could you say that?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Master, I will take a seat if you give me a chair!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Oh, no... Do I have to sit?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Growl! It feels so comfortable to sit down.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Growl, I like it so much.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Why don't you take a seat, master?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I want to go for a walk, growl!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Growl! Give me something to eat!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Growl! I don't want to do it!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Growl! Aren't I so tiny and adorable, master?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Like this? Aren't I so cute, master?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ow, I will listen to you from now on! Growl!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Master! I will do anything you want!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Grawr! I don't want to do it!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Grr, I think I have reached puberty.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Grr! If you want a seat, just take one for yourself.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Don't be angry. You are scaring me, master.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Rawr? What did I do wrong?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Grrr! Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, why are doing this to your tiny, cute tiger?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I will be an obedient baby tiger.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I will be a good tiger.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Grr, grr! No, I hate it!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Hehe, I will become an erratic tiger!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Rawr... I regret what I have done.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Oh, please go easy on me this time.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Grawr! Don't get mad. Please just listen to what I have to say! Growl...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: If you give me a piece of cake, I won't eat you up!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: This is boring. Let's play something else, master!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Growl! I'm not scared at all!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Grrr! Why are you treating me like this?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How can I do that here? That would be embarrassing! Growl...

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I don't want to go to a bathroom now, growl.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Not here! This would be embarrassing, growl.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Ugh, a baby tiger's poop is used as a medicine whether you believe it or not!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Oh, I feel so much better! Are you going to poop, too?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Grr, I feel so much better!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Grr, it feels so good! Master, please clean this up!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: This place is so dirty! Grr!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Feel free to take a dump and enjoy yourself, master!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Growl, I've been having constipation lately...

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I don't want to go to stool now. Phew...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I feel so much better now, growl!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Grr! Master! Look how big my poop is!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Master, I'm done now! Would you please wipe my butt?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Forget about poo-poo. Let's go for a walk.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I can't do it, because you keep looking at me! Grr.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Grr, grr! No, I hate it!

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Master, master! Aren't I so cute and tiny? Growl?

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I'm happen to be an excellent speaker for a tiger! I also speak a foreign language! Woof, woof!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: My cute tail wags gently. Isn't this adorable?

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: What do you like about me the most, master? Tell me!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Grr! I want to be alone now.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Forget it! Why don't we just go and hunt?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: In fact, I'm not a baby tiger but a kitty! Meow!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: If you give me a piece of cake, I won't eat you up!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Your head is so huge, master!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Growl! You can hunt more easily if you entrust your potions to me.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You must be quiet in places like this. Grr!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Why are you always ordering me around? You play all the time, master? Grr!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Shall we play a word chain? I will go first! Growl! Calcium!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Master, were you born with legs that short?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Tell me something hilarious! You know, a story from a long, long time ago.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Isn't Gaga's face way too long? Growl.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I want to be alone once in a while. Would you please be quiet?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I don't want to do it once you order me, grr!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Why don't we just go to sleep? Zzz...

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Should I go to Henesys Pig Farm? Growl!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Growlie will go to bed now, master.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Growlie will go off to dreamland.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Grr! It's not time to sleep yet!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm too hungry to fall asleep... Give me some meat, master!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Growlie won't sleep in somewhere as noisy as this place!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I don't want to go to bed now, growl!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Growl, I feel really sleepy, master!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I was actually feeling sleepy... You are the best, master!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Master, would you tuck Growlie up in the bed? Growl!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Growlie wants to sleep next to you. Zzz...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You have to at least sing a lullaby to put me to sleep! Grr!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Master, this is not time for you to sleep! Growl!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I just woke up! Why do you want me to fall asleep again? Grr!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I want to go and have fun in Korean Folk Town with you, master!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Have a wonderful dream, master! Dream of having billions of Mesos, growl!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I will go to bed if you want me to, grr!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I will sleep on my pillow, growl.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Master, don't wake Growlie up from now!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I'm dying to eat some meat right now. I can't even fall asleep!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I can't sleep... I miss my mom so much, growl...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You must make a bed for me to sleep! Grr!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Growlie wantsto chat and play with you now, master.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Oh, my! I feel so good!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I really, really like you as well, master!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You have a good eye for tigers, grr!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Not just anyone can earn my love!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Why don't you give me plenty of food before you say that?

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Oh, I don't know what to say!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I have been in love with you as well, master!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Do you say those things to any person, master?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Grr! That's not what I wanted to hear from you!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Give me a piece of meat rather than a piece of your mind!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Master, what about your significant other?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: This is Growlie who loves you and only you, master!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Can you see hearts coming out from my eyes? Growl.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Growlie feels so great! I feel like I can fly across the sky!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Should I just fly off? Growl!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: If you keep saying that, I will just run away! Grrr!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Never mind! Why don't we go and grab something to eat?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I also want to eat meat. I feel dizzy.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master! Please give me a meat everyday!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Give me a tasty side dish, grr!

string.name: s2
string.value: Grr! What did you just say?

string.name: s3
string.value: Master! You must not say something like that! Grr!

string.name: s4
string.value: Grr! You should use only fair words!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Keep watch while I sleep, master.

string.name: c6_s3
