string.value: If you don't have anything nice to say, don't say anything at all!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Lala...such a cool wind in my mane.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Wehee...I don't desire to do so!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Ah...I miss the chairs in the castle...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Thank you for your kind consideration.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: How dare you! Do you realize who you are speaking to?!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Aah, since you are asking, I shall.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: If that is what you wish! Wehee!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Owie! I've been pricked by a thorn!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'd rather not, I'm a bit sore.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Wehee! How dare you try to command me?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Okay, hut! Ahh! My legs won't bend!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: La ti da...I can't hear you...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Lala, I am singing a song of repentance!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I am of a noble personage.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I can get angry as well! You...cough cough...my throat...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You must not like me anymore.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I acknowledge my mistake. I am sorry!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please accept the apology of a unicorn prince.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Do you realize that you are speaking to one of nobility?!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I am quite disappointed in you!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Sigh...It is only natural for a horse to move forward!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I am truly sorry, but I cannot return the sentiment.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I am not the right one for you.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Lala... My heart is yours as well!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I hope that your heart shall never change.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I will stand by you always!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I will overcome our differences, to stand by you!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I shall be returning to my kingdom soon.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: We are of different classes. I am sorry.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Did you at least bring me some sugar cubes?

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: If that is what you desire...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I am a prince, but I can be down to earth! Hrrgh!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: No, this is not right! Not right at all!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I hope that you will learn to be a bit more elegant.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Phhhhhhrt... You didn't hear that! It wasn't me!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Unicorns are too dignified for pooping.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I am no commoner. How can I go in such a place as this?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: My leavings are not for all to see!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You should get some rest too.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I am find just as I am!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You need to move around more. Look at your love handles!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Posture is important, even when sleeping...zzz...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: So, this is how the homeless sleep...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can you even think of sleeping at your level?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why don't you prepare a nice bed for me first?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Aah...I miss my golden bed back in the castle.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I am not used to taking orders!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I wish for my kingdom to appear in my dreams.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: We have much to do. There is no time for sleeping!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: How dare you try to command me!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Bring me some sugar cubes! I am hungry!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Lala...I am the first prince of the Unicorn Kingdom!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I have come here just to meet you.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Dignity and elegance are my pride and calling.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I shall invite you to my kingdom someday.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Lala... Let us sing a song!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My sister is a beautiful unicorn with a light blue mane.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Esel and I are good friends.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I hope that my sister will be able to visit Maple World.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Esel and I still feel quite...lonely.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Members of the royal family like myself must be careful in all that we say and do!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: It wasn't a mistake that brought me to Maple World.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: My kingdom is inhabited by only unicorns.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Do you wish to learn some manners from me?

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Elegant unicorns such as myself enjoy silence.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: What? You surprised me. I wasn't expecting you to talk to me.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm in no mood to talk.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: There are days when i just feel like being alone. Alone!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: It is not for anyone to see.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: If I don't move for 10 minutes, call a doctor.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: How dare you command a member of the royal family!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I refuse! How can an unicorn of my stature stoop so low?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Wehee! How dare you try to command me?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I am too tired for a trick!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I shall show you something that Esel can't even attempt!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: This is a secret move, passed down through the royal family.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Aah...I don't think I can perform that today!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How can you ask me to do such a thing? I cannot!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I am too tired. Please bring me a sugar cube.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Wehee. It's not something you can see anytime you want to!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I am quite full! Please, no more!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Aah...I miss the meals back in my kingdom..

string.name: s3
string.value: A beautiful word for a beautiful person...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Give me a pillow to sit on!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Just...gonna close my eyes...for a second...

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Stop telling me what to do!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I'm not listening to you! You're not my real dad!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Neigh! I don't wanna sit. I wanna sleep.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I don't listen to ugly people!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Whinney... Don't you like me anymore?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: How can you be mad at a cutie like me?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You make me so sad! Neigh!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: This horn is sharp. Don't make me stab you!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Promise to love me forever and ever?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Sorry, but I'm a limited edition unicorn...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'm holding out for my knight in shining armor.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: FRRRT! N-no, I made that sound with my mouth! Honest!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Snort. I'm going to use the toilet!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Why are you so curious about it, master? Whinney!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Give me some sugar cubes, and I'll think about it!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: No! I wanna play some more!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Why don't we go hunting instead?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why do I gotta sleep outside? Whinney!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No. I'm going to play some more!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'm waiting for my knight in shining armor.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Do you really think it's okay to have a pet unicorn? My legs are tired...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Whinney! I'm the mysteriousest unicorn of all!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My brother's a total snob! Don't tell anyone I said that, okay?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Esel always makes fun of my mane, but Esel's mane is totally dyed!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sssh, this is a secret. This hairband is actually my brother's...

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Whinney! Go play on your own!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I'm gonna take a nap now.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Hoompfh, I wanna play with my brother and Esel!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Whinney! Not in the mood today.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Neigh! Neigh! Why don't YOU talk?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Whinney. I'm going to go play.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I learned this from a fairy. Neigh!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Whinney. I wanna be a star!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Stop trying to make me work!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Neigh! Only because you asked me!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'm gonna turn into a pigacorn!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I should rest a bit while I freshen up!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Neigh? But the ground is dirty...

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I want to walk a bit more.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Why don't you come sit with me master...neigh...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Okay, you should get some rest too, master. Proompfh...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Good idea. My legs were feeling a bit tired!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I don't want to get dirt in my hair!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Fatigue is not good for the skin...neigh...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: How did you know I wanted some rest?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Hmmpfh! Don't try to coerce me!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to fold my legs...wehee...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: How can I sit in a place like this? No way! Hmmpf!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I don't know what this is about!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I can't hear you! Wehee, wehee!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm sorry... I won't do it again...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Proompfh... I still like you best...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master, why are you mad at me?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Proompfh, I'm gonna get mad too!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'm sorry for hurting your feelings...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Neigh...please forgive me...I'll be a good unicorn...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Why are you so upset with me?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm gonna rebel! I'll show you!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: So I'm the prettiest unicorn, right?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I love hearing that from you.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master... I know I'm pretty and all, but...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I've heard it so many times...

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Neigh... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Heeee... Brushing my mane was worth it!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I love you so much!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Master, you finally see my worth. Brr...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Master, I'm so lucky to have met you. Proomph...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Please don't be so mushy before I eat...

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Neigh...I prefer the company of horses...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Master... That's nice... But you smell funny.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't want to... I'm not going to...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Why? What are you gonna do with it?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Okay, but watch my back. Proompfh!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: My poop is cute like me!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: You go first. Then I'll think about it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Poop? Why don't you try feeding me first?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I am a dignified unicorn. I don't poop in public!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm not gonna do what you say! Proomph!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I want to dream of you...neigh...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You want me to sleep on the ground?!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: If I sleep too much, I'll get fat!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I want to play more. Wehee...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: A pretty unicorn like me deserves a beauty sleep, right?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Can you brush my mane while I sleep?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll get a good sleep so we can play some more!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: My beautiful skin requires lots of sleep...zzz...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Should we be sleeping when your level is so low? Go hunt!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Neigh... I decide when and where I sleep...and I'm not sleepy!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Where do you plan on going after I fall asleep? Take me with you!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Proomph...I don't want to sleep in a place like this. Hmmpfh!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: My hobby is brushing my mane...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I need to polish my horn sometime.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'm your most special pet, right?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Have you ever seen a unicorn as pretty as me?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I don't have anything to say...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My golden mane can be difficult to manage!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Some days, I just want to run free and wild!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm so happy that you are my master.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: So, what do you think of my skills?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Today is a good day for meditation.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You are truly skilled at bothering your pets.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: One of these days, I want to soar through the sky with you on my back!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I wish I could find a nice horse to be with...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I've thought about dying my mane, but it's already the best color!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I was 1st place in the Unicorn Beauty Pageant!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I'm enjoying my peace and quiet, master!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Master, you need to grow up!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Oh, I was just talking to myself. What did you say?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Too much talking will give me wrinkles!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: You'll cry tears of joy, master.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Proompfh. I'm only showing this to you, master!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: It's a secret to everyone else. Okay?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Today is just not the day for it!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: It's not something you can see anytime you want!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Transformation time! Master, just you wait!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Heh, sometimes a cute look like this ain't too bad.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: The beautiful unicorn is multi-talented, as well. Proompfh!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Is that your best? I don't think so!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Nothing in this world is free! Proompfh!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm just too tired right now. I'll show you some other time.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm gonna get fat if I eat any more...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Yummy food! Neigh... I'm so happy!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: You can't feed a pretty unicorn like me such cheap food.

string.name: s3
string.value: Pretty master, please use pretty words...wehee...

string.name: s4
string.value: True beauty starts with sincerity! Remember that!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Lala...such a cool wind in my mane.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Wehee...I don't desire to do so!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Ah...I miss the chairs in the castle...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Thank you for your kind consideration.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: How dare you! Do you realize who you are speaking to?!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Aah, since you are asking, I shall.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: If that is what you wish! Wehee!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Owie! I've been pricked by a thorn!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'd rather not, I'm a bit sore.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Wehee! How dare you try to command me?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Okay, hut! Ahh! My legs won't bend!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I am truly sorry, but I cannot return the sentiment.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: La ti da...I can't hear you...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Lala, I am singing a song of repentance!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I am of a noble personage.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I can get angry as well! You...cough cough...my throat...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You must not like me anymore.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I acknowledge my mistake. I am sorry!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please accept the apology of a unicorn prince.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Do you realize that you are speaking to one of nobility?!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I am quite disappointed in you!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Sigh...It is only natural for a horse to move forward!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I am truly sorry, but I cannot return the sentiment.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I am not the right one for you.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Lala... My heart is yours as well!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I hope that your heart shall never change.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I will stand by you always!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I will overcome our differences, to stand by you!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I shall be returning to my kingdom soon.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: We are of different classes. I am sorry.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Did you at least bring me some sugar cubes?

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: If that is what you desire...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I am a prince, but I can be down to earth! Hrrgh!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: No, this is not right! Not right at all!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I hope that you will learn to be a bit more elegant.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Phhhhhhrt... You didn't hear that! It wasn't me!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Unicorns are too dignified for pooping.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I am no commoner. How can I go in such a place as this?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: My leavings are not for all to see!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You should get some rest too.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I am find just as I am!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You need to move around more. Look at your love handles!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Posture is important, even when sleeping...zzz...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: So, this is how the homeless sleep...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can you even think of sleeping at your level?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why don't you prepare a nice bed for me first?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Aah...I miss my golden bed back in the castle.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I am not used to taking orders!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I wish for my kingdom to appear in my dreams.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: We have much to do. There is no time for sleeping!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: How dare you try to command me!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Bring me some sugar cubes! I am hungry!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Lala...I am the first prince of the Unicorn Kingdom!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I have come here just to meet you.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Dignity and elegance are my pride and calling.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I shall invite you to my kingdom someday.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Lala... Let us sing a song!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My sister is a beautiful unicorn with a light blue mane.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Esel and I are good friends.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I hope that my sister will be able to visit Maple World.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Esel and I still feel quite...lonely.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Members of the royal family like myself must be careful in all that we say and do!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: It wasn't a mistake that brought me to Maple World.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: My kingdom is inhabited by only unicorns.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Do you wish to learn some manners from me?

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Elegant unicorns such as myself enjoy silence.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: What? You surprised me. I wasn't expecting you to talk to me.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm in no mood to talk.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: There are days when i just feel like being alone. Alone!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: It is not for anyone to see.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: If I don't move for 10 minutes, call a doctor.

string.value: Whinney! Not in the mood today.

string.value: Neigh! Neigh! Why don't YOU talk?

string.value: I'm gonna turn into a pigacorn!

string.value: Or we could do something else…

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Do you hear yourself? All these commands…

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Check it out… Pretty good, right?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh... I'm sleepy… Can't hear you…

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy… I'm feeling underutilized here.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I was just minding my own business... then this! Squerch!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Why do you do this? Squerch?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I know squerch kwon do and I WILL use it! Squerch!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: You're not really mad, right? Right?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Some masters let their pets have fun…

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I looked up some other masters… Turns out there are plenty of options.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I promise I'll be good now…

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Is there a reason for this or do you just like yelling?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm so used to it, I don't even feel it anymore...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master gets bored, so I get yelled at…

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet. Squerch.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How can I poop if you don't feed me? Squerch.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for the bathroom. Squerch.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Oooh... I almost stepped in it...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: It hasn't been long enough yet, master.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Not really into pooping on command…

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: When do I get to tell YOU to poop, master?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Ahh... whoa, my breakfast just came out like that...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Phew! Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Phew... You can tell it's been a while! Yowza!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to poop out in the first place!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'm saving it all for one big poop.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Did you just say what I think you said? Squerch.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I think I love you too!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: And you just had to tell me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Ah... I thought you were going to say something else…

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: That was a good one... haha...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: You're making my gills red, master...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Oh! Oh!! Me too! Me too!! hehe...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Probably should have kept that one to yourself…

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You'll have to do better than that…

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You want me to fake it? Squerch.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Have you seen a shark smile? Not pretty. Squerch.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: How about a treat instead? Squerch.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do, master!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I'm already smiling… Cause I'm with you!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I only open my mouth for food.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Not really feeling the whole happiness thing right now…

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Now you're in charge of my emotions too?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Maybe if there's a reward involved.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing... Squerch.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: M... master… I can't believe you said that…

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: That was a joke… right? Right?

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Master, I get hurt when you say that…

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: And the meanest master of the year award goes to…

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I see why it's hard for you to make friends.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Do you really not like me?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: You say this all the time. Maybe I'm doing something wrong.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Say it again. See what happens.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm sick of you berating me!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: The more you go hunting, the better the items you'll find. Squerch.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go somewhere to play! Squerch.

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket. Squerch.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Have you ever heard of a chatty shark? Squerch.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say to you… Squerch…

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I can't talk to you right now. Squerch.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Master, you'll get me some good food today, right?

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Good!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: A lot of people are here, so make sure to be courteous!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say…

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Not much goin on over here…

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I just met someone. Maybe we could go on a double date?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head… hahaha. HUGE!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: This is boring… I need something more exciting

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Why do you keep talking to me? I'm trying to sleep...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Buurrrrpp. Don't I look cute burping? Squerch.

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: My friends tell me the same thing! Squerch.

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: This is my area of expertise. Squerch.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: You don't have to tell me that…

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: That doesn't mean much coming from you.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Whoa, master must have gone nuts.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: So you want me to burp? Burrrrrpppp. What do you think?

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: You won't find a cuter pet anywhere! Squerch.

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Master, what do you think? Cute, right? Squerch!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Master! Just get me some food! Squerch!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I don't wanna do cute stuff! Squerch!

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Like this? At least you know a cute act when you see one...

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Here's a nice gassy burp for you!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: No one can match my burping skills!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: You think I'll just do whatever you ask… I thought you were smarter.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I need to eat in order to burp, you know...

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: I ate onions and garlic just now... no burping! No cuteness!

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: How do I put this… No?

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: I'm tired. I need to sleep. Squerch...

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: So sleepy... let me sleep... squerch...

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: How am I going to sleep if I'm not even tired! Squerch!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Don't go eat something good while I'm asleep! Squerch.

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: So you can doodle on my fins? No thanks!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I'm hungry! Can't sleep! Feed me!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I am about to blow up... squerch...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is so delicious... squerch!!!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: This is as good as it gets!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Are you trying to kill me, master?

string.name: s2
string.value: Squerch? You asking doesn't always mean me doing…

string.name: s3
string.value: Squerch! My precious mouth will not spit those venomous words!

string.name: s4
string.value: Please, no... no flavors like that... Squerch.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: I'm so hungry that I feel dizzy.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I'm getting too heavy these days.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Can't you see how fat I'm getting...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: At this rate, I won't even have enough energy to eat.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I don't have much of an appetite.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'm so hungry I can't think.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm so hungry that I can't go on anymore.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My stomach feels like it's going to shrivel up.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'll eat when I want to. Stop treating me like a child!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Give me something good to eat at least!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Why are you being like this to me?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I can't understand you these days.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You're getting mad at me for nothing...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You thought I was going to cry didn't you?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Why don't we just talk about this?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Why are you getting mad at me?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: This is not what I was thinking...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Do you hate me that much?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know how to get mad too!

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: I don't even have enough energy to poop.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: It's not going to come out.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I've been having trouble going these days.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I really had to go bad.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Something has to go in before it can come out!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You want me to go again?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Do I look like some kind of mutt?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I can't go here, it's too dirty.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Please don't make me do this...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I told you I don't want to sleep!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I don't want to waste my time with sleep.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I'm a cute baby tiger! Don't yell at me!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: That's not going to make me mad.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You're always getting mad at me...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What did I do?! Tell me!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I don't want to hear it.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I know how to get angry too!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You want me to sleep? Okay.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I don't know anything about that...

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: All I want to do is sleep...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: It doesn't seem like a big deal.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: What do you want me to say...

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Aah, you just wanted to hear my voice!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: We really do need to talk more.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I don't feel like talking to you today.

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: A long, long time ago...there was a handsome tiger...

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: What do you want me to talk to you about?

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: I just don't feel like talking.

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: I'll talk if you compliment me.

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: I really don't feel like talking.

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: I want to enjoy the quiet.

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: What's wrong with you all of a sudden?

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: Don't just say it, do it.

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: Love is about action, not just words.

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: We're a match made in heaven.

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: You should've been nice to me.

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: I don't think we would look good together.

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: I'm sorry, but I'm in love with someone else...

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: This popularity just won't go away.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: This tastes bad... I only like steaks.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: It's so yummy. Chomp, chomp. So delicious.

string.name: s2
string.value: Baby Tiger doesn not know that word.

string.name: s3
string.value: Baby Tiger wants the master not to say that.

string.name: s4
string.value: Master never orders me to do that.

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: Do I look lazy like you?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: This looks like a comfy place to sit.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Give me a fluffy pillow first!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: All the cool kids are doing it!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Sorry, but I have better things to do.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: But all we do is sit!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: All the cool kids are doing it!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I used to hate this command.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Sorry, but I have better things to do.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: But all we do is sit!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: But we have to help people, master!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: We have more important things to do!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: We have more important things to do!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: You'd really say no to me?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: You can be so mean sometimes.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm at a loss for words...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Are you trying to make me cry?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Being nice can be fun, you know.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I wish you weren't my master.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Are you trying to make me cry?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You've hurt me more than you'll ever know...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Being nice can be fun, you know.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I wish you weren't my master.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: You only say that when you want something!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Our pact can never be broken!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Bet you say that to all the dragons!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Are you even capable of truly loving?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I feel warm and fuzzy inside!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I don't feel the same way. Sorry.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I feel warm and fuzzy inside!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I'll love you forever and ever, master!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I don't feel the same way. Sorry.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Master, you must love yourself first.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I smell adventure in the wind!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Eh, how about a nice nap?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: My scales hurt when I talk.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Wow, master! I'm having so much fun!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Can I have something to eat?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'm not one to gossip, but...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Do you know what no means?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I'm not one to gossip, but...

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sure! That's what friends are for!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Do you know what no means?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: We both know where this is going...

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I could eat this all day!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm not in the mood right now.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You want me to eat what?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Did you wash your hands first?

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I'm getting pretty good at this!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I have other skills, you know...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: I'm getting pretty good at this!

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: I have other skills, you know...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Is that all I'm good for now?

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Hehehe, smells so fresh around here, hehe.

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Wonder if I can breathe fire from that end?

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: I think I need to change my diet, master.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: I don't want to gross people out!

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Hehehe, smells so fresh around here, hehe.

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Wonder if I can breathe fire from that end?

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: I think I need to change my diet, master.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: I don't want to gross people out!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Lose a few pounds first, master.

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Lose a few pounds first, master.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master I'm too fat! Please look away!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Give me more! I'm a growing girl!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Please no more! I can barely breathe.

string.name: s2
string.value: Please don't ask me to say that, master.

string.name: s4
string.value: You need to wash your mouth, master.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I have short legs, so this is all I can do ... oink...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Ah, this feels comfortable~ Oink oink~~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't know what you're saying~ Oink oink~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No I don't want to sit! Oink oink~!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, so I sit like this, right? Oink~

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Master, am I good or what? Oink oink~!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Ahh, this feels so good! Oink oink~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I have short legs, so this is all there is to it...oink oink~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, do I HAVE to sit? Oink oink!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Let's do something else! Oink oink!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Too dirty around here! Oink oink!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Master, are you making me sit again? This is too easy~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Sitting is a piece of cake!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Can't tell whether I'm sitting or on my belly? Heheh...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: What did you say? I didn't hear you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I'm tired of doing whatever you tell me to do, you know...

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Why are you like this? Oink!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You can't find a better pet than me~ Oink~

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master ... I'll be careful from here on out.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man, he's going off on me again ...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Things happen in life, you know? Why are you acting like this?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I've been called this so many times, it doesn't even affect me anymore...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I don't like hearing that, oink...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Take back what you just said, oink!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: M...master...I can't believe you said that...oink!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Master, I get hurt when I hear those...oink

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That was a joke...right? Right? oink?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You...didn't mean that, right? right? oink?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Take back what you said! oink!!!!!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master...this is not the first time I've heard this, but it still hurts...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You aren't gonna leave me out hanging like this, right?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me??

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...hehe

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: If you keep saying that, I can really go off on you...

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I must have ate a lot ... oink oink~

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet, oink...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How can I poop if I don't feel like it, oink...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Too embarassing to poop here ... oink ...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Crap, it got on my butt ... oink ...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Phew ... I almost pooped on my foot ...oink ...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master, it hasn't been long since I last pooped...oink...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to poop yet, master...oink...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel like pooping yet...oink...

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Pooping should be done in bathrooms, you know ... oink. ...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhh...that was good...but it's still embarassing...hehe

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...whoa, my breakfast just came out like that...hehe

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Phew~ Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Phew~ Haven't taken a crap in 3 days and look at this!! Yowza!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to poop out in the first place...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Master...can I do it later in the dark? I don't wanna do it in public...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Master...how am I gonna crap on purpose??

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I love food, so please don't forget to feed me. Oink oink~

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I heard there's a castle called Ludibrium ... have you been there? Oink oink~

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Apparently you store items at the storage... you know that, right? Oink oink~

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You need to eat everything to be healthy like me~ Oink oink!!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Have you seen a pig talk? Oink ...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say ... oink ...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: You can go to places far away from here by getting on a boat ... oink oink!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, it's so vast around this area that I have no idea where I'm at~ oink oink!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Apparently there's a pet walking road... I'd like to know where that is! Oink oink!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I wish I had lots of friends like you, master! Oink oink...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I said I have nothing to say! oink....

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Master, I'm feeling hungry now ... please feed me laster~

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Master, you head... seems to be bigger than your body!!! Hahaha~

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Feed me something nice! I want to try something else!!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I heard from a friend that ... we may stop moving one of these days ... is that true?

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Man, I'm hungry ... feed me first...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: You must be bored enough to make a pet like me talk ...

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: How am I going to make a fake smile? Oink...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Have you seen a pig smile? Oink...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: What do you think, master? Oink~

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do, master! Oink~

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: No, I don't want to smile...Oink...

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like this? Man... just this once

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I am not in a mood to smile...

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What do you think? Don't I look good? Oink oink!!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I'll protect you from any harm, master! Oink oink!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: You can count on me~! Oink oink~

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Do you like what you see? Oink oink~

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I don't want to do it, you know? Oink...

string.value: I get sleepy from sitting down, but...kyu..

string.value: I should just sit here instead of roaming around~kyu~

string.value: So I just need to sit here, right, kyu??

string.value: Keeps making me do the same thing over and over again...anything else? kyu...?

string.value: Huh? I was thinking of something else for a sec...kyu...

string.value: It's too dirty to sit around here...KYU...

string.value: Now that I sat, you need to feed me~

string.value: No more of that scary face...please...kyu...

string.value: I wasn't doing anything! WHAT, kyu!

string.value: You won't find a more obidient pet around you! KYU!

string.value: I was just sitting there! KYU!

string.value: So you're mad at me cuz you're bored, right?

string.value: What do you think, master? I'm good, right? KYU?

string.value: If my master wants me to...KYU!

string.value: Hahh...I've just gotte much taller! KYU!

string.value: Ey...I don't wanna do something boring like that...KYU

string.value: So may people around here, how am I gonna poop in public?? kyu...

string.value: I just pooped a few min. ago...kyu...

string.value: Ahhhhh...whoa, I almost stepped on it...KYU

string.value: I must be constipating right now...

string.value: Is something wrong with you these days...? Don't worry, I'll be there for you, kyu...

string.value: When you're buying items, you need to make sure you're not being deceived...kyu...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: If...you starve me, I may just crawl back into my home...so don't starve me too much...kyu...

string.value: I love the phrase "I love you" more than anything else in the world! kyu...

string.value: How about going from place to place instead of staying at a same place? KYU

string.value: Isn't it not fun playing by yourself? I like hanging out with people...KYU...

string.value: There's a lot of ppl on this island so make sure you don't forget about being courteous to everyone around you...KYU...

string.value: I feel like crap, so I won't talk...KYU...

string.value: I'm tired, so I'll tell you later...

string.value: I like how you embrace me, master

string.value: If you feed me, I will

string.value: Who sleeps in the middle of the day...kyu?

string.value: Ahh...I'm sleepy...master, give me your arm as my pillow...kyu...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Please don't have delicious food all to yourself while I'm asleep...kyu...

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Master! I feel fine~! Hang out with me!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: If you sing me a song, then I'll fall asleep.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: You know you're gonna write all over my face while I fall asleep...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I can't sleep cuz I'm hungry! FOOD! FOOD!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Really? Nice! I feel good~ kyu~

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: That wasn't for me, right? kyu?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: That was a typo, right? kyu?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I love you too, master! KYU!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe...I'm gonna tell everyone about this...KYU!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Master, I know you're lying. KYU!

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You're just saying that, right? KYU?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: One minute you're all over me, now you say you love me...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you love me, how come you aren't feeding me?

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for it again...?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master this is soooo delicious! Kyu!

string.name: s2
string.value: Kyuu... I am not gonna say that.

string.name: s3
string.value: I am not the kind of Rabbit who speaks of evil words,~

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Keep watch while I sleep, master.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'll just rest my eyes for a minute...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You're not the boss of me!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Nah, nah, nah. I hear nothing.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'm sorry! I didn't mean it!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I wish Utah were my master instead.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'm sorry! I didn't mean it!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I wish Utah were my master instead.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: You make me feel so warm and fuzzy.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: That means the world to me!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: That means the world to me!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You mean the world to me, master!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I smell adventure in the wind!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Eh, how about a nap first?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: My scales hurt when I talk.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Wow, master! I'm having so much fun!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Can I use my mouth to chew instead? Hint, hint.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'm not one to gossip, but...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Do you know what no means?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I'm not one to gossip, but...

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sure! That's what friends are for!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Do you know what no means?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: We both know where this is going...

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will be big and strong one day!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You want me to eat what?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Did you wash your hands first?

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I'm getting pretty good at this!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I have other skills, you know...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: I'm getting pretty good at this!

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: I have other skills, you know...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Is that all I'm good for now?

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: I've been saving that one just for you!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Wonder if I can breathe fire from that end of me...

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: I don't want to gross people out!

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: I've been saving that one just for you!

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Wonder if I can breathe fire from that end of me...

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: Nobody passes gas like me, master!

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: I don't want to gross people out!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Lose a few pounds first, master.

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Lose a few pounds first, master.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I'm too fat! Please look away!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Please no more! I can barely breathe.

string.name: s2
string.value: Please don't ask me to say that, master.

string.name: s4
string.value: You need to wash your mouth, master.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hand over wallet, Mr'kuma. You go crazy in your mind.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I come back when you not trying to eat me.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find demon friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I could go for a little power nap on some hot coals.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't destroy any villages without me, okay, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You can go to sleep if you want. I promise not to chew on your nose.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.
