string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I could go for a little power nap on some hot coals.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't destroy any villages without me, okay, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You can go to sleep if you want. I promise not to chew on your nose.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of jealousy like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you felt jealousy of another, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid jealousy, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You will see the firey hand of jealousy!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can make me jealous, we can have a real relationship.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: I see no purpose in sitting.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Why are you mortals always so frivolous with your wishes?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Does this please you, oh temporary master?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Have you decided your real wishes yet?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: May I do something else? Grawr?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Does this make me look more regal?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Wouldn't you rather I eat someone?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I just place my bottom upon the ground?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Sitting with you is quite relaxing.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I am able to conjure the powers of the heavens as well, you know?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I will, should you bring me a loaf of the meat variety.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Seven hundred thousand years of magical power and you ask me to sit.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Ask me for riches like a normal person!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I am seated already, mortal. Are you blinded with awe?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Speak to me when you have discovered respect.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: I will attempt to be better.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: That may be a slight overreaction.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Well, if you put it that way...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Do not blame me for being myself!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Perhaps it is YOU who are at fault, mortal!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I have done nothing to earn your scorn!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: A bolt of lightning might change your attitude.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I understand, you are under a lot of stress.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I am above your mortal emotions.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Was I so wrong? It was only a squirrel!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I will not be sad! I will not be sad!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: One of these days, I'm going to drop this marble on your head.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Is this how you mortals treat one another?!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I will watch you fry one day.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I haven't felt this bad since I ate that priest.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I find you strangely terrifying, mortal.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I have shamed a thousand generations of my ancestors.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: But I have done everything you asked!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You are the most fickle mortal I've ever met.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You are adorable when you are angry.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Find something else to yell at!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I hope you do not come to harm.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Aren't you supposed to be trembling in fear?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I will not be talked down to!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You are making my scales itch.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why do my cheeks feel warm? WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME?!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: My heart thumps when you say these measly words!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I believe you mortals would say, "ditto".

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: My dragon heart is not to be trifled with.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Do not say anything you will regret.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I, uh, have to wash my scales tonight.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Hey, how about those Green Mushrooms? Very green, aren't they?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Would you like me to take you flying?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I will move the heavens for you!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Might a humble dragon receive a kiss?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Are mortal affections given so freely?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I am sure you say this to all your pets.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Who needs love when you have power?!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: My eyes may be closed, but I have the reflexes of a water dragon!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I was already going to do that.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Perhaps you'll think of a better wish later.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Grawr! It is not my nap time!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I have little need for such things.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I suppose I could use a recharge.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: We mighty dragons have no need for sleep!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: This place is not fit for my great slumber!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I am no cat, content to lie in the sun!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: May I rest upon your lap? This cloud is quite cold.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Oh, the dreams I will have!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Your wish is granted, mortal! Zzzzzz

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: What if I were to eat you in my sleep?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: This area is too loud! My dragon ears are sensitive.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Can't we go battle some monsters?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I JUST drank some dragon coffee!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Allow me to fill in your pitiful knowledge of dragons...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I was once a mere thunder lizard, until I caught this orb.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Do know you how luck you are? Let me tell you.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: If that is what you wish...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I did not descend from the heavens to banter!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Your world is teeming with life.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: My mane is made of the finest spun gold.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I am omnipotent and all powerful, but I do get a little lonely.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Hold on, let me see if I have anything...NO.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why do you waste my power?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Your enormous head must be quite a burden.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Does this orb make my tail look fat?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: All behold the glory of my master and its silly face!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: My wisdom sounds much better in the original Dragon.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: What do you want to talk about?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Do the powers of the gods so amuse you?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: This show of force is quite exhausting.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Grawr! Look at all these lightning bolts!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My thunder will break the heavens!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: This is no mere trick! This is an event!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I tire of these petty displays.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Have you nothing better to wish for?!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will sink through my cloud if I eat another bite!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I try to say no, but my belly continues to rumble.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: No more, I have much...um...business to attend to.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Truly you are a great chef, master!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Do not look upon me. I am such a fat dragon...

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You will not be my master forever...

string.name: c22
string.value: I do not comprehend your ridiculous ways.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I WILL eat you. You are but a worm in my eyes.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Do not curse the commander of lightning!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'd sit if this were a rose field.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I'm a free fox! I sit for no one!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I hate this dusty ground. Gimme sand!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I was hoping we'd get to do that soon.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm pretty when I sit, huh?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: This place is cooler than my star.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I didn't mean to upset you.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Whatever, I'm going back to my star!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're so mean all the time!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You're not a friend! You're a bully!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I'm the savage beast of the desert!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I might cry if you yell...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: What the? This wouldn't be allowed on my star...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Are you actually scolding me right now?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I have a LOT of friends who like me!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You're a one of a kind person!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you today. I'll like you more tomorrow.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Give me some Star Candies, and we'll talk!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Am I prettier than a rose?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You don't know how to play!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I've been waiting so long for you to say that!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Are we going to stay together? Forever?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: My face is gonna get red! Wanna see?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I could use a little space.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Let's pretend we didn't have this talk.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'm a free-spirited fox! Don't try to chain me!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Okay, but you have to clean it up!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I'll really pour myself into this one!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I could do this all day!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I only do that for ME!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I don't know why you want that, but you got it!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Arooo! My face is all red now!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I don't think I'll ever stop!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'll poop when I wanna poop!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: You're going to get us in trouble!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm independent! I take naps on my own time!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Going to sleep already? You're lazy!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Ah, my soft and cozy tail.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I'm going to dream up a storm!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Sorry, I can't hear you, I'm having fun right now!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Sleeping out in the open is romantic, but not now.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I want to enjoy the day! Aroo!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Arooo... I miss the prince and rose... zzz

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Sleeping in the desert is SO romantic!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Bring me a blanket and pillow or no deal!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Why aren't we out hunting? That's way more fun!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Aroo! I want to go to the desert of freedom!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I used to travel with a wonderful prince!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I love Star Candy so much!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: What are we talking about? I'm a fox!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Arooo! Did you want to hear something?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: A fox has to keep some secrets!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Wanna go watch the shooting star?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: The star that the prince and I went to was much better.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Aren't you curious about the meteor I was on?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Eating star candy can make you feel better!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: We foxes are known for our quietness.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I can't believe they have more like me at a ZOO!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: There are so many people on this star!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I get my fur trimmed on a daily basis.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You should learn to entertain yourself!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You should play some music first!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I want to be in a concert!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't know what that means.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Aroo! I wanna do something else!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Up and down my head goes!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: The prince taught me how to do that!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: That dance is super popular on asteroid B-612!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: We've got all day tomorrow too!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: It's good to be a fox of the desert!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: I was JUST thinking about these!

string.name: s2
string.value: Do not want! Let's see it again!

string.name: s3
string.value: That word is SO not romantic!

string.name: s4
string.value: You say bad things! Earth really is a gloomy place!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Finally I can get some rest!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I don't want to sit here.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Can I take a Chocolate Muffin break?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Ew, there worms crawling on the floor!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't order me around like that! I will crush you!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Humph... I deserve a better place to rest

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: You read my mind. Are you the muffin man?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Cookies, Chocolate, Ice-Cream would be nice...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Stop! Let's relax for a while, master.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You can't always get what you want, master.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Do I look like a edible cookie to you?

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Why are you doing this to my button?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Master Why are you in such a foul mood?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Back off and take it easy.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: H-how can you yell at me like that?!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: you better don't make me mad or else .....

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I'm inoccent, dont accuse me! I hate you!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry! I won't do it again.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You're not enjoying this, are you?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Just you watch out! You will regret this!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I starting to fall for you!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You know I'm just a cookie, right?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm sure you say that to all your pets.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm happy to follow you around.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I feel that I'm the luckiest Gingerbread man ever.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're the best master. I'll follow you forever!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Love is fine, but I'm hungry!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Shut up someone will hear you!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Can you get me some toilet paper, master?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I don't understand what you want.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You must be joking with me, I not going to do it.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: No one's watching, right? Hurry cover for me!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Here a present for you HEHEHEHE!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I'm not going to do that...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go! Just go yourself NOOB Master.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Heyyyy... What am I suppose to do here...?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Noob Master Everyone's watching! I can't do it here!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Maybe a little nap would be good...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: The sun's still high in the sky!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Bedtime already? Where mine bedtime story?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Aren't you sleepy, master? I'm sleepy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Nothing beats sleeping on a soft pillow.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Don't let anyone wake me up. Alright?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Why can't I just sleep when I want to?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why are you putting me to bed? It's too early!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I need a comfy place to sleep on!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I not sleepy, I want to play!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: This was a such a long day.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I want to hibernate! Do not disturb!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Sweet dreams. Dream about me the Handsome Gingerbready

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Oh, just let me sleep already!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I told you, I don't want to sleep!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Isn't it too early for bed?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Why do you always want to sleep? What a lazy Master I have!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I not going to talk to you.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: There's nothing much to talk about.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm thirsty... Can I have some milk?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: It's your turn to talk, master.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I hope this conversation never ends!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Have you ever had a redbean sundae? How did it taste? I want one!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm glad you're my master, master.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I know you are bored. That why you are talking to me!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You can't talk me into liking you more, master.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You are truly skilled at bothering your pets.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: What's your wish? My wish is to be your only Gingerbready forever.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: The most important thing is Ice-cream. The second most important thing is...Pancake

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Look at me! Look at me!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Talking to you makes me mad.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why talk when we could eat instead?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Don't you have any other friends?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I don't want to talk to you, I'd rather talk to a wall.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Don't be surprised when I'm gone.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Be careful not to fall for my blue buttons!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Why don't we go have a dessert break?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I can't do that, stop forcing me!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: You are a cruel and mean master!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Look at me! Look at me!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: That deserve a hearty hand clap right?

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Well? Not many pets can do this!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll think about it...if you beg on your hands and knee.

string.value: Are you the muffin man, master?

string.value: No I not going to sit down.

string.value: You heard me, I don't want to sit here.

string.value: Come on I need a break.

string.value: Don't order me around like that!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Nooo I not going to sit down.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: A cold comfy bed would be nice...!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Some weather, huh? Let's relax for a while.

string.value: Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You can't always get what you want.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Do you want have a taste of my Icy Mallet?

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Whatever I will not do it again.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Why are you in such a bad mood?

string.value: H-how can you yell at me like that?!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why are you taking it out on me?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong. Stupid!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry! I won't do it again..

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You're not enjoying this, are you?

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: You really want to abandon me?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Could you repeat what you just said ?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: you such a lousy liar, I don't believe you.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You know I'm a Icy Knight, right?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm sure you say that to all your pets.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm happy to follow you around.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'm the most adorable Icy Knight in MapleSEA.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're the best master. I'll follow you forever!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: We can do that later, lets eat first

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Shut up! what if someone hear it ?

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: yuck, taste worst than mine Ice Mallet

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Can you get me some toilet paper make from ICE?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why...are you telling me to do this?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Oh oh oh oh... Feels good!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I made you a chocolate cake.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go! Do you?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: What am I suppose to do here...?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Everyone's watching! I can't do it here!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Maybe a little ice nap would be good...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Oh my .... its feel so good.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: If you wake me up, I will use my Ice Mallet to hit you!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can't I just sleep when I want to?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why are you putting me to bed? It's too early!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I not going to sleep here.

string.value: You want to be sleeping beauty too?

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Dream of sleeping beauty and me?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I told you, I don't want to sleep!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Isn't it too early for bed?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Please give me a break! I just say I don't want to nap.

string.value: What do you want me to say?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: have you ever came across another Icy Knight?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: What do you want to talk about?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm thirsty... Can I have some ice cube?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Have you ever had a Power-up drink? How did it taste? I want one!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Sometime I'm glad you're my master.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Why do you keep saying that?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Want me to love you more? sure! On one condition.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You are indeed highly skilled at bothering me.

string.value: I heard about the Ice obtained from El nath.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I hate you... Can you stop talking to me!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why talk when we could eat instead?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'd rather talk to a wall.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Don't be surprised when I'm gone.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Look at my eye! You are starting to feel tired.

string.value: Why don't we go hunt some mushroom?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I can't perform at the drop of a hat...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I'll be expecting a loud applause!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Beg me and I will consider.

string.name: s4
string.value: Are you a good or a bad person?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: How do you expect a Merlion to sit? On my tail? Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Let me sit in a nice pose like this! Cute? Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It wasn't easy sitting down on my tail but here you go! Pretty me?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: It's never easy to sit on my tail! Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Let's do the Merlion Dance! rwarrrr!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Can we do something else? Like, spitting water?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, rwarrrr!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, I will obstruct the railway station! Rwarrrrrr!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: It was nicely done right? Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sitting was never easy for me, but I did it! Rwarrrrrr!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Why not instead of asking me to sit, you get me some cookies? rwarrrrr!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Let's do the Kallang Wave for fun shall we? rwarrrrrrrrr!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I need to strike a nicer pose to sit! rwarrrrrrr!!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Are you all hopped up on Gummy Bears? I can't understand you!

string.value: It's not easy being the iconic symbol of Singapore!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: It was a piece of cake!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Whaddaya think? It was cute right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Why don't you wear a Mermaid suit and try sitting down! Rwarrrrrrr!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy...let me do something else.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe...I was daydreaming, so I couldn't hear you...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: tskkkk! you gave me a fright!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I am a Lion and you ain't scaring me! NO!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Tell me baby where did we go wrong? Rwarrrrrrr!!!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Why not you tell me to take all the blame?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Oh so you think I did something wrong eh?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I know you don't mean it, you don't!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: You're not really mad at me are you? Tskkkkk!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I promise I wont do that again!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do wrong anyway? Which way? Tskkkk!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You are trying to be cool but you are not cool!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I can be resting at Sentosa and not walk around being your pet you know? Tskkkkk!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If you keep doing that, one day I will spit water at your face!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I will take note of it and be careful from now on!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: This I promise you! That I will be good!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: You don't stare at a Merlion like that!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I don't think I have done anything wrong but you are...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I have been in here for so long.. longer than you!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You see! You going all out at me again for nothing! Rwarrrrrrrrr!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You must be bored! No problem, let me spit water in your face!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: So you think you are more clever than me? Really?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Throw me around all you want, I'm just gonna splash you!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: You don't like me? You can leave me here! rwarrrrrr!!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Ok, you win! No more waterworks.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I dare you to NOT take back what you just said! RWARRRRRR!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: It takes one to see one jerkface! tskk tskkk!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: You won't like an angry Merlion! rwarrrrrr!!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: ...I can't believe you said that... rwarrrrrr!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: My heart is like beach glass, it breaks easily, and has been smoothed by the waves of the sea.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Tell me it's not from your heart, or I will spit water in your face!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: YOU HAVE CROSSED THE LINE, YOUNG ONE! RWARRRR!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I give you 60 seconds to take back what you just said!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You broke my heart into a million pieces!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You hurt me once, you hurt me twice! When will this stop?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You'd leave me behind like this? Who do you think you are? RWARRRR!!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I still like you, really! Hehe!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you not love me cause I am cute?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Say that again and you get a face full of water!

string.value: Let's go for a tan on the beach! I will spit water at you to cool you down!

string.value: Sometime I wish someone could cover me with a blanet at night!

string.value: Sure? Ok, I take it as a YES!

string.value: You are very cool! I love you!

string.value: I got a fright, that was scary!

string.value: It's not cool at all, clickkkk!

string.value: You are ranting at me! Clickkkkk!

string.value: I didn't do anything to deserve this! Clickkkk!

string.value: I know you don't mean it right? You were just bored aren't you? Clickkkkk!

string.value: I am sorry, so sorry! Clicck clickkk!

string.value: Are you really mad at me? Clickkk clickkk!

string.value: What did I do anyway?! Clickkk!

string.value: That wasn't cool at all! Pooof!

string.value: Where else will you find an obedient pet like me? POOFFF!

string.value: If you keep doing that, I may one day get out of here! Clickk Clickkk!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: ...Things happen in life for a reason...

string.value: Man... you are going off on me again for no reason...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You must be bored...treating me like this...

string.value: I.. I don't mean that.. pooof!

string.value: I don't like hearing that, poooff...

string.value: Take back what you just said, pooof!

string.value: ...I can't believe you said that...CLICKKK CLICKKK!

string.value: I get hurt when I hear those...CLICKKK!

string.value: That was a joke...right? Right? CLICKKK!

string.value: You...didn't mean that, right? right? CLICKKK!

string.value: Take back what you said! CLICKKK!!!!!

string.value: ...This is not the first time I've heard this, but it still hurts...

string.value: You aren't gonna leave me out hanging like this, right?

string.value: Do you really not like me??

string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...hehe

string.value: If you keep saying that, I'm gonna get grumpy!

string.value: Phew! Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.value: The harder you hunt, the better the items you'll find, pooof!

string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, clickk clickkk!

string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket, like now?

string.value: How do butterflies talk? They click!

string.value: I'm too depressed to talk right now, clickk clickkk!

string.value: I have nothing to say to you... pooof!!

string.value: It's awesome day to fly around today! poooofff!

string.value: I am on Cloud Nine and more good things are coming our way! Pooooof!

string.value: Let's get something nice to eat today shall we? Clickkk clickkk!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Let's go to the garden today for some fun! Poooofff!

string.value: There's nothing for me to say now,! clickkk clickkkk!

string.value: I have so little to say!
