string.value: I'll sit here and think about ramen.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My legs are short and cute, but they get tired sometime.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I want to travel, not sit!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I really don't feel like sitting right now.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: You're right. Just 'cause I'm cute doesn't mean I can get away with everything.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: If I let you have my ramen, will you stop scolding me? Please?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You don't know what you're talking about.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Are you TRYING to make me mad?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: If I behave, will you give me some ramen?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: You're going to make me cry!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You still love me, don't you?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: C'mon. You can't scold someone THIS cute.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'll run away, and then you'll regret getting mad at me.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Don't stand so close to me.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: For that, I'll let you scratch my tummy.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Do I look easy to you?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Then shower me with ramen, please!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I always knew I was irresistible.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Not as much as I love myself.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: When you gotta go, you gotta go.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hope you brought along toilet paper!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Such a perfectly round little pelle!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Not right now. I have a headache.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You into that sort of thing?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Does this make me a party POOPer? Get it?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Hey! Are you saying I have a stick up my butt?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Will you sing me a lullaby?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Don't even THINK of using me as a pillow.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: You're not the boss of me.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You can sleep if you want. I'm busy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I hope I dream of ramen.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I count pies and donuts to fall asleep.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Will you pet me until I doze off?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I only sleep on silk sheets.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Last time I slept, someone tied my tail to my ears. Pass!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm refusing just to be rebellious.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I suppose I could afford to take a break.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Hey, I just wanted to tell you that I think you're really... Zzz.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You should rest, too. You can cuddle with me.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Coffee ramen, pizza ramen, donut ramen... Zzz.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Do I LOOK sleepy to you?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: You're so lazy, sometimes you disgust me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I have recipes to create! No time for sleep!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I'm not chubby, I'm big-boned. Just wanted to let you know.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Everybody who meets me, loves me. Didja know that?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Just 'cause I'm cute doesn't mean my life is easy.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Ramen is really good with sugar and honey. Try it!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Go away. I'm sick of your face.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why do you always follow me around?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Ugh, what do you want from me?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My dream is to become the world's best ramen chef!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I think about new ramen recipes all the time. Imagine: deep-fried ramen!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Here's a secret: my parents can transform into human shape.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Do you think red herb ramen would do well in this market?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Don't you have anyone else to pester?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You must be really lonely to be bothering me.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm going to pretend I don't see you.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Don't speak until you're spoken to!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I figure, if I stick with you, I'll get to travel and try all sorts of ramen!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I'm actually a really great dancer. I've got the perfect figure for it.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: People who want to bring me down say I'm fat, but I know it isn't true.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Sometimes people tell me I have no parents. I don't get it. I DO have parents!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Do I LOOK like I'm in the mood?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: We can dance if we want to!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Ah, I'm so adorable when I dance, I want to hug myself.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You love me even more than before I danced, don't you?

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm not here for your amusement.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'll think about it, IF you get me some ramen.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Believe it or not, I'm actually quite shy.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: You ain't never seen nobody as cute as me!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Buy me a mirror so I can admire myself when I dance!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What, and then you'll give me a treat? How demeaning.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I'm on strike until you take me to a new ramen restaurant.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is why I love you.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I could eat ten servings in one sitting!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Mouth...likes. Stomach, not so much. Too full!

string.name: s4
string.value: I can hear you, you know.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I don't want to sit here.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yes, a rest would be nice.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Oh, my legs are sore. Thank you. Mrow!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't order me around like that! Meow!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Meow. I don't sit in places like this.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: A nice, leisurely rest would be nice. Mrow!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Some weather, huh? Let's relax for a while, master. Meow!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Meow. Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You can't always get what you want, master.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Do I look like a remote control cat to you?

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I won't do it again. Meow!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Why are you doing this? MROW!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: What have I done wrong? Meow!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Meow! Why are you in such a bad mood?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Please cut me some slack. Mew.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry! Forgive me! Forgive me!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: H-how can you yell at me like that?!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why are you taking it out on me? MROW!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Meow! I didn't do anything wrong. Bad master!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry! I won't do it again. Meow...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You're not enjoying this, are you?

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Are you really abandoning me? Meow! Meow!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Liar! I don't believe you! MROW!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Say it again! Say it again! Mew!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Mrow... You know I'm a cat, right?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm sure you say that to all your pets.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Mrrow... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm happy to follow you around. Meow!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're the best master. I'll follow you forever!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Love is fine, but I'm hungry!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Ah! Shh, someone will hear you!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This is not a restroom! Meow, meow!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Can you get me some toilet paper, master?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why are you telling me to do this?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Really? You want me to do what?!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: No one's watching, right? Keep a look out. Meow!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I made you a gift, master!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go! Do you, master?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Meow. What am I suppose to do here?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Meow! Everyone's watching! I can't do it here!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Maybe a little cat nap would be good.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Meow. It's not time for bed yet.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Meow! The sun's still high in the sky!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Are you sleepy, master? I'm not sleepy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Nothing beats sleeping on a soft pillow.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Don't let anyone wake me up. Meow!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can't I just sleep when I want to? Mrow!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why are you putting me to bed? It's too early!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I still want to play! Mew!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: This was a such a long day.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I feel like sleeping for three days. Meow!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I told you, I don't want to sleep! Meow!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Isn't it too early for bed?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Why do you always want to sleep, master? Meow!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: What do you want me to say? Huh? Meow!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I grew up in an elegant palace.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Have you ever met as eloquent a cat as I?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: What should we talk about? Meow!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm thirsty. Can I have a red potion?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: It's your turn to talk, master.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I hope this conversation never ends!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Have you ever had a Power Elixir? How did it taste? I want one!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm glad you're my master, master.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Who's your favorite pet? Me, right?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Why do you keep saying that? Mew!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: What are you talking to me for? Bored?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You can't talk me into liking you more, master. Mew!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You are truly skilled at bothering your pets.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: What's your wish? My wish is to be your kitty forever.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: The most important thing is delicious fish. The second most important thing is...also fish!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: No, thank you. Talking to you makes me mad.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why talk when we could eat instead? Mrow!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Don't you have any other friends?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'd rather talk to a wall.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Don't be surprised when I'm gone. Mrow!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Be careful not to fall into my clear blue eyes!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Why don't we go hunting? Meow!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I can't perform at the drop of a hat...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I'll be expecting a heartfelt applause. Meow!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Well? Not many pets can do this!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I'll do what I want! Mrow!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll think about it if you beg on your hands and knees.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I don't want to eat anymore. Meow!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Don't you have something different? Meow. Meow.

string.name: s3
string.value: Meow! How can you talk to me like that...?

string.name: s4
string.value: Meow! Are you a bad person, master?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I hope no one notices I'm here... Eep!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Ahh, nice. Maybe it's time for a nap.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I want to sit... But I need exercise!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I'm going to sit down. Do you mind?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: La la la... I don't hear you...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: This place is filthy... I can't be here...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: With legs as short as mine, it doesn't matter!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Whew. I guess I am a little tired.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Ugh, my belly becomes really noticeable when I sit...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I guess I could do that... THIS time.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Forget it! I'm not doing anything you say!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Huh? What are you even saying?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I think I'm going to cry!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong. YOU'RE bad!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't take it out on me!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: What is it? I feel lost... I'm scared...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm full of tears! And they're coming out!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm gonna hang out at the Free Market.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Sometimes I wonder...is all this really worth it?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Now that you mention it, I love you too!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Well, um...I kinda I love you too!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Tee hee... You're making me blush!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I already know how you feel...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: *Grunt* It feels like my face is burning.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'll let you off for today...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Doot de doo, I can't hear you...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I don't even have a blanket...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: The ground is so cold and hard...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I just love to play the harp!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I want to tell you about so many things...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I want octopus balls... And fried noodles...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I'd like to be alone now.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Don't ever forget about me, okay?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My brain is just so full of...stuff!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Have you heard of the witch under the sea?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: But I don't have anything to say...

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Korean Folk Town sounds like fun. Let's go!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Everything will be fine as long as you feed me well.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Did you do your good deed for the day?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Are there more angels like me? I want to meet them.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: It's so delicious that it brings me to tears...

string.name: s1
string.value: Do you want to become a demon?

string.name: s2
string.value: You must not say something as foul as that.

string.name: s3
string.value: That's not something a human should say...

string.name: s4
string.value: Why would you say something like that?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm sitting down. Aren't I obedient?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Well if you want me to sit, then I guess I gotta.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't want to sit around!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I guess I should obey you.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Sorry, I was lightyears away. What's up?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I wanna see more of this!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I was going to take a break anyway.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I wanna go look around some more.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You think being the master's all there is?!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You're going to be sorry if you don't stop!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Act like a good owner already!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You don't have to sound so ominous...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Maybe getting hit by a shooting star will make you come around!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You ever see an angry star?!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You REALLY want to see me mad!?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm going to find a new owner!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I feel kinda icky when you say that...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Uh, great, let me just go think about that...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Have you been eating strange mushrooms?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: We were destined to be together!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm so happy you're here with me!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'll be by your side until I supernova!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: (Little veins are popping out on its forehead.)

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Ahhh, that could heat an entire village for a month!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Do you think me a savage?!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Like a little golden pile of sunshine!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Why are you laughing at me!?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Come back when you learn some etiquette!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Busy! Doing star business. Come back later.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Play with me! Don't wait till I fall asleep!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Did you know that tiny stars in the sky are bigger than the Earth?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I may be a tiny star now, but I will grow up someday!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You prefer stars or the moon? Or the sun?!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Hold on, I need to catch some rays...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I saw the neon signs in the city the other day. I can totally do that!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I can produce all kinds of light!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm usually sleepy when I see Mr. Moon... Is it just me?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: There are so many stars in the universe that you haven't met!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: You think it's weird that stars have wings? I think it's weird that YOU DON'T.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I heard there was an animal called a starfish that looks like me!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Space is a vast place. You couldn't even imagine!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Starwings dine on Milky Way Essence to become majestic stars!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I sometimes want to be the only star.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'm a little busy now, but I'll tell you something interesting later.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Starwings can spin like this and not get dizzy!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Cool, right? This dance move isn't easy!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Us Starwings dance like this when we're really happy!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: This may look easy, but it isn't!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I hardly have the energy to stand right now...

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I don't think now's a good time.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I want to eat, but I'm just too stuffed...

string.name: s2
string.value: That's not something a human should say...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Sitting down makes Yeti want to see Pepe~ Grr~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Yeti's feeling good~ Yeti's feeling really good~~ Grr

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Yeti doesn't want to sit~ Grr~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Yeti wants to do something different~ Grrr~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Yeti is too shy... to sit... GrrGrr~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti today doesn't want to listen~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yeti likes to sit, too~ Yeti's legs are feeling better now~

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Yeti sits, and so does the master~ Grrr~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti sits, and Yeti sleeps~ Zzzz

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti feels good~ Yeti likes sitting down~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Yeti does not understand what the master is saying~ Grr~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Grr~!! Yeti feels like rebelling right now~ Grr~!!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Grr~ Yeti is good at following the master's orders~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Yeti is good at doing this and others~ Grrr~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Yeti is sitting down very comfortably right now. GrrGrr~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Did Yeti do alright? Grr~ Yeti loves to be commended~ Grr~

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Yeti needs to go hunting with the master~ Grr~

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Yeti doesn't feel like doing it right now. Yeti will do it later~ Grr~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Yeti does not feel like sitting~ Grr~

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Yeti is scared~ Yeti will be good now~ Grrr

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti does not act angry~ Grr~

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Grr... Yeti is a good Yeti...Grr...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Yeti is sorry~ Yeti won't do it again~ Grr~

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Yeti doesn't want to be scolded~ Grrr~!!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: If the master keeps scolding Yeti, Yeti will run away~ Grrr!!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Yeti is good, but... Yeti feels hurt...Grr~

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Yeti is sorry... Yeti feels bad now...Grr..

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Grr~ If Yeti keeps being scolded, Yeti will feel very lonely~ Grrr...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Yeti will not be bad from here on out~ Grr

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Yeti will leave~ off to El Nath!!! Grrr~

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Yeti gets angry if scolded~ Yeti likes compliments~ Grrr!!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Yeti doesn't like being here. Yeti wants to leave!!! Yeti~ Grr!!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Yeti didn't do anything... Yeti is very angry right now~ Grrr!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master, forgive Yeti~ Yeti has been very bad~ Grr~

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Grr~ Yeti doesn't go against master~ Grr~

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti may be scolded, but Yeti still likes the master~

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Yeti is really feeling awful, and wants to make up for it~ Yeti is really good now!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Master gets angry at Yeti sometimes! Master is very bad!!Grrr!!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Yeti makes mistakes at times, and so does the master~!! Grr!!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Grr~!! If master keeps getting angry at Yeti, Yeti gets angry at master~

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Yeti doesn't need to feel sorry. Yeti will now become Yeti the rebel! Grr!!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Yeti is bouncing! Yeti feels good~

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Grr~ Yeti is a great dancer~ Yeti's great at everything!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Yeti's legs hurt~ Yeti needs a lot of rest~ Grrr..

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Yeti does not dance in public. Grr~

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Yeti is still a little bit shy~ Grr...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Grr~ Yeti is too depressed to dance today~

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Yeti feels awesome right now, and the moves are coming out~ Grr!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Yeti dances like no one else in this world~ Grrr~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti used to be the number 1 dancer in El Nath~ Grr~

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Yeti will show the master how to dance~ This is exactly how you dance~ Grrr~

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Yeti will not dance now ... Yeti doesn't want to dance...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Yeti is feeling really tired... Yeti is feeling weak.. Grr...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Yeti will bounce bounce bounce~ Yeti will shake shake shake~ and master will bounce and shake~

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, dance with Yeti! Yeti likes dancing with master~ Grr~

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Pepe once said Yeti looks the best when putting the moves on~ Grr~

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Grr~ Yeti loves to dance, and Yeti loves master, too~!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Yeti fought with Pepe today...Grr.. Yeti feels crappy right now..

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Yeti is hungry~ Yeti is feeling tired~ Grr~

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Master should not dance~ Only Yeti dances, and right now, Yeti doesn't want to dance~

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Yeti will not dance~ Yeti will quit dancing now~ Grr~

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Yeti is feeling the pressure~ Grr~

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Yeti is trying hard now~ grrr... Yeti is exhausted now~

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Yeti had been holding back, until now~ Grr~

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Yeti just pooped~ Yeti does not feel like pooping now~ Grr~

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Yeti feels embarassed~ Yeti prefers private pooping~ Grr~

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti's do not poop often~ Grrr~

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Yeti wants to dance~ Yeti doesn't want to poop~ Grr~

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Yeti's poop is smeared all over Yeti's butt~ Grr~

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Yeti's poop is the size of Pepe~ Grrr~

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti pooped big time, and now Yeti is very hunry~ Grrr~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Yeti will poop, then master play with Yeti~ Grr~

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Yeti doesn't have anything coming out~ Yeti's stomach is hurting now~ Grrr~

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Yeti only poops at home~ Yeti cannot poop outside~ Grr~

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti doesn't like pooping~ Yeti will poop tomorrow~ Grr~

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Yeti will not poop~ Yeti will hang out and have some fun~ Grrr~

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Yeti feels good~ Yeti likes the feeling right after pooping~ Grrr~

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Grr~ Yeti is applying the pressure now~ Yeti is feeling tired...

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Master just stepped on Yeti's big old poop~ Grr~

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: This poop is Yeti's, and Yeti's only~ and that massive poop is master's? Grr?

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Yeti only poops a little once a day~ Grr~

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Grr~ Yeti does not feel like pooping~

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Grr? Poop? Yeti does not know what pooping is.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Master, poop in public! Yeti will not be the only one pooping in front of everyone~ Grrr~

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Yeti loves El Nath~ El Nath is Yeti's hometown~ Grrr

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Yeti likes snow and ice in El Nath~ Grrr~

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Pepe and Yeti are friends~ Yeti likes Pepe very much~ Grrr~

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: El Nath is freezing cold and snowy, and Yeti wants to go back to El Nath~ Grrr

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Yeti does not speak well~ Grr..

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Yeti is too shy to talk~ Grr...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Yeti is sleepy... Yeti will sleep now... Grr

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Yeti wants to talk to Pepe~ Grrr~

string.value: Yeti likes El Nath, but Yeti wants to go to other places, too~ Grr~

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Yeti used to live in El Nath, and there is a frightening monster somewhere in there~ Grr~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Yeti likes fishing with Pepe~ Grr~

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Grr~ Yeti can do everything well~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti does not have anything to say... Grr...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Grr... Yeti will talk when Yeti feels like talking... Grr...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Yeti does not like being told what to do~ Grrr~

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Grr~ Yeti will not talk~ No, Yeti CANNOT talk~ Grrr~

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Grr... Yeti would one day like to revisit El Nath someday~ Grrr~

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Yeti likes to dance~ Yeti used to be the star of El Nath~ Grr~

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Pepe likes Yeti~ Yeti protects Pepe~ Grrr~

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti prefers cold places~ Grr~

string.value: If the master is bored, master shouldn't be hanging out with Yet; master should be out hunting~ Grr~

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Yeti does not feel like talking today~ Grr~

string.value: Go past El Nath and you'll run into the Dead Mine~ Grrr~

string.value: Yeti heard that there's ice in Leafre, too~ Yeti wants to go there~ Grr~

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Yeti looks a lot like the master~ Yeti looks like the master~ Grrr~

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Yeti knows a lot about the history of El Nath~ Yeti will talk about its history soon~ Grr~

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Is master bored? Yeti's busy~ Grrr~

string.value: Talk to Yeti right now, and Yeti will be very angry~ Grrr!!

string.value: Hang out with Yeti and then Yeti will talk~ Right now, Yeti will not talk~ Grrr~

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Yeti won't talk, and won't listen to the master~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti likes being told that Yeti is cute~Grrr~

string.value: Yeti is blushing~ Yeti is red now Grrr~

string.value: Yeti is not cute~ Yeti is NOT cute Grrr~

string.value: Yeti is sad. Yeti is feeling too hot to feel happy. Grr

string.value: Grr~ Yeti won't do it~ Yeti feels lazy~ Grrr~

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Keep doing that, and Yeti will be very mad~ Grr!!

string.value: Grrr~ Yeti always hears that~ Grr~

string.value: You are my favorite! Love you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You just as cute as me! Love you!

string.value: You want love? I want ribs!

string.name: c12_f4

string.value: Boing boing! Hee hee, keep up!

string.value: Wanna sleep next to you! Zzz...

string.value: You get nice thingies for me?

string.value: I like beef. Pork okay, too.

string.value: I have many interests. Like knitting.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I like talkies with you! You funny!

string.value: I born with big eyes. Sparkly!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Am I fat? Be honest. I take it.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I endangered creature. Take care of me!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Boing! I do lots of things!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I know how to rock, too!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Can't hear you, can't hear you!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Look at me! LOOK AT MEEEEEE!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Gonna be rock star! Have world tour!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I have no idea what you talk about.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: No tricks. I am quiet and gentle pet.

string.value: Buh? What if I get fat?

string.value: No more eat! Exercise! Bouncy bouncy!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Waahh! I don't want it! I don't!

string.value: Buh?! I remember this! You watch out!
