string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hand over wallet, Mr'kuma. You go crazy in your mind.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I come back when you not trying to eat me.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find demon friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I could go for a little power nap on some hot coals.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't destroy any villages without me, okay, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You can go to sleep if you want. I promise not to chew on your nose.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of jealousy like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you felt jealousy of another, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid jealousy, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You will see the firey hand of jealousy!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can make me jealous, we can have a real relationship.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm sitting down. Aren't I obedient?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Well if you want me to sit, then I guess I gotta.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't want to sit around!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I guess I should obey you.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Sorry, I was lightyears away. What's up?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I wanna see more of this!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I was going to take a break anyway.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I wanna go look around some more.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You think being the master's all there is?!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You're going to be sorry if you don't stop!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Act like a good owner already!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You don't have to sound so ominous...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Maybe getting hit by a shooting star will make you come around!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You ever see an angry star?!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You REALLY want to see me mad!?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm going to find a new owner!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I feel kinda icky when you say that...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Uh, great, let me just go think about that...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Have you been eating strange mushrooms?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: We were destined to be together!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm so happy you're here with me!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'll be by your side until I supernova!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: (Little veins are popping out on its forehead.)

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Ahhh, that could heat an entire village for a month!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Do you think me a savage?!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Like a little golden pile of sunshine!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Why are you laughing at me!?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Come back when you learn some etiquette!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Busy! Doing star business. Come back later.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Play with me! Don't wait till I fall asleep!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Did you know that tiny stars in the sky are bigger than the Earth?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I may be a tiny star now, but I will grow up someday!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You prefer stars or the moon? Or the sun?!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Hold on, I need to catch some rays...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I saw the neon signs in the city the other day. I can totally do that!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I can produce all kinds of light!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm usually sleepy when I see Mr. Moon... Is it just me?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: There are so many stars in the universe that you haven't met!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: You think it's weird that stars have wings? I think it's weird that YOU DON'T.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I heard there was an animal called a starfish that looks like me!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Space is a vast place. You couldn't even imagine!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Starwings dine on Milky Way Essence to become majestic stars!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I sometimes want to be the only star.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'm a little busy now, but I'll tell you something interesting later.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Starwings can spin like this and not get dizzy!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Cool, right? This dance move isn't easy!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Us Starwings dance like this when we're really happy!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: This may look easy, but it isn't!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I hardly have the energy to stand right now...

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I don't think now's a good time.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I want to eat, but I'm just too stuffed...

string.name: s2
string.value: That's not something a human should say...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Master, I will take a seat if you give me a chair!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Oh, no... Do I have to sit?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Growl! It feels so comfortable to sit down.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Growl, I like it so much.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Why don't you take a seat, master?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I want to go for a walk, growl!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Growl! Give me something to eat!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Growl! I don't want to do it!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Growl! Aren't I so tiny and adorable, master?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Like this? Aren't I so cute, master?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ow, I will listen to you from now on! Growl!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Master! I will do anything you want!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Grawr! I don't want to do it!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Grr, I think I have reached puberty.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Grr! If you want a seat, just take one for yourself.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Don't be angry. You are scaring me, master.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Rawr? What did I do wrong?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Grrr! Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, why are doing this to your tiny, cute tiger?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I will be an obedient baby tiger.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I will be a good tiger.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Grr, grr! No, I hate it!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Hehe, I will become an erratic tiger!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Rawr... I regret what I have done.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Oh, please go easy on me this time.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Grawr! Don't get mad. Please just listen to what I have to say! Growl...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: If you give me a piece of rice cake, I won't eat you up!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: This is boring. Let's play something else, master!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Growl! I'm not scared at all!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Grrr! Why are you treating me like this?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How can I do that here? That would be embarrassing! Growl...

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I don't want to go to a bathroom now, growl.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Not here! This would be embarrassing, growl.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Ugh, a baby tiger's poop is used as a medicine whether you believe it or not!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Oh, I feel so much better! Are you going to poop, too?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Grr, I feel so much better!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Grr, it feels so good! Master, please clean this up!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: This place is so dirty! Grr!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Feel free to take a dump and enjoy yourself, master!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Growl, I've been having constipation lately...

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I don't want to go to stool now. Phew...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I feel so much better now, growl!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Grr! Master! Look how big my poop is!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Master, I'm done now! Would you please wipe my butt?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Forget about poo-poo. Let's go for a walk.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I can't do it, because you keep looking at me! Grr.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Grr, grr! No, I hate it!

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Master, master! Aren't I so cute and tiny? Growl?

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I'm happen to be an excellent speaker for a tiger! I also speak a foreign language! Woof, woof!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: My cute tail wags gently. Isn't this adorable?

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: What do you like about me the most, master? Tell me!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Grr! I want to be alone now.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Forget it! Why don't we just go and hunt?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I want to take a dump... Grr...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: In fact, I'm not a baby tiger but a kitty! Meow!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: If you give me a piece of rice cake, I won't eat you up!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Your head is so huge, master!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Growl! You can hunt more easily if you entrust your potions to me.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You must be quiet in places like this. Grr!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Why are you always ordering me around? You play all the time, master? Grr!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Shall we play a word chain? I will go first! Growl! Calcium!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Master, were you born with legs that short?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Tell me something hilarious! You know, a story from a long, long time ago.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Isn't Gaga's face way too long? Growl.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I want to be alone once in a while. Would you please be quiet?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I don't want to do it once you order me, grr!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Why don't we just go to sleep? Zzz...

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Should I go to Henesys Pig Farm? Growl!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Growlie will go to bed now, master.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Growlie will go off to dreamland.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Grr! It's not time to sleep yet!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm too hungry to fall asleep... Give me some meat, master!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Growlie won't sleep in somewhere as noisy as this place!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I don't want to go to bed now, growl!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Growl, I feel really sleepy, master!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I was actually feeling sleepy... You are the best, master!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Master, would you tuck Growlie up in the bed? Growl!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Growlie wants to sleep next to you. Zzz...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You have to at least sing a lullaby to put me to sleep! Grr!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Master, this is not time for you to sleep! Growl!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I just woke up! Why do you want me to fall asleep again? Grr!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I want to go and have fun in Korean Folk Town with you, master!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Have a wonderful dream, master! Dream of having billions of Mesos, growl!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I will go to bed if you want me to, grr!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I will sleep on my pillow, growl.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Master, don't wake Growlie up from now!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I'm dying to eat some meat right now. I can't even fall asleep!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I can't sleep... I miss my mom so much, growl...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You must make a bed for me to sleep! Grr!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Growlie wantsto chat and play with you now, master.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Oh, my! I feel so good!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I really, really like you as well, master!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You have a good eye for tigers, grr!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Not anyone can earn my fondness!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Why don't you give me plenty of food before you say that?

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Oh, I don't know what to say!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I have been in love with you as well, master!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Do you say those things to any person, master?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Grr! That's not what I wanted to hear from you!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Give me a piece of meat rather than a piece of your mind!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Master, what about your significant other?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: This is Growlie who loves you and only you, master!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Can you see hearts coming out from my eyes? Growl.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Growlie feels so great! I feel like I can fly across the sky!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Should I just fly off? Growl!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: If you keep saying that, I will just run away! Grrr!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Never mind! Why don't we go and grab something to eat?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I also want to eat meat. I feel dizzy.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master! Please give me a meat everyday!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Give me a tasty side dish, grr!

string.name: s2
string.value: Grr! What did you just say?

string.name: s3
string.value: Master! You must not say something like that! Grr!

string.name: s4
string.value: Grr! You should use only fair words!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Or we could do something else.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Do you hear yourself? All these commands.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'm going to sleep. Don't touch me.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy. I'm feeling under-utilized here.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Ahh, I'm sleepy. Can't hear you...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I was just minding my own business... then this! Squerch!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Why do you do this? Squerch?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I know squerch kwon do and I WILL use it! Squerch!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You're not really mad, right? Right?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Some masters let their pets have fun...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I looked up other masters. Turns out there are plenty of options.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I promise I'll be good now.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Is there a reason for this or do you just like yelling?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm so used to it, I don't even feel it anymore.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master gets bored, so I get yelled at.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Did you just say what I think you said? Squerch.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I think I love you, too!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: And you just had to tell me?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ah. I thought you were going to say something else.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: That was a good one... haha...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: You're making my gills red, master.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Oh! Oh! Me too! Me too!! Hehe.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Probably should have kept that one to yourself.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You'll have to do better than that.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet. Squerch.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: How can I poop if you don't feed me? Squerch.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for the bathroom. Squerch.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oooh... I almost stepped in it.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: It hasn't been long enough yet, master.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Not really into pooping on command.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: When do I get to tell YOU to poop, master?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Whoa, my breakfast came out just like that.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Phew! Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: You can tell it's been a while! Yowza!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to poop out in the first place!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'm saving it all for one big poop.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I'm tired. I need to sleep. Squerch.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: So sleepy... Let me sleep... Squerch...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: How am I going to sleep if I'm not even tired! Squerch!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: You... come... sleep... with... me... Squerch.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Don't go eat something good while I'm asleep! Squerch.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Master, I just slept! I'm... not... zzzz...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: So you can doodle on my fins? No thanks!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm hungry! Can't sleep! Feed me!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do, master!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Don't ditch me while I'm sleeping.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: How about a treat instead? Squerch.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: The more you go hunting, the better the items you'll find. Squerch.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go somewhere to play! Squerch.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket. Squerch.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Have you ever heard of a chatty shark? Squerch.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say to you. Squerch.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I can't talk to you right now. Squerch.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Master, you'll get me some good food today, right?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Good!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: A lot of people are here, so make sure to be courteous!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Not much goin' on over here.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I just met someone. Maybe we could go on a double date?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head. Hahaha. HUGE!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: This is boring. I need something more exciting.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Why do you keep talking to me? I'm trying to sleep.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: This is my area of expertise. Squerch.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: You won't find a cuter pet anywhere! Squerch.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Whoa, master must have gone nuts.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Master, what do you think? Cute, right? Squerch!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Like this? At least you know a cute act when you see one.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: My friends love it when I do this!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: You think I'll just do whatever you ask... I thought you were smarter.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: How do I put this… No?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Master! Just get me some food! Squerch!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Master, this is so delicious... Squerch!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I am about to blow up... squerch.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is as good as it gets!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Heh heh, this is my favorite!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Are you trying to kill me, master?

string.name: s3
string.value: Squerch! MY precious mouth would never spit those venomous words!

string.name: s4
string.value: Please, no... no words like that... Squerch.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I soft, so I comfy anywhere.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I won't do it! Pinka piii!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I sit. You sing me a song!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'm sleepy, but I can't sleep...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Hee hee... I roll over easy!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I have a surprise for you...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You won't play with me no more?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I feel so comfortable around you.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: It's fantastic hanging out with you.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Scram. I'm not in the mood!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Yawn. I can't be bothered at the moment. Zzzz.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Shower me with all your love! Pinkaaa!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Lurve? Lub? What? Forget it, I'll just sit around and rub my tummy.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You're annoying. I have nothing else to say.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I'm afraid I'll have to reject you. Piinkapiii!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I've been waiting for you to say those words!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: That's so nice! I feel the same way about you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're just as cute as me! I love you!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Don't lie. My little ol' heart will shatter.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm very busy right now. Can we talk about this later?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You can't possibly think I have a good impression of you, can you?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Stop it, stop it, stop it!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Boing boing! Hee hee, keep up!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Leave the lights on! I'm scared of the dark.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I wanna sleep next to you! Zzz...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Let's play a little longer... Pwwease?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Nighty night, master! I lov…vee…ee… Zzzz.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Can you tuck in my blankie if I accidentally kick it off?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No time for sleep! Must xercise! Get strong!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: What do you want to hear? Piinkaaa?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Why am I called a bean? I look more like a mouse.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I can't stay balanced and talk at the same time.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My dream is to be a DJ.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I like beef! Pork's okay, too.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I have many interests. Like knitting.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I like talkies with you! You funny!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I was born with big eyes. Sparkly!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Am I fat? Be honest. I take it.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I'm endangered. Take care of me!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Boing! I do lots of things!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I know how to rock, too!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Can't hear you, can't hear you!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I am a guitar master! Wahnananana!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Look at me! LOOK AT MEEEEEE!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Gonna be rock star! Have a world tour!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I have no idea what you're talking about.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: No tricks. I am a quiet and gentle pet.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Buh? What if I get fat?

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Waahh! I don't want it! I don't!

string.name: s2
string.value: Buh?! I'll remember this! You watch out!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm a nice lamb that obeys well!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I was going to sit, baa!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I was actually planning to rest, baa!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I'm going to play more, baa!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Baa baa, you should sit down too.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Baa baa? What did you say?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I can't hear you, I can't hear you, baa baa!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I'm going to fly around more, baa baa!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Should we rest a bit? Baa baa.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Baa baa! What a peaceful feeling!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Baa baa? Are you talking to me?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't hear anything, baa baa!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Baa? What's with you all of sudden?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Baah! (It appears to be calling its mother...)

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Baa! Don't do this to me...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Baa... maybe I should change owners.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I don't even wanna hear it...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Baa baa! It's all my fault!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Baa! Did I really mess up that badly?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Baa... I won't do that again...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Hmph, I'll be the bigger ram.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: My patience has limits, baa baa.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Are you going to keep this up, baa?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If only I had a nicer owner...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Why do you always yell at me... *Cries*

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm going to tell my mommy, baa baa...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Wahhhh! You're just mean because you're bigger than me!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I really wish I could just smack you, baa baa.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm gonna call animal protective services!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I can get scary when I'm angry, baa...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Baa baa... THAT does it! (Veins popping.)

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Baa baa! I like, I like!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Baa baa. You aren't supposed to joke around like that.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Treat me well when you have the chance, baa.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Baa! I'm always on your side!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I said... I can't hear you!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Baa Baa! I got it, I got it!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Baa! I love hanging out with you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Baa! Affectionate actions make Pufframs dance!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Baa baa. I already know your feelings.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: So what do you want me to do, baa baa?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I'm shocked, I don't even have words.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: (Little veins are popping out on its forehead.)

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Do you KNOW what you are saying?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Something needs to go in for something to come out!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Baa baa! Every day is a healthy day!!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: It's not going to come out just because you whine!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Baa... let's have some common sense, shall we?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Baa baa... You want to get smacked?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'll let you off for today...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! I want to play more!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I want to play more, baa baa!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Baa... someday I'll soar higher than a dragon. Baa...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Can't you see that my eyes are still WIDE open?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Baa baa? What are you saying?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm not that lazy, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Baa Baa! So today, I'm going to... (Now it won't stop talking.)

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Are you amazed by flying lambs? So the secret of our race is...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Maple World is a pretty nice place to live, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: When we were living up in the sky, angels mistook us for clouds.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Is it strange that I talk?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Baa? Weren't we talking just a second ago?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Have you every had a Cloud Candy? It's the baaaaa-st.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: If there's one thing I hate, it's wolves.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: We are called Pufframs because we live above the clouds.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Baa baa... just leave me alone...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't want to talk right now, baa.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Mmm... are you hungry for a conversation?

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Baa baa, would it be better to walk or fly?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Baa baa, you want to hear something interesting?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Which one of us do you think can fly faster? Me or the eagle?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: To the Pufframs, the Golden Horn is a symbol of adulthood.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You look bored... too bad I'm not!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: (It appears to be thinking about something.)

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: What if I say no, baa baa?

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: This is the Puffram booty dance!!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Am I in the circus or something, baa baa?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Baa baa... I said, it sounds annoying...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I actually have this super cool trick... but I don't feel like it right now.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: (Jumps up and down.) Baa! Baa! Baa! Baa!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: It's super fun when you do it above the clouds, baa baa.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Can't I just be your pet?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Too hungry... no strength... baa baa.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Baa baa, eating time's my favorite time!!

string.name: s2
string.value: You want to get reported, baa baa?

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm so disappointed in you, baa baa!!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Are you testing me? Now I'm scared to move.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Happy now? Can we go now?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: La di da... Doo doo doop...

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Don't you care about saving the world?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I'll just pretend I didn't hear that.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: La di da... Doo doo doop...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: La di da... Doo doo doop...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Okay, fine. It was MY fault, okay?!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: It was YOUR fault. You made me do it!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Okay, fine. It was MY fault, okay?!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Do you have it in you to forgive me?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I'll make you regret saying that.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't say it unless you mean it!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: How can you say that to me?!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry, so now you can't be mad anymore.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I won't ever do that again. Promise!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: All words have consequences. Just wait and see.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: When you're least expecting it, I'll get you back...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'm not unhappy you said that.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: You're kind of sweet, I suppose.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'm not quite ready to say it back, but thanks.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I... Well, shucks, I love you, too.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: At least buy me dinner first.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'll just pretend I didn't hear that.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Please tell me no one's watching.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I'm not that kind of dragon.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Don't ask that of me. Please!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: You just don't let up. Oh, very well.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It makes me uncomfortable that you're watching.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: This... This actually feels kind of good.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I, uh, I have a headache.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I'm actually really getting into this.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: You're watching, right? It's not the same if you don't watch.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Don't MY feelings matter to you?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Please. I just want to disappear.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Leave the lights on! I'm scared of the dark.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm fine as I am, thanks very much.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: You go on and mind your own business.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You may go to bed first, if you wish.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: If you weren't so much bigger than me, I wouldn't have to listen to you.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I refuse to go to sleep yet!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Just because you're tired doesn't mean I am.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You'll keep the boogieman away, right?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You're going to have to say that again, and slower.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: But what if the nightmares return? Sniffle.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I come from a line of prestigious dragons, you know.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: My daddy could change colors. He could even turn invisible!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: My daddy could beat up all the other dragon's daddies.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: My daddy's roar would make you go deaf.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I'd like to see you try to make me.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Someday, I'll rule over ALL the dragons.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: What about YOUR heritage? Are you anyone special?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'll tell you a secret. It took me a long time to learn how to fly.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Sometimes, I just don't understand what you want.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Isn't there anyone else you can go bother?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I have no idea what you want.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: When I grow up, I'll be able to turn invisible like my daddy.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Just watch. I'll turn invisible. There, did you see it?!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Hey, what do you think of the Nova?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Can i go play with the other dragons?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I learned this from my daddy.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I don't have any talents, I swear!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I don't know what you want.

string.value: Please. I just want to disappear.

string.value: If you weren't so much bigger than me, I wouldn't have to listen to you.

string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: But what if the nightmares return? Sniffle.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I come from a line of prestigious dragons, you know.

string.value: My daddy could beat up all the other dragon's daddies.

string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.value: What about YOUR heritage? Are you anyone special?

string.value: I'll tell you a secret. It took me a long time to learn how to fly.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I guess I have been working pretty hard.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Will that make the constituents like me more?

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I've got a few bills to review anyway...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I just had these slacks pressed.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: That's no way to win a campaign!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Maybe I need a rocking chair...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: My voters really love when I sit down.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Can we do something else, please?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I don't like to sit down, I like to work!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: It's as easy as fair taxation!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: A good sit helps the mind focus!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I could do this all day.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You repeat yourself quite a bit.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I can't afford to look silly.

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: I suppose I could use some rest.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: That'll give me time to think about my next bill.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I don't know the meaning of the word!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: That's not how you win elections, friend.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I could use a little time off...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Just going to run over my speech a few times...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: My advisors told me to look busy!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: No way, no how, no sirree.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: When I set my mind to something, it happens.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I like that, makes me seem more down-to-earth.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: There are hands to shake somewhere!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I hope I've still got your vote.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Don’t take that out of context.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Don't give up on me yet!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I was wrong about that, and I admit it.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: My opponent is just as bad as me!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I know that wasn't he best result, but I can fix it.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Please don't hit me in front of the cameras...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Why are you blaming me? It was one of my aides!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I suppose we all have to relieve ourselves.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: For the good of the country!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Drinking lots of water is good for you.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I'm feeling a little exposed, but here we go.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Keep it out of the media, okay?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm the boss, I don't have to listen!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I don't know what to say...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I feel pretty strongly about you too.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Don't flip-flop now, I need your vote!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I know a fibber when I hear one.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I don't know if this is the right time...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'll have to run that past my advisors.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: The whole world is going to know!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: This is a scandal just waiting to happen.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Get outta here before the press gets wind of this!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Well, uh, you wanna talk about the economy?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Can you tell that to the reporters?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Really? Because I haven't seen a buffet in weeks.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: No sir, I don't like it.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'm perfectly comfortable where I am.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: What looks better? One leg, or two?

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: In the blink of an eye, I stand.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: We're going to hit the issues!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Look what a perfect candidate I am.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I can walk and talk with the best of them.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I should be working on my speech.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can we get a little food first?

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Let me tell you about my recovery plans.

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: We need to bring our troops home!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: The military isn't strong enough yet.

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: It's time to get real about family values!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: I need some more time to fix this speech.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I don't know what to say...

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: America is the best nation on the planet!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I'm bringing the stars and stripes back!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: What do you know about income tax regulation?

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I need to talk with my advisors first.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I believe in hard work and good people!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: It's good to be on the right side.

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Remember to take care of yourself and your country!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Everything you need to know is on my campaign website.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: The debates aren't for another few days!

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I can be fun, like normal people!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Hard work and no play is un-American.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I can do this all day!

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: There's too much work to do.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: We still need to talk about the important issues!

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Have I shown you my fastball?

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Let's play... With the federal deficit!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: I love a good bit of fun!

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Can't wait to see how fun this looks on the news.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Playing alone is just no fun.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Can't we just watch eagles for a while?

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: You know what's fun? Balanced budgets.

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Come help me find an alternative energy source! Wooo!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I'm going to pretend I'm president already!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: We're running out of games here.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: People aren't going to take us seriously.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: Let me check with my advisors first.

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: I think the people want to see me being more serious.

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: A little shut-eye is good for the complexion.

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Just a little more work, okay?

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: There's no time! I need to prepare a statement.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: I can't let the delegates see me sleeping!

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: I'm not ready to rest! I'm ready to fight!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Time for sweet dreams of my heroes...

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: You're just waiting to get a funny picture of me for the papers.

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: There's a whole lot of meeting and greeting to do!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I should be kissing babies right now!

string.name: c32_f4
string.value: Now's not the time to be slacking off.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I guess I have been working pretty hard.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Will that make the constituents like me more?

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I've got a few bills to review anyway...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I just had these slacks pressed.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: That's no way to win a campaign!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Maybe I need a rocking chair...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: My voters really love when I sit down.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Can we do something else, please?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I don't like to sit down, I like to work!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: It's as easy as fair taxation!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: A good sit helps the mind focus!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I could do this all day.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You repeat yourself quite a bit.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I can't afford to look silly.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Don't give up on me yet!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I was wrong about that, and I admit it.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: My opponent is just as bad as me!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I hope I've still got your vote.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Don’t take that out of context.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: The whole world is going to know!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: This is a scandal just waiting to happen.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Get outta here before the press gets wind of this!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Well, uh, you wanna talk about the economy?

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: I don't know if this is the right time...

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I'll have to run that past my advisors.

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Don't flip-flop now, I need your vote!

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: I know a fibber when I hear one.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I hope I've still got your vote.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Don’t take that out of context.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Don't give up on me yet!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I was wrong about that, and I admit it.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: My opponent is just as bad as me!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I know that wasn't he best result, but I can fix it.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Please don't hit me in front of the cameras...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Why are you blaming me? It was one of my aides!

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I'm feeling a little exposed, but here we go.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Keep it out of the media, okay?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I'm the boss, I don't have to listen!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I suppose we all have to relieve ourselves.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: For the good of the country!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Drinking lots of water is good for you.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm perfectly comfortable where I am.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: I feel pretty strongly about you too.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I want to go back to the patch...

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Pumpkins don't get mad... we get revenge.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: You can't fake being a pumpkin! Impostor!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: But... this dirt is so crummy...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'm going to put a candle in your head.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: What do you take me for?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I am going to poop in your lunchbox SO much.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Don't do anything you're going to regret when you go to sleep tonight.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't say it unless you mean it!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: How can you do this to me?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You better hope I don't get ahold of your shoes.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I said it won't happen again.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I wish somebody had carved me a mad face.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Want to see an angry pumpkin? Do you?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I've got a lot of laxatives to put into some candy tonight...

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Don't do it! Listen to your pumpkin!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: You're creepy in a good way!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You are the seeds in my brain.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'll be at your side until the day I rot.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Think of me as a child with a misshapen head.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Does it look like my insides?

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Gonna need some more candy wrappers here!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: It's a good thing I bought those candles.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Why are you asking me to do that?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: It is against pumpkin law for me to go first.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Makin' squeezin's outta my pumpkin butt!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Which one of these creases is my backside?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I don't have to go right now.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I am on this like black on a bat.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Let's go get some candy instead.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Leave my light on! I'm scared of the dark.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I have gourd business to attend to.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I need to scare some children first!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Not until I see a ghost!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Stop telling me what to do!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Sometimes I dream of turning YOUR head into a lantern.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Sorry, I can't hear you with all the awesome in my brain.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Not until we trick or treat!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I need at least three screaming kids to lull me to sleep.

string.value: First time seeing a talking pumpkin?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Wanna see some pumpkin magic? Gimme your wallet.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: October is obviously the best month.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Do you know when Halloween is? I don't understand the concept of time.

string.value: Pumpkin is NOT delicious. Don't eat me.

string.name: c20_f3

string.value: Come at me! I'll take you on.

string.value: It makes me sad that you have to discipline me.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: All right... If that's how you want it.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: If I wasn't a pet... I would....

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Blah... I will take the high road here.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You ever feel the punch of a rabbit?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: If I was just a bit younger... I would have taken you on.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I like you a lot too!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I feel the same way too!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Give me some time to think it over.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You are you, and and I am me, and that is all we'll ever be.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I don't know if feeling this good is legal!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: This is the happiest moment of my life!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I will be with you always!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: My insides are nice and clean.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Do you want to get locked up?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Don't talk to me right now.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: It's good to eat right and live well.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Now is not a good time.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I'll get to work on making some.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Stop that nonsense and let's play!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: My digestive system is in full gear.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: It's time to let it go.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: My eyes are closed. I am one with my bowels.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't want to hear that dirty talk.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I am still good to go.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Now is not a good time to sleep.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Now is not the time to sleep.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Sleeping is done on beds. Or hutches.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Do you know what's popular these days?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You are pretty fashionable, I guess.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I only like the designer stuff.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Not all expensive clothes are designer clothes.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: It's important that clothes fit you.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Don't wear it just because everyone else is wearing it.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: My hair is the product of a famous stylist.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You want to go shopping with me?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Be aware of Purty... She is a scary person.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't have such a thing.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: You expect too much from this rabbit.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: I am not leaving any leftovers!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'm so full, I am about to explode!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: How do you expect a Merlion to sit? On my tail? Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Let me sit in a nice pose like this! Cute? Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It wasn't easy sitting down on my tail but here you go! Pretty me?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: It's never easy to sit on my tail! Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Let's do the Merlion Dance! rwarrrr!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Can we do something else? Like, spitting water?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, rwarrrr!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, I will obstruct the railway station! Rwarrrrrr!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: It was nicely done right? Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sitting was never easy for me, but I did it! Rwarrrrrr!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Why not instead of asking me to sit, you get me some cookies? rwarrrrr!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Let's do the Kallang Wave for fun shall we? rwarrrrrrrrr!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I need to strike a nicer pose to sit! rwarrrrrrr!!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Are you all hopped up on Gummy Bears? I can't understand you!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: It's not easy being the iconic symbol of Singapore!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: It was a piece of cake!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Whaddaya think? It was cute right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Why don't you wear a Mermaid suit and try sitting down! Rwarrrrrrr!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy...let me do something else.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe...I was daydreaming, so I couldn't hear you...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: tskkkk! you gave me a fright!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I am a Lion and you ain't scaring me! NO!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Tell me baby where did we go wrong? Rwarrrrrrr!!!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Why not you tell me to take all the blame?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Oh so you think I did something wrong eh?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I know you don't mean it, you don't!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: You're not really mad at me are you? Tskkkkk!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I promise I wont do that again!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do wrong anyway? Which way? Tskkkk!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You are trying to be cool but you are not cool!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I can be resting at Sentosa and not walk around being your pet you know? Tskkkkk!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If you keep doing that, one day I will spit water at your face!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I will take note of it and be careful from now on!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: This I promise you! That I will be good!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: You don't stare at a Merlion like that!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I don't think I have done anything wrong but you are...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I have been in here for so long.. longer than you!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You see! You going all out at me again for nothing! Rwarrrrrrrrr!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You must be bored! No problem, let me spit water in your face!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: So you think you are more clever than me? Really?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Throw me around all you want, I'm just gonna splash you!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: You don't like me? You can leave me here! rwarrrrrr!!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Ok, you win! No more waterworks.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I dare you to NOT take back what you just said! RWARRRRRR!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: It takes one to see one jerkface! tskk tskkk!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: You won't like an angry Merlion! rwarrrrrr!!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: ...I can't believe you said that... rwarrrrrr!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: My heart is like beach glass, it breaks easily, and has been smoothed by the waves of the sea.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Tell me it's not from your heart, or I will spit water in your face!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: YOU HAVE CROSSED THE LINE, YOUNG ONE! RWARRRR!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I give you 60 seconds to take back what you just said!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You broke my heart into a million pieces!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You hurt me once, you hurt me twice! When will this stop?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You'd leave me behind like this? Who do you think you are? RWARRRR!!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I still like you, really! Hehe!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you not love me cause I am cute?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Say that again and you get a face full of water!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It got stuck at the causeway! Helpppp!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Oh, it smell like durian! Yikes.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Not yet! Not yet time to poop!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I dont want to poop, what can you do to me?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I can't go while you're looking at me.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: No more poops! Too much bad luck!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Oh dear, the smells are coming out!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I'm all out of poop power.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: It's been a while since the poop has flowed so regularly.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Please bear with me while I create the feeling!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I don't want! I don't want!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Do you read the newspaper when you poop?

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhhh! The feeling is sooooo gooood!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I can't believe the buffet I had earlier just came out like that!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: The more I look at my poops, the more they look like you!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I haven't had a poop this good in years!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: There was nothing to come out in the first place!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Errrrr can you bring me to the toilet? I cannot poop here, I am very shy!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You can't force me to poop if I don't have to! RWARRR!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Seek and you will find! Time to go hunt some rare drops!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Let's go for a tan on the beach! I will spit water at you to cool you down!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Sometime I wish someone could cover me with a blanet at night!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How do Merlions talk? They spit water out from their mouth! HAHA!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Very hard to talk to you with this much water in my mouth.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say, nothing!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: The sun is out to play, so are the Merlions!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: The sky and the heavens tell me you will get lucky today!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Bring me some food and I will give you more luck!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Shall we try out something fun today?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Don't say this when you don't mean it!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I have little to say! rwarrrr!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I might be big but you can hold me tight!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Who are you dating? Can I date them?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hey, Have you heard of the Legendary Phantom Thief?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I heard that in a faraway island in a cave, there lives a scary monster with three heads!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Get me some cookies and we shall talk!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't wanna close my eyes! I don't wanna fall asleep!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Man I am so tired, don't feel like talking to people today!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehehe! So shy now, I'm blushing! rwarrrr!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Sure? Ok, I take it as a YES!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: What's up young one? Got cookies?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: ORLY? OK! I LOVE YOU TOO!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I love you too! Really! Rwarrrr!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Really? Haha! I love you too!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: You are very cool! I love you!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Pass me some food like... NOW! NOW! NOW!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: My mind isn't working straight today, I was thinking of something else!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I know you are lying! You ARE!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Whatever goes around, comes around! Right back at ya!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: You are my one and only!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Me too me too ME TOO!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Have you been eating my special Merlion cookies?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Time to give me some food! Like... NOW!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Will you hug me to bed tonight?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I am sleepy, can you give me your arms as my pillow?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: You don't pretend to sleep when you are not! I can read your mind!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: The night is still young! Let's grab some cookies!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: If you sing me a lullaby, I will go to bed!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I know you will run away when I am asleep!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I can't sleep on empty stomach! cookies PLEASE!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Let's go for a ride! Vrooooommm!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: You do it once but not twice alright!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I can't just do it anywhere.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Good thing only last while it last and goes to those who waits!

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: Let's just sit and relax, ok?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I have to stop eating, I am overweight!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: There's a limit to my stomach capacity!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Can I have a 2 piece Fun Meal please?

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Hey, I am REALLY FULL! STOP FEEDING ME!

string.name: s2
string.value: Why are you talking to me in alien language?

string.value: Butterflies don't sit! We only fly around! Hehe!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm gonna try sitting! This is something new!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I didn't know sitting down was that easy!

string.value: I wanna do something fun, poof!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I wanna do something else, poof!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, poof!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, someone peed on the ground! Pooof!

string.value: Can I fly around instead? POOF!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Let me take you for a ride! Poof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: How are butteflies gonna sit?! Huh?!
