string.value: It's not easy being a butterfly...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: That was a piece of cake...

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Why don't YOU sit instead? hehe!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I have difficulties sitting down... let's try something else shall we?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe! My mind was blank! I didn't catch what you were talking about...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I got a fright, that was scary!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: It's not cool at all, clickkkk!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Please don't give me a scary face! I am a timid butterfly!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Tell me what went wrong! Clickkkk!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You are ranting at me! Clickkkkk!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything to deserve this! Clickkkk!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I know you don't mean it right? You were just bored aren't you? Clickkkkk!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I am sorry, so sorry! Clicck clickkk!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Are you really mad at me? Clickkk clickkk!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I promise I won't do that again... clickk clickk!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do anyway?! Clickkk!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: That wasn't cool at all! Pooof!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find an obedient pet like me? POOFFF!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If you keep doing that, I may one day get out of here! Clickk Clickkk!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man...I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: ...Things happen in life for a reason...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Man... you are going off on me again for no reason...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You must be bored...treating me like this...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I.. I don't mean that.. pooof!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I don't like hearing that, poooff...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Take back what you just said, pooof!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: ...I can't believe you said that...CLICKKK CLICKKK!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I get hurt when I hear those...CLICKKK!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That was a joke...right? Right? CLICKKK!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You...didn't mean that, right? right? CLICKKK!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Take back what you said! CLICKKK!!!!!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: ...This is not the first time I've heard this, but it still hurts...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You aren't gonna leave me out hanging like this, right?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me??

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...hehe

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: If you keep saying that, I'm gonna get grumpy!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It...it's not coming out well, clickkk!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet, pooooof...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How can I poop if I don't feel like it, poooff!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for bathroom, clickkkk!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to poop when you're looking at me? Clickkkk!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: It hasn't been long since I last pooped... clickkk clickkkk!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to poop yet... pooof!!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: ...I don't feel like pooping yet...clickkk clickkk!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhh...that was good...but it's still embarassing...hehe

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...whoa, my lunch just came out like that...hehe

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Phew! Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Phew! Haven't taken a crap in three days and look at this!! HUATZA!!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to poop out in the first place...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: ...Can I do it later in the dark? I don't wanna do it in public...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: ...How am I gonna take a dump on purpose??

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: The harder you hunt, the better the items you'll find, pooof!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, clickk clickkk!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket, like now?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How do butterflies talk? They click!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm too depressed to talk right now, clickk clickkk!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you... pooof!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: It's awesome day to fly around today! poooofff!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I am on Cloud Nine and more good things are coming our way! Pooooof!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Let's get something nice to eat today shall we? Clickkk clickkk!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Let's go to the garden today for some fun! Poooofff!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: There's nothing for me to say now,! clickkk clickkkk!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I have so little to say!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Are you dating someone? I'm not...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hey, can you beat Pink Bean?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You better play some Gachapon today, cause I'm feeling lucky!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I heard there's something scary in a cave in Leafre!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Let's put the talk aside, it's time to get some food to eat! POOOF!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: You must be really bored aren't you? Pooooofff!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Arrgh...didn't hear a thing...didn't hear a thing...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Sometime butterflies do have our OFF day!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You sure you are not lying?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: That's so sweet! I LOVE YOU TOO! Pooooooof!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Thanks thanks! I love you too! Poooooof!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I guess I am starting to fall in love with you too! Pooooof!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I like you very very much! Poooof!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: That came as a surprise! I am experiencing butterflies in my stomach now!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Catch this cupid's arrow from me to you! Pooooof!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: My heart will go on and on for you, pooooof!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: ORLY? I LOVE YOU TOO! Pooooof!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: You don't really see a butterfly blush don't you? I am blushing now!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Quit playing games with my heart! Poooof!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: You gotta lay off those gummi bears!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Don't say you love me, you don't even know me! clickkk clickkk!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Time to grab some bites! Poooof!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Time to sleep in my cosy leaf bed! Will you hug me to sleep tonight?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Hold me tight in your arms! Clickkk Clickkk!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Don't let the bed bugs bite! Hehe!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Let's go for some late night! I am not sleepy!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Sing me a lullaby and I will go to my wonderland!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Let me dance with the moon and stars tonight!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I can't sleep cause I am dreaming of something...

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Let the power of the butterflies transform!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Time to transform into a Monster Moth!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Can't just do it all the time, you know.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I can't just do it anywhere.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Too much only spoils the fun.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: Let's just sit and relax, shall we?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I have to stop eating now! Arghhh!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: You're really good at it aren't you?

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm too full to eat anymore!

string.name: s2
string.value: Why are you aking me to say that kind of words? Clickkk clickkkkk~

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: My gams could use a break.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Just gonna get my haunches down here... Ahhh...

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: What do I look like? A wombat?!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: That's not easy with a tail like mine.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Lemme take a little load off here.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: My legs are all cramped up!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Let's go on a walkabout instead!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Let's make up and get ourselves a sanger.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I'll try not to be such a dag.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Was I causing too much trouble?

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm not trying to offend you...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Say that when my gloves are on...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Don't think too bad of me!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I don't appreciate that kinda talk.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'll just head back to the wild then...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Aww, I didn't mean anything by it!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You're too strict, but I understand.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Can we just be mates again?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You don't have to be so mad!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Let's just take a minute to cool off.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Mind giving us a turnaround, mate?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Can we get a little brekkie first?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You're just trying to get me in trouble.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: What kinda galah do you think I am?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: There's nothing moving in my britches.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm gonna need a little more fiber.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I've been needin' that, I tell ya.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You must really get a kick out of my backside.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I don't mean to whinge, but no!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Easy way to make a quid.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'd love to take a camping trip.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: How high do you think I can hop?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: How do you feel about koala bears?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: That's just gonna get us fightin'.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: You're just gonna let me loose in the paddock?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Lucky for you, I duxed English!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Sometimes I like to do a little hop, sometimes I like to make it big.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Don't you think you'd be faster if you hopped?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: This joey's got better things to do.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I used to know a bushranger who could talk all day.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I sure miss my mum's pouch. It was so warm.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'm gonna be a big old boomer one day.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Lemme tell you about the time I boxed this fella...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Maybe you should call one of your mates.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why don't we go bail up some monsters instead?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm not in to bodgy talk.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Don't tell anybody about this, mate.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm gobsmacked to get this kind of attention.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Okay, but just to get warm.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Don't think that's the best idea.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I hate to knock your thinking, but...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: All right! I was startin' to think you were a conch!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: We're not within a cooee of that happening.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I think we need to know each other a little better.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Thank goodness, you've been running me ragged.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I could use a little kanga-nap.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Just point me at the matilda.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Let's go catch a flick instead.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: It's the middle of the afternoon... somewhere!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Thanks heaps. I was getting tired.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Just a little bit of shut-eye here...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Don't put anything in my gloves while I'm asleep.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: This seems like a terrible plan.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Can't you find a nice human?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I'll give it a fair go.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: I hate to turn down my mates.

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: That sounds pretty nice, I suppose.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What did I do to deserve this?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Ha! You're such a dag sometimes.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: A dinkum roo like me doesn't do love!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: You're one of the good ones.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I think you're pretty all right.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Let's just take it nice and slow, all right?

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: Can I chuck a sickie on this one, boss?

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: I'm just gonna throw this out there.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: You want the wrecking balls? You got 'em!

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: This is how we do it in the outback!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: I just got my gloves off!

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: And here I thought you were a wowser!

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: I'm gonna give you the good stuff!

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: Is there a copper I can call?

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Seems like a bad plan to me.

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: I need brekkies before I do anything.

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: Why? I don't see anything on the ground.

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: I could do this all day!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I'll put that one on my schedule.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: I don't want everybody to think I'm a show pony.

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: You really know how to barrack up a bloke.

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: That's good to hear from a mate.

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I mean, I LIKE you, but...

string.name: c37_s1
string.value: Well I don't want to big-note myself, but...

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: Yep, the best looking roo this side of... Anywhere!

string.name: c37_s3
string.value: Mum always thought I was a looker.

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: I don't like where this is going.

string.name: c37_f2
string.value: No. Just not going to happen, mate.

string.name: c37_f3
string.value: That's a ripper of a joke!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'm getting a little chunk around the tail.

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: How did you know my legs hurt?

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: Let me know the last time you've seen a reindeer sit.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: Me? Sit here? I'm going to get dirty, then.

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: I can only sit on top of a clean field of snow, you know.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Oh, this is a perfect place to sit!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm going to sit back, relax and enjoy the show.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: So then, you were all like "Sit" and I did it. w00t!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I'm really tired. I think it's a perfect time to sit.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Did you just order me to do something?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I am a revered pet. Don't like it? Get a dog.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I am not like other pets. I sit when I want to!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: My knees are creaking from all that walking. A non-running reindeer is toast!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Good, I felt like sitting down.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: No way! Not on the bare ground!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Hey, I'm the most revered pet in Happyville. Treat me with respect!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: How dare you give me commands.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Thanks. Finally time for some rest.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm soooo tired, I feel like falling asleep.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ahhhh, it's been a loooong day.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Okay, now that I'm sitting down, you got something to tell me?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I don't understand why you'd want me to sit all of a sudden...

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I am not tired, thank you very much.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: What did I do wrong? Why are you so mad at me...

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: I'm the most revered pet in Happyville. Don't yell at me!

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Take a look at yourself in the mirror first.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Why do you keep picking on me...?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong... sniff sniff...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm going to tell Santa what you're doing to me...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Why are you yelling at me? I don't understand what I did wrong.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: This is how you treat me all the time. I don't buy it.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I don't have a problem. I think it's you with a problem.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: What did I do wrong? Tell me... sniff sniff...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You don't need to raise your voice to get your message across... sniff sniff..

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Don't yell at me... you're scaring me...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong. I swear.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: What do you think you're doing yelling at me?

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'm going back to Santa's house... sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Why do you keep picking on me... sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'm the most revered pet in Happyville... why...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Stop talking to me in gibberish!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: What in the world are you saying...?

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: So, wanna hear about the time I gave Santa a noogie?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're trying to do...

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: Since when did I do stuff like that?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: So, wanna hear about the time I gave Santa a hug?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: What are you going to do? You can't stop me!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Don't do anything stupid here. You're embarassing me.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: So, wanna hear about the time I left Santa a present?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I don't feel like doing that.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: No, it adds wrinkles to my face.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: This one time, at reindeer camp, I ate a cookie.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Meh. That guy needs a new haircut.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Ugh. Tell her to get her hair done!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Since when did I do juvenile things like this?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Your desperate attempts for my attention is not working.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: You'll see the REAL me now... ahhh!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: I don't feel like doing anything right now.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Um.. I don't know how to do that.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I'm too tired to do this right now.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Yes yes, I am good at this.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Look closely. This is a momentous occasion, you know.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: What do you want me to do??

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: More than meets the--Oops. Can't say that!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I feel something holy going around here.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Allow me to show you who I really am. Tada!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm too young to do that just yet.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'm too tired to do it. Seriously.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I don't feel like doing anything right now. I'll do it later.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I look awesome right now. I don't need to do that.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Time for me to dust off my go-to move.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Don't you wish you could do this?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Allow me to show you why I'm the most revered pet in Happyville.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I have no idea what you want me to do.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I am a revered pet from Happyville. I do not take any orders from anyone.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Um... excuse me? What did you just say?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I am too hot. Seriously, way too hot.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Don't touch me. I'm not in a mood.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Now that makes me feel great today!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: La la la what a wonderful day!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I think you're the only one feeling good today.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: What makes you feel so good there?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Just thinking about that makes my day.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I hope you have a great day today!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Are you going out with someone?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I had a sweet dream, you know?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Of course I'm happy. I'm with you!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I feel so blessed right now.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Did you do well on the exam? No way.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: With me, you'll never get bored!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I am so happy to hear that!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Don't just say it. Show me!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I don't just love anybody, you know.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I think we're a match made in heaven.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Just look at me. Nobody else, okay?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Keep saying that. I like hearing that.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: You can't just say that. You'll have to show me you love me.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'm sorry, but I have someone else in mind.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I understand that you love me, but I don't think it's time.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Hey, you are already seeing someone anyway!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I will love you til the end of the road.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I am way too popular for my own good.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: What makes you think you're worthy of my love?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: What did you just say? Whoa...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Are you trying to tell me you love me??

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Do you want to hear a story about the Snow Queen? Once upon a time...

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Do you want to hear more? Okay here we go...

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: You like my stories? I ever tell you about the Snow Queen?

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: For some strange reason, I feel at home in El Nath...

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: What exactly do you want me to say?

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I'm too thirsty to say anything right now.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I don't want to talk to humans.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Once upon a time, in a snow castle far, far away...

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Okay so do you want to know where I came from? I'm from the west.

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Passion, vigor, and pride! That's the reindeer way!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: This year, Santa said I could take the holidays off, so here I am!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Today's not the best day to chat.

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I am hungry, and I am tired. Let's talk next time.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I don't feel like saying anything.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: My crystal form is a lot like the Glimmer Man's.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Are you ready for an all-night chat fest?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: You know, I have some funny stories you'll love to hear.

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Okay, then here's a story about the snow castle I used to live in. Way back in the day...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I am the most revered pet in Happyville. I only talk when I feel like talking.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What do you want me to say?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Uh.... What? I don't understand your moonspeak.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Ahh... time to go to bed.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Why do you keep asking me to fall asleep...?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping yet.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: No, I do not feel like it.

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: No, I feel like playing some more.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I'm so hungry, I can't sleep yet.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping right now.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Hmmm... this pillow is so comfortable.

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: I ... am ... so ... tired ... I ... must ... sleep ...

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Thanks. Time for me to go to bed.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: Hey, it's not bed time yet!!

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: A revered pet like me shouldn't waste time sleeping.

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: It's beautiful outside. Why should I sleep right now?

string.value: This is really gross. Don't you have any Snowflakes? Or pie?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Why do you keep giving me stuff like this?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is better than anything I've had in a while.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I am really, really hungry. This doesn't cut it.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Bleh. Are you trying to kill me?

string.value: I soft, so I comfy anywhere.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I sit now. You sing me song!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'm sleepy, but I can't sleep...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You no play with me no more?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are my favorite! Love you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You just as cute as me! Love you!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: You want love? I want ribs!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: La la la, can't hear you!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Stop it, stop it, stop it!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Boing boing! Hee hee, keep up!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Wanna sleep next to you! Zzz...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No time for sleep! Exercise! Get strong!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Talk about ribs? I wanna rib. Mmm...rib.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You get nice thingies for me?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I like beef. Pork okay, too.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I have many interests. Like knitting.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I like talkies with you! You funny!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I born with big eyes. Sparkly!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Am I fat? Be honest. I take it.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I endangered creature. Take care of me!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Boing! I do lots of things!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I know how to rock, too!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Can't hear you, can't hear you!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Look at me! LOOK AT MEEEEEE!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Gonna be rock star! Have world tour!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I have no idea what you talk about.

string.value: No tricks. I am quiet and gentle pet.

string.value: Buh? What if I get fat?

string.value: No more eat! Exercise! Bouncy bouncy!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Waahh! I don't want it! I don't!

string.value: Buh?! I remember this! You watch out!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm tired of getting stuck to the ground.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I'm not sitting because I want to.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: No... Why do I need to listen to you?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I am not sitting because you told me to!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I did what you asked. You should pet me.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Fine, but you better be thankful!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I am not doing this for you!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Nope. Not doing it. Ask your other pets.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: How would it benefit me to listen to you?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Sit? I haven't sat since I was three.

string.value: Don't tell me to sit! You sit!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I am not doing this to win favors from you!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I sit because I want to.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I'm only sitting because my legs hurt.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: You should know me by now!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Stop playing with me! I'm mad!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: You think I'm gonna listen? You need to think again!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Why? Cause I tell it like it is?!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I didn't think you had the guts...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: You don't have to get all huffy at me!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: This is making me SO grumpy!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: See how my needles are standing? That means BACK OFF!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Do I seriously have to listen to this?!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Hey, relax! I was just joshing around!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You're in a mood today, huh?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I hate you! You have pierced my heart!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You aren't talking to me, are you? Think it over!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Stop being so mean! Remember all that fun we had?

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'm not crying! It's just raining on my face.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Stop being so mean! I didn't mean to make you mad...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: What is leaking from my face?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You're gonna get stuck if you don't stop!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Oh yeah?! Maybe I'll just stop eating!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Sticks and stones may break my bones, but your face is going I'm going to backflip into your face!

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: I like it when that vein pops out on your forehead.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Can you make your face all red again?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: I don't want to show you!

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: You must enjoy me making fun of you?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Even my tongue is cute... Want to see?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I love seeing you mad! You know that?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Cry! Cry! Cry! You mad? Go cry some more!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Your little games are not fitting for an awesome Hedgehog like me!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I like it when you're bummed out. It's fun for me!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: You should be kissing my spiky butt!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: What? You like my personality? Me too.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I want to see you mad. That vein on your head is hilarious!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: What do you think? Am I cute?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Go get mad! I'm not mad... You mad?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Keep making me do this, and you're gonna be a pincushion!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You thought I was mad? You are such a newb.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Stop talking to me, I'm concentrating.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Why are you staring at me?!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: You go first! I will follow.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I had a LOT of cheese last night.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Cool, keep a look out. I'm gonna wreck shop.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I am not going because you tell me to!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Ahhhh... I feel a thousand pounds lighter.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Eat, sleep... you know the rest.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You want to see me push?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Prepare the paper towels and baggies!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: It's gonna be spiky! I can feel it!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: You're gonna need some good gloves for this one.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Here we go, the great flood cometh.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: What are you making me do? You keep making me mad!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I haven't eaten anything. Nothing comes out!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I will go when I want to! That's how I roll!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Nah, it'll be all sad. Let me save up for a good one.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I am not talking to you because I like you.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: My needles are sharp and pointy. Thank you for the hug.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: You gotta be tough, like me!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: How do you understand what I'm saying?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I don't wanna talk right now! I'm in a bad mood!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why do you make me mad?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: You're not the boss of me! Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I will talk to you. But I won't be faithful to you!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: We have been together a while now. When are we going to form a guild?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I think we can party up for a while.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I like how we're friends, but stop using me to scratch your back.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Ready for a show? I'll show you my ultimate move: ROLLING THUNDER NEEDLE!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Why do you continue to test me?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You go first. Try speaking Hedgehog!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I thank you. You are too kind.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Your thoughts and mine are the same!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Don't expect no love from me!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I am sorry, but ain't nobody have time for that!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I am not mad. You are mad.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: My heart only has space for you!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Why am I mad? I am mad for you!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Wait... I can't be falling for you! But why am I?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I will be nicer to you.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Take that love to the Jr. Reapers!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: You say you like me, but your heart is elsewhere.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: You love me? Go ahead and give me a hug!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: You're less of a newb than I thought.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: You wanna go on some raids with me?

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Okay, let's give this thing a shot.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I will only be mad a little from now on.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I was going to call you master but... Nah, forget it.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I am mad, mad, mad! You stay out of my way!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Be quiet, I am trying to sleep!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: How can I sleep when I am not sleepy?

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: I'm sorry, but I'm going to pass out.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: We have been with each other too long. Even our sleep patterns match!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I'm tired from watching you be mad all day.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Wow, you made me a bed?!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I don't want to sleep! Don't make me!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You don't sleep? I don't sleep.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: It's hard to sleep with all these needles poking me.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Hey feed me first. I can't sleep hungry.

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: I'm already jungling in my dreams.

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I wanted to play some more, but okay.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: You'd better not mess with my spines while I'm asleep.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Stop telling me what to do!

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: Why don't you go to sleep first. I'll go out hunting!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm not mad. I am full.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I'm not eating because I want to. I swear.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I could use a little variety in my diet...

string.name: s3
string.value: You know I get mad right? Keep your trap shut!

string.name: s4
string.value: I guess we can be homies.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'd sit if this were a rose field.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I'm a free fox! I sit for no one!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I hate this dusty ground. Gimme sand!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I was hoping we'd get to do that soon.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm pretty when I sit, huh?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: This place is cooler than my star.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I didn't mean to upset you.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Whatever, I'm going back to my star!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're so mean all the time!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Did you just raise your hand?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You're not a friend! You're a bully!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I'm the savage beast of the desert!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I might cry if you yell...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: What the? This wouldn't be allowed on my star...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Are you actually scolding me right now?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I have a LOT of friends who like me!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You're a one of a kind person!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you today. I'll like you more tomorrow.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Give me some Star Candies, and we'll talk!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Am I prettier than a rose?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You don't know how to play!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I've been waiting so long for you to say that!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Are we going to stay together? Forever?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: My face is gonna get red! Wanna see?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I could use a little space.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Let's pretend we didn't have this talk.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'm a free-spirited fox! Don't try to chain me!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Okay, but you have to clean it up!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I'll really pour myself into this one!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I could do this all day!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I only do that for ME!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I don't know why you want that, but you got it!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Arooo! My face is all red now!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I don't think I'll ever stop!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'll poop when I wanna poop!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: You're going to get us in trouble!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Leave my light on! I'm scared of the dark.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm independent! I take naps on my own time!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Going to sleep already? You're lazy!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Ah, my soft and cozy tail.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I'm going to dream up a storm!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Sorry, I can't hear you, I'm having fun right now!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Sleeping out in the open is romantic, but not now.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I want to enjoy the day! Aroo!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Arooo... I miss the prince and rose... zzz

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Sleeping in the desert is SO romantic!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Bring me a blanket and pillow or no deal!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Why aren't we out hunting? That's way more fun!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Aroo! I want to go to the desert of freedom!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I used to travel with a wonderful prince!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I love Star Candy so much!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: What are we talking about? I'm a fox!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Arooo! Did you want to hear something?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: A fox has to keep some secrets!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Wanna go watch the shooting star?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: The star that the prince and I went to was much better.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Aren't you curious about the meteor I was on?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Eating star candy can make you feel better!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: We foxes are known for our quietness.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I can't believe they have more like me at a ZOO!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: There are so many people on this star!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I get my fur trimmed on a daily basis.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You should learn to entertain yourself!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You should play some music first!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I want to be in a concert!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't know what that means.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Aroo! I wanna do something else!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Up and down my head goes!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: The prince taught me how to do that!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: That dance is super popular on asteroid B-612!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: We've got all day tomorrow too!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: It's good to be a fox of the desert!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: I was JUST thinking about these!

string.name: s2
string.value: Do not want! Let's see it again!

string.value: That word is SO not romantic!

string.name: s4
string.value: You say bad things! Earth really is a gloomy place!

string.value: This is my one favor for the day,

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Look at what I can do!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I suppose I could make the effort.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Sitting my koala behind dowwwn on the grouund.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I didn't mean to make you mad!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You're supposed to love me no matter what!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: How can you do this to me?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Just because I'm smaller that you.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm going to call those crazy animal people on you.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Just let me stare into space, okay?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I have a busy schedule of doing nothing all day.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I come from a land far, far away.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: The koala bear loves to go to sleep, go to sleep, go to sleep.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Koala wala, bo bala. Fee fie foe fala. KOALA!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: My favorite trees are eucalyptus trees.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: My schedule of doing nothing keeps me busy all day.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hug me! Hug me! Hug me! Let me sleep on you!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: My favorite part of a conversation is the pauses between words.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I think I'm just about the cutest thing ever.

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: I was going to do that anyway.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: How about a snack while I'm sitting here?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Sit, stand, sit, stand. I ain't a circus elephant.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Give me one good reason why.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: *chews on a leaf and ignores you*

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: You look in a mirror lately?

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Well, if the pot ain't calling the kettle black...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You got something to say, you say it to my face.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You're the one who raised me...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Be very careful what you do next...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Treat me better and maybe stuff like this wouldn't happen.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You wanna run that by me again?

string.value: I've made a note of that.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Back at ya, but don't tell anyone.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Do I look like a sucker?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: All right, but keep it on the down low, okay?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Well, shucks, I love ya, too.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I guess things could be worse.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Clean up after me, will ya?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I can't just do it, you know.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I need more fiber in my diet.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Whew, that was a big one.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Ouch, I think I sprained something.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Been holding that one in for weeks.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Talk louder. I can't hear you!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Shut the window, will ya? Don't wanna catch a cold while I nap.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Don't tell me what to do, kid.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Only because I feel like it.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I'll sleep when I wanna sleep, not when you tell me to.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Do you see me giving YOU commands?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Guess I could catch a few Z's.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I was going to do that anyway.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Let me just put these dentures away.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You ain't the boss of me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Don't speak until you're spoken to!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: WHAT DID YOU SAY?! Gotta turn up my hearing aid.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Everybody's got an opinion these days.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: When I was your age, I beat up monsters with my bare hands... Uphill! Both ways!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Wanna hear a secret? BE QUIET.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: The world just ain't what it used to be.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: What I wouldn't do for a nice, long back rub.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Candy should be illegal. That'll teach them kids to steal my slippers.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Whatever you're selling, I ain't buying.

string.value: My bones ache. Got any painkillers?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Darn kids keep trampling my lawn.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: What do you mean 'old man'? I'm only two!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: You wanna talk? Get yourself a parrot!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: What I wouldn't do for a moment's peace and quiet.

string.value: Stop trying to shove food down my throat.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Let's not and say we did!

string.value: But I'm not wearing my Pants of Sitting!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: What are the rewards for completing this quest?

string.value: But I just wanted to play!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I can be fixed, I promise!

string.value: Can I restart from the last checkpoint?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: How many lives do I have left?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm more powerful than you realize...

string.value: I missed that. Can you repeat?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Let's not and say we did!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Let's not and say we did!

string.value: Do koalas dream of electric eucalyptus leaves?

string.value: I always have my favorite dice in my pocket.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: All of my Monster Life critters are level 9999.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: My favorite show is Game of Ornate Kingly Chairs

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I wish I had an HP Bar over my head.

string.value: Life would be better if I lived in a video game.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Why don't people like pocket protectors? They're extremely useful!

string.value: Yes, of course I'm from the secret koala level.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: My alter ego is a superhero who can fly and time travel.

string.value: On the weekends, I cover my fur in gold glitter and roleplay as an elven ruler.

string.value: I'm building an android koala army to combat the pending zombie apocalypse.

string.value: I dust my action figure collection twice a day.

string.value: Want to read the first draft of my epic fantasy novel?

string.value: I sat like you told me to!

string.value: You should give me a complement for this sit.

string.value: Can't I just stay like this?

string.value: You go ahead and just stay put master.

string.value: I want to walk a bit more.

string.value: I want things that are easy to do.

string.value: Why don't we sit together, master?

string.value: Stand, sit, it's all the same...

string.value: I want to always be by your side.

string.value: It would be so much on your big, cushiony leg.

string.value: I can't. Why? I don't know...

string.value: This is boring. Let's try something harder!

string.value: I will sit when you sit!

string.value: There are times when I want to try other things.

string.value: You should be setting an example for me.

string.value: Okay, I will think on it. Now feed me.

string.value: Stop looking at me with that scary face... You'll make me sad.

string.value: There's been a misunderstanding, I'm telling you!

string.value: I am so nice... You've hurt me.

string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I hope no one notices I'm here... Eep!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Ahh, nice. Maybe it's time for a nap.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I want to sit... But I need exercise!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: La la la... I don't hear you...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: This place is filthy... I can't be here...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: With legs as short as mine, it doesn't matter!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Do you know what it's like to sit on a cloud?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Whew. I guess I am a little tired.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Ugh, my belly becomes really noticeable when I sit...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I guess I could do that... THIS time.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: We don't have time for this!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: I don't want to be punished.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Huh? What are you even saying?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I think I'm going to cry!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong. YOU'RE bad!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't take it out on me!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: What is it? I feel lost... I'm scared...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm full of tears! And they're coming out!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm gonna hang out at the Free Market.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Sometimes I wonder...is all this really worth it?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Now that you mention it, I love you too!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Well, um...I kinda I love you too!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Tee hee... You're making me blush!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Do you mean it? Are you sure?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Do you treat all your pets like this?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Don't you think you're going too far?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I need to get myself ready.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: *Grunt* It feels like my face is burning.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I can't, okay? I just can't! Leave me alone!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Doot de doo, I can't hear you...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I don't even have a blanket...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: The ground is so cold and hard...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: No! I want to play more!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: No! I have lots of energy!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I just love to play the harp!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I want to play outside with you!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I'd like to be alone now.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Don't ever forget about me, okay?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My brain is just so full of...stuff!

string.value: Have you heard of the witch under the sea?

string.value: My brain is just so full of...stuff!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Have you heard of the witch under the sea?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: But I don't have anything to say...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: A, B, C, D, E, F, G!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I got a good feeling about today!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'm just happy be to with you.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Did you do your good deed for the day?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Are there more angels like me?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: It's so delicious that it brings me to tears...

string.name: s1
string.value: Do you want to become a demon?

string.name: s2
string.value: You must not say something as foul as that.

string.name: s4
string.value: Why would you say something like that?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I hope no one notices I'm here... Eep!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Ahh, nice. Maybe it's time for a nap.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I want to sit... But I need exercise!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: La la la... I don't hear you...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: This place is filthy... I can't be here...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: With legs as short as mine, it doesn't matter!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Do you know what it's like to sit on a cloud?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Whew. I guess I am a little tired.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Ugh, my belly becomes really noticeable when I sit...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I guess I could do that... THIS time.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: We don't have time for this!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: I don't want to be punished.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Huh? What are you even saying?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I think I'm going to cry!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong. YOU'RE bad!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't take it out on me!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: What is it? I feel lost... I'm scared...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm full of tears! And they're coming out!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm gonna hang out at the Free Market.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Sometimes I wonder...is all this really worth it?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Now that you mention it, I love you too!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Well, um...I kinda I love you too!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Tee hee... You're making me blush!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Do you mean it? Are you sure?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Do you treat all your pets like this?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Don't you think you're going too far?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I need to get myself ready.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: *Grunt* It feels like my face is burning.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I can't, okay? I just can't! Leave me alone!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Doot de doo, I can't hear you...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I don't even have a blanket...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: The ground is so cold and hard...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: No! I want to play more!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: No! I have lots of energy!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I just love to play the harp!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I want to play outside with you!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I'd like to be alone now.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Don't ever forget about me, okay?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My brain is just so full of...stuff!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Have you heard of the witch under the sea?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: But I don't have anything to say...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: A, B, C, D, E, F, G!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I got a good feeling about today!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'm just happy be to with you.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Did you do your good deed for the day?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Are there more angels like me?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: It's so delicious that it brings me to tears...

string.name: s1
string.value: Do you want to become a demon?

string.name: s2
string.value: You must not say something as foul as that.

string.name: s4
string.value: Why would you say something like that?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Give me one good reason why!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Perfect timing! I was getting a little tired.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I didn't mean to make you mad!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I was wrong! I was wrong!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'll be more careful from now on!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Are you going to leave me?!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: If I'm misbehaving, it's your fault.

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: Is it is because I'm cute?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: But I'm stuck in a robot dog body!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: You've made me the happiest Roo-bot alive!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I love you, too! I do! I do!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I don't think you mean it.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You're my reason for living, master!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Being with you makes life worthwhile!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I wish I felt the same way...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'd like to be alone, please.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Do you even have a pooper scrooper?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I don't need to go right now!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I don't want to cause pollution!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: How about a snack while I poop?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Master! Master! I want you to watch!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Why do you always want me to poop?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Sleep, sit, poop. That's all I ever get to do.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I want to play with you!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Am I cute while I sleep?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You always make me sleep! Hmph!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'm cute when I sleep, huh?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Buy me a cozy bed first!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: There were lots and lots of other Roo-bots back in the lab.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Gelimer wasn't mean, but he wasn't nice, either. I like you better!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Tell me I'm cute! Tell me you'll take care of me!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I was human once, but this robot body is cuter!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I miss the other Roo-bots from the lab. I hope they're okay.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Before Gelimer made me a Roo-bot, I think I lived by the sea.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Whoa! The world is full of monsters!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Do you think anybody would miss me if I disappeared?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: What makes you think I have anything worth saying?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Let me just think of something to say...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: You'll use the Water of Life on me if anything happens, right?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Sometimes, I think I kind of miss Gelimer... How weird!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Wanna know a secret? You're my favorite!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I'm not REALLY a dog, you know. I don't talk on command.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: *Pretends not to hear, because it's funny! Hehe!*

string.name: f1_f
string.value: You plan to fatten me up so you can eat me, huh?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I can do anything on a full tummy!

string.name: s1
string.value: You want me to say what?!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Okay, but you have to keep me safe.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Be on lookout behind me, just in case.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I guess I could take a break.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Do you have anything to eat while I sit here?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I'd rather stand, so I can run if a monster appears.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: What if the ground hurts me?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I'm counting on you to keep the ground from attacking me!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: My tail keeps me warm and cozy.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I need to lie down, not sit.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: You just want to hurt me!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Why?! What're you going to do to me?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Will you be nice to me if I sit?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I'm awfully tired from being on high alert all the time.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Are you trying to hurt me?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: It was my fault! Please stop hitting me!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'll be better! Don't hurt me!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Why are you treating me this way?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I thought you cared about me!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I'm going to tell on you!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You're so mean! I miss Gelimer!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: There's got to be someone I can call!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I think... I think that makes me happy!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I know you d-don't mean it.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I'm so glad I met you!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I love you so, so, so much!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I could do this all day.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I've been holding that in for a long time.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Promise that it won't hurt me!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: What if it bites me on the way out?!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I only do that once a day...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Keep me safe while I rest.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: What if I have bad dreams?

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: My tail will keep me safe. Right?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Don't leave me alone while I sleep, okay?

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Put your hand on my back while I sleep so I know you're near.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: You go first. I'll do it after...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: What if something sneaks up on me?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: No! Don't ask me to do that!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Stay with me while I sleep, okay?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: One Red Snail... two Red Snails...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Can you make me a comfy quilt next time?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: There are monsters in the closet!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: But I'm not sleepy! I'm not!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: That mean scientist performed all sorts of experiments on me. *cry*

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I hate thinking about the past. I hate it!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: The outside world is scary, but the lab was even worse.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I hate science! I hate it so much!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: You won't get anything out of me!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I won't tell you! I won't!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I think I was brave before Gelimer came along.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I wish I weren't so timid, but everything scares me. Except you.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm so worried that one day I'll turn into a doll.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sometimes I wish I could fly, but it's too scary.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Are you going to hurt me?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't like to talk about my past.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I've always wanted to taste the Water of Life, but I'm too scared.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Sometimes I think I should wear a disguise so no one can find me.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: It's not safe to have friends. You're the only one I trust.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If it weren't for you, master, I think I'd be completely alone.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Are you going to hurt me?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Go away! I don't want to talk!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Aah! I thought I heard Gelimer's voice!

string.name: s3
string.value: I won't say anything bad, I won't!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I sat. Now where's my reward?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Why should I listen to you?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Ahh, I love how soft my tail is.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I suppose I could rest my feet for a minute.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I don't like it here. Let's jet.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's dirty here. Let me sit in your lap.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: There's a nice spot next to me with your name on it.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Do you expect me to do everything you say?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Come on! Let's do something else!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I am in no mood to sit.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Fine. Punish me. I LIKE it.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I guess I might've deserved that...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: It's not like I meant to do anything wrong.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm sorry. You'll forgive me, right?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: My bad, my bad. Get over it.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why are you taking your repressed emotions out on me?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: What're you gonna do, throw me in a rubbish bin?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I thought you were better than that.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I admit it, I messed up.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I might behave better if you FED ME MORE.

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: You must want something from me...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I suppose I can buy that.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: We haven't reached that stage in our relationship.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You did NOT just say that.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I kinda liked hearing you say that.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Say that again while scratching my ears.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: You're cute. Not in a good way.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Don't say stuff like that before I eat!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Gotta admit, my favorite time of day is when I'm with you.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Glad you recognize quality when you see it.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Is this really the right time for that?

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Pick it up, buddy of mine!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: No peeking! Well, a little bit is okay.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: I thought you were more dignified than that.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I don't need you to tell me when to poop.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: You don't even have a bag to pick it up!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Consider that a favor. Now you owe me.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I want you to breathe it in. Savor it.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Would you like it if I told YOU when to poop?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Maybe if you fed me more...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I'm holding it in, out of spite.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Feed me and I'll think about it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: The ground is covered with ants!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'm embarrassed to be seen with you.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I'm pretty sleepy... How'd you know?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Do I look sleepy to you?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Maybe if I had a full tummy...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm fine as I am, thank you.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: How'd you know I was tired?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I suppose I could close my eyes...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: My tail is the perfect blanket.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Let's see how long I can stay... *snore*

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: There's space next to me if you wanna cuddle. Just saying.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Don't sit on me while I sleep!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Despite these dark circles under my eyes, I am NOT sleepy. *yawn*

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: We have too much to do!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Can't sleep. Miss my mom too... Nevermind.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: If I ever see Gelimer again, I'll show him what for!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: You have no idea who I really am. Noooo idea.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: My favorite time of day is mealtime!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I've always dreamed of riding an airship...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Shoo, go over there and play.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Gelimer thinks he wiped out my memories, but I remember my mother.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I miss my life before I was a Roo-bot. Not that I don't enjoy being with you...

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: People think they can walk all over me because I'm in a dog's body.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I won't let anyone stop me from doing what I want to do!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Isn't there anyone else you can talk to?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I've got nothing to say right now.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Strangers always touch my tail without asking. I should do it back.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I know I come off kinda mean, but I really just want a friend...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: My mother had the kindest eyes. And she used to sing me to sleep.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: My most secret dream is to find my mother again, but that's impossible.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: What crazy scheme are you up to?

string.name: s1
string.value: You want me to say what?

string.name: s2
string.value: Are you trying to get me in trouble?

string.name: s3
string.value: Come on, we're better than that!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Why not sit next to me?

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: So what? Lie down next to me. Grr...

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I want to do something else...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Well, it's not a good day for that.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I hate to stay still and do nothing!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You must already know that I love to sit down!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Would you like to sit with me?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: We should take a little break, yeah?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I wanna see more of this!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'll sit right here next to you!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I think it's the perfect time to rest!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I can do it with my eyes closed!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ookyu? I don't like being ordered around!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I don't want to do it!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'm sorry! I won't eat dinner tonight...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I made a little mistake! Just a little one! Calm down!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: What? How dare you try to punish me?!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'm sorry. I take it all back.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Why are you mad at me?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Come on, it's not a big deal. Just let it go.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: You love just me, right? Just me!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Not just anyone can earn my love!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Then why don't you treat me like it?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I feel like the happiest creature on earth!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I love you too! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Absolutely! I totally feel the same way.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I said, I can't hear you!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You love me? How about a hug?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I'll do my best to stick with you.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Stay with me until the very end of the world!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: You're just as charming as me!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're as warm-hearted as I thought.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Argh! Why are you doing this to me? I told you I HATE it!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: We are of different classes. I am sorry.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I can be gone in an instant!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Who do you think I am?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Do you want to be arrested?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: You go first! I will follow.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You into that sort of thing?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: This is shameful! You'll be hearing from my Harp Lawyers!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Why are you laughing at me!?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I can't just poop all day, you know?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I don't want to poop now.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I'm going to bed now, so don't disturb me.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I don't wanna! You can't make me!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: No! I wanna play some more!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: See you in my dreams, mate!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Have a good night's sleep... Zzz...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I don't want to sleep yet.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I'll sleep when I get sleepy, okies?

string.value: Gotta chase my tail! Gotta chase my tail!

string.value: I'd like to relax on the Relaxer.

string.value: You want to talk? Then feed me!

string.value: What kind of place is the Free Market? Why is it always crowded?

string.value: I want to play some games!

string.value: I've heard people talking about dragons in Leafre...

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: The weather is great today, isn't it?

string.value: What's going on between Scuba Pepe and Ducky?

string.value: I hear that the Ludibrium Hair Salon is the place to be!

string.value: I want to visit the Aquarium Zoo!

string.value: I want to do something exciting!

string.value: This is as good as it gets!

string.value: I am quite full! Please, no more!

string.value: Don't do that! You're creeping me out!

string.value: How could you do this to me?!

string.value: Why do you ask me to say all those strange things?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I hope no one notices I'm here... Eep!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I am fully aware that I have short legs...

string.value: I want to sit... But I need exercise!

string.value: I just don't want to do it anymore...

string.value: With legs as short as mine, it doesn't matter!

string.value: Not really... I'm not doing this for you!

string.value: Ugh, my belly becomes really noticeable when I sit...

string.value: I guess I could do that... THIS time.

string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Don't take it out on me!

string.value: I'm gonna hang out at the Free Market.

string.value: Tee hee... You're making me blush!

string.value: Ha ha ha... What can I say?

string.value: I already know how you feel...

string.value: Not here! I'll die of shame!

string.value: What is it? I feel lost... I'm scared...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm full of tears! And they're coming out!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm gonna hang out at the Free Market.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Sometimes I wonder...is all this really worth it?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Now that you mention it, I love you too!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Well, um...I kinda I love you too!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Tee hee... You're making me blush!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Do you mean it? Are you sure?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Do you treat all your pets like this?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Don't you think you're going too far?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I need to get myself ready.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: *Grunt* It feels like my face is burning.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I can't, okay? I just can't! Leave me alone!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Doot de doo, I can't hear you...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I don't even have a blanket...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: The ground is so cold and hard...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: No! I want to play more!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: No! I have lots of energy!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I just love to play the harp!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I want to play outside with you!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I'd like to be alone now.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Don't ever forget about me, okay?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My brain is just so full of...stuff!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Have you heard of the witch under the sea?
