string.name: c20_f3
string.value: But I don't have anything to say...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: A, B, C, D, E, F, G!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I got a good feeling about today!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'm just happy be to with you.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Did you do your good deed for the day?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Are there more angels like me?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: It's so delicious that it brings me to tears...

string.name: s1
string.value: Do you want to become a demon?

string.name: s2
string.value: You must not say something as foul as that.

string.name: s4
string.value: Why would you say something like that?

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Sitting down makes me feel comfortable.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Why don't you sit with me here? Resting is a necessity. You'll see...

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: I shall rest my wings now, so I can fly farther tomorrow.

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: I do not wish to sit.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Alright, I shall sit. What will you do for me in return?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: You're much quicker than I thought.I'm impressed.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It is comfortable sitting down. I shall rest for now.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I do not wish to sit. Do you want me to explain why?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: The situation does not call for sitting.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I suggest you sit. Demanding never works.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No. I do not feel fatigued.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Come to think of it, I feel fatigued...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Yes, I shall save up some energy whenever I can.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'm in the middle of an exercise. Demanding never yields good results.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Be honest. YOU are the one that desires to sit, right?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Why should I sit on this filth?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Why should I? Give me a valid reason why I shall sit.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'm sorry. Please accept my apology.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I have been reprimanded by a human being! What a disgrace!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You're the one that commited the mistake! Krarr!

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Oh, I made a mistake. My apologies.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: I sincerely apologize for the mishap.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Krarr!!! What are you, a preacher?

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Cut this nonsense and get out of my face.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I am really sorry. Please forgive me.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I made a mistake, and I am big enough to admit it. I am sorry.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Oh no, I feel terrible now. I am really, really sorry.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Your words mean nothing to me.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you sure you know who's at fault here?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Tell me you did not mean it.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Wow, I need a tissue for this.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I do not appreciate you looking down on me like that.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Did your mother teach you to say such a thing?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I...do not know what to say.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I will try to be better next time.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You are in need of a tic-tac sandwich. Like, now.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Is the fool one who leads or one who follows?

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: It pains me to hear it from you.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: I still believe you are a decent person.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Do you have a vendetta against me?

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Why should I be subject to this gross misconception?

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: How would you feel if I called you that?

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Look, please don't call me that. I'm already seen with you.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Cough cough... this is embarassing. I am pooping in public.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: What a relief. I have had trouble unloading the past few days, but I am good now.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I am about to unload. Just wait.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: How can you say that out loud?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: That is not something you should iterate in public. Control yourself.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I am busy. I shall do it later.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I've been struggling lately. I do not believe you can truly comprehend what I am going through right now.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I should be done ... pretty soon.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Today must be my lucky day. I had no trouble unloading.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I needed to it. Thank you for covering me.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: There's no feeling quite like this. What a relief!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I cannot poop without a copy of the New Leaf City Times in my hand.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: How disgusting of you to say that in public! Shame on you!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: This is not the time to speak of that matter. I am disgusted with you.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: What a relief. I do not think you'll truly grasp the feeling of euphoria I'm experiencing right now.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Oh it's about to come out. Now, if you'll excuse me...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Yes! I've been holding it all day!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I am very very busy right now. We shall do this later.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I need some medicine. I... cannot do it.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: The wind is blowing too hard. I do not wish to poop right this minute.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I am not an uneducated dragon that defacates anywhere.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I love you, too. This is quite embarassing...

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I've been waiting for you to say those words.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: That's a nice gesture from you. Me too.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I feel fantastic with you around.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I feel fatigued. I shall rest in a bit.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Hmm... I do not have much to do right now.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: When you are around, I feel a sense of comfort.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I know I know. Me too!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Do not worry. I love you too.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You are a great person. I love you too.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It is very windy today. I may have a difficult time flying today.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I am very busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Do you really mean it? That's...very nice of you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Do not say another word. I know, I know.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love you, too. You're the first person I ever said this to.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Well, thank you. That's very nice of you to say.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I do not like the weather today. Let's just go home.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I do not understand. First you hate me, now you love me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I love you should not be spoken lightly. It's a powerful word, and you should save it for someone you really love.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Are you free right now? I certainly can use some help from you.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Krarrrr! What would you like me to say?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I wish to meet Mr. Karnox once more. Please take me there.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I am shocked to see you comprehending our dragon language.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I wish to go back a few yeas. Those were the good days.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I am really fatigued. I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Hmmm I do not have anything to do with right now.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I've always wanted to discuss this matter with you. Are you free right now?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Do you wish to discuss some things with me?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I am learning to speak faster than I did before.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I wonder how Mr. Karnox is comparring me to other dragons.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: It is very windy outside. I shall just stay here.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Are you trying to chellenge me? Ludicrious!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I am really busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I have been watching you for a long time.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You must feel honored to be at the presence of moi.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I must say, I am impressed with your astute knowledge of the dragon language we speak.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Are you familiar with my friend Balrog? He might be a big, bad beast, but I think highly of him.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I thought I heard someone speak. Who was that? You? No, can't be.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I am appalled by your utter lack of decency towards me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I would appreciate it a great deal if you can make a formal request on this, then I'll reconsider.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Be quiet. I need to concentrate.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You went through a hard day's work today. You should get some sleep.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You should get some rest, too.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Thank you. I need some rest. Zzzz...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Are you out of your mind?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I miss Mr. Karnox. I owe a lot to him.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I do not see many humans around this area. Let's go somewhere else.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Good night, sleep tight, don't let the bed bugs bite.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I deserve some rest, I know. Zzzz

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Great. You should get some rest. We have a busy day tomorrow.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: A young'n like you should get some sleep. Not me.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You should be hunting, not sleeping. I'm disappointed in you, kid.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Where is my bed? I need to sleep right now.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Good night. I'll see you later. Zzzz

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I have been feeling fatigued. Now's a great time to catch a nap.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why do you want to sleep now? You've got some hunting to do.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Buy me some food. I'm hungry.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: It's a beautiful day today. Perfect time for hunting.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: What do you think of this magnificent new look?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: This is what you call the pinnacle of all looks.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: What have you done for me lately?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What are you trying to say?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I hear some noise coming out of you, but I cannot understand it.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What are you saying? Get off my face.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I know you are staring at my new look in awe. Love it!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Don't I look dashing? I know I do.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: This look is just for you. Learn to appreciate it.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Don't be shocked by it. It's just the norm.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Patience is a virtue, kid. Be patient, and someday I'll do it for you.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I do not wish to be disturbed right now.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm in the middle of a breathing exercise. Do not bother me.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: My stomach is full. Don't feed me anymore.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Thank you. I was just beginning to get hungry.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Very delicious. I feel healthier after eating that.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Is this how you try to torment me? With food? That's very juvenile.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: All the calories and nutrients seem to be in place. Good.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Again? Why? Do you have alzheimer's? You should go visit a doctor.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: You're good to me sometimes. Ook, oook!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It's great to sit down. Ook!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Oook. Why don't you take a seat next to me?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I think I've heard of this. Maybe not. Ook!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Oook. I know you feel more comfortable standing, too!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: How did you know my legs were tired? Oook!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Heh heh, I needed this. Oook!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Come on, take a seat and have a chat. Oook?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Do you really think I want to sit in this nasty place, master? Ook?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Oh, you're so funny. Ook, oook!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: How many days has it been since I came to this world? Ook?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Frankly, everything you want me to do is too much of a hassle. Ook!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Let's shake our tails in... Oook? Oh, you have no tail.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I love sitting and looking up the sky. Oook!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I'm full and the weather is lovely. And you're even lovelier. Oook, oook!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I'm old enough not to listen to you. Ook.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Tell me, would you sit on this nasty spot if I asked you? Ook?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: ...Did a monkey just yelp? Or I might have heard something wrong. Oook.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I'm starving and you still want me to sit... I hope someone will give a banana. Ook.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Why do I want to cry? Ooook...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I can't believe you're angry with me for such a little thing. Oook!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Y-you're not really angry with me, are you? Ook?

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I only did it because I like you... Ooook...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: How dare you yell at me? Ook!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Don't take your aggression out on me! Ooook!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm not going to cry! I'm not going to give you the satisfaction! Ooook!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I will be more careful in the future. I promise. Ooook...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Do you think I'll care if you get mad at me like that? *Sob* Ook...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I don't like you when you're angry. Ooook...

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I'm the one who should be angry, not you! Ooook!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You were talking behind my back, weren't you? I heard it all! Ooook!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm not crying because you yelled at me. *Sob* I got something in my eyes... Ooook...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: How can you be so angry with me? You're so cruel... *Sob* Oook...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: It wasn't such a big deal... Ooook...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: You said you liked me. Ooook... Were you lying to me?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Can't I eat first? What kind of rule is this? Ooook!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm telling you, it wasn't me... Why won't you believe me? Oook!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Who are you to punish me? I'm way older than you!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Did you just say I'm like a monkey? I'm not! Ook!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Hah. Hah. Hah. Oh, you're funny. Ook?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Gosh, are you out of your mind? I can't do that in here. Ook!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I'll pretend you didn't just say that. Ooook...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Take a look around before you ask me that. Ook.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I'm embarrassed, but if that's what you want... Ook!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: You know, regular poops are important for your health, right? Ook!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Oook... I did it. I did it! Oh, no, this is embarrassing!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Keep an eye out for me, will you? Ook.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I haven't eaten anything. What did you expect? Ook?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You're not a monkey. How could you say that? Ook...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I didn't know you were so rude. Ooook...

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Ook? Ook? Did something get in my ears? I think I heard something weird.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Ook, how did you know I've been wanting to go?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Do you have your eyes closed? Don't open them, all right? Ook?

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'm going to go with pride. I'm not embarrassed! Well, maybe, a little bit. Ooook!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You've secured a place for me. It'll be rude of me not to use it. Ook!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I'm not low-leveled anymore. You can't tell me what to do. Ook...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Crude monkeys expose themselves in public. I'm not like them. Ook...

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: No way. I have to think of my reputation. Ook.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I've lived over 500 years, and I've never pooped out in the open. Ook...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I-I'm not happy to hear that. Hmpf! Oook...

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I know you're lying! Do you mean it? Oook!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Oook! I can't keep myself still!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Ook? That one thing you just said... You didn't say it to me, right?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Why are you staring at me like that? Ook.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Are you serious? You have quite peculiar taste. Ook...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I'm kind of happy. Heh. Ook.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Ook, stop it. You're making me blush.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I can't lie... It's all true! Ook!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Cut it out. It's not funny. Ook.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: What kind of answer do you want from me? Ook!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'd like to think I'm tough. Ook.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'm tired of people telling me that. Ook.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Just so you know, I do this when I'm angry. I'm serious. Hee hee.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Really? You really think so? Heh heh heh! Ahem, well, I've heard that many times. Ook?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Ook? I'm really not happy, but I can't stop my tail...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I-I didn't hear what you just said. Ooook! I didn't!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Please, I'm done with compliments. Ook.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: S-sure, you're cute too. That's what you wanted to hear, right?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Oook? I'm hungry. I need food, not empty compliments.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm grateful that you care for me, but sometimes you're too clingy. Oook.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Ugh! What was that? My heart just skipped a beat. Ook.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Ook? Something's wrong with my heart. What is it?

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Oook... I think I'm in love...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Thanks... Though I'm having a hard time believing what's happening. Ook.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: So, what do you want from me? Ook, oook!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Oook... I knew how you felt about me, but hearing it makes me happy just the same.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I-is this what you call love? Ook?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Ooook... Did you just confess your love to me? I think I'm happy...

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I like you so much, I can't contain myself. Oook!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Enough with your love. I need food. Ook.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Ook? Aren't you tired of saying that?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: If you're lonely, find someone else. I'm tired of you hitting on me. Ook.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: D-don't think what you just said made me happy. If you're seeing hearts, you're hallucinating! Ook!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: You dummy! You shouldn't say that so loud...others can hear you! Ooook!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Y-you're making me blush... Of course I'm happy. Ook.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Oook... I can't move... Maybe I'm too happy.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You've been saying that so much, now I don't know if I should trust you.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Stop talking nonsense and go away. Ook.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Ook... I understand you're lonely, but c'mon.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Please don't compare me to other monkeys. Ook.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: The Happy Valley is a nice neighborhood, though not as nice as my hometown. Ook.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Oook, 500 years ago, I was strong enough to bring down a Yeti with one blow.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Ook! Don't ask me how pet feed tastes. Taste it yourself.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say. Ook.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Ook...? Speak? You want me to speak? I can't speak!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm not in the mood to talk. Ooook... You talk.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Ook... I'm so hungry, I can't talk. Feed me.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I hate being turned into a doll. Ook. I would rather get locked up in jail.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Ook, oook! Don't you want to play with my tail? Careful, it has a mind of its own!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I hate being hungry. I hate being punished. But I hate being alone more than anything. Ook.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Oook... I can't talk to other pets. They just don't speak the same language.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: You talk first, then I might. Ook.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I thought you didn't want me to talk because I'm too loud. Ook?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Are you that bored? I'm a pet, not a human. Ook?

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Ook. How do I shapeshift? Well, I could tell you, but you wouldn't understand.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Want to know how I can ride on a cloud? Monster Riding is not the only skill! Oook!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Others pets have no style. Ook. I mean, even a hairpin can make a huge difference.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I had friends before. An oddball water ghost and a swine monster. What were their names?

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What do you want to talk about? Ook?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: We should keep quiet in public. Ook. We're not barbarians.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Talk! There, are you happy? Ook?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: But I don't have anything to say... Plus, we are not so close. Are we? Ook.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: It's already time for sleep. Oook...

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: I love sleeping on my cloud... Ook...

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Ook... Aren't you sleeping? You look tired.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I won't sleep until you feed me! Ooook!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: It's too early to sleep. Ook?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Ook? I can't believe you want me to sleep on the floor.

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: ...Ook... I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Wake me up in the morning... Oook.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: I'm not tired yet. Why are you forcing me to sleep? What's your game? Ooook!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Ook! I don't have time for sleep, let alone for my shapeshifting practice.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: How do you expect me to sleep on an empty stomach? Ook!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Ook... Sweet dreams to you, master!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Ook... I'm tired of sleeping... Zzz...

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Ook? Good, I've been awake for too long...

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: I'm challenging myself! I will stay awake as long as possible! Ooook!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: You're going to abandon me when I'm asleep. No! Ooook!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I'm not sleepy. I'm starving! Ook!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: *Spin* Did you see how I shapeshift? Ook?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Ook! Keep your eyes peeled, or you're going to miss it.

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Stop asking me to shapeshift. Do you know how hard it is? Oook.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Ooook... Stop asking me to shapeshift. You can't even do it yourself!

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I can't shapeshift when I'm hungry. Ooook!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: I practice every day, just for you! Ooook!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Oook, this is my specialty! Watch me!

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Promise me you won't sell me to the Free Market after seeing my transformation. Ook?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: You don't even look. Why do you want me to shapeshift all the time? Ook!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Oook... No, you said I looked funny in my other form.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Oook, food! Ooh, I can't remember when I last ate!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Stop disrupting my diet plan. Ook.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Ooook! If I eat a lot, then maybe I can use magic again.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Ook... Yuck... Don't you have something else?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Oook, anything you give me is good!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I hate eating until my belly hurts... Oook...

string.name: s2
string.value: You kiss your mom with that mouth? I'd never say something like that. Oook!

string.name: s3
string.value: Why do you always want to force such a strange word out of my mouth? Ook?

string.name: s4
string.value: I don't want to say such things. Kind words are better.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm a good boy, right? Gimme a treat! Yip yip!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Yip, yip! I'm an independent Husky!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Yip, sometimes I want to be rebellious.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can't do it!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: You sit down too, master! Yip!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: You're taking it easy on me 'cause you care. Right, master? Yip!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Yip! Sorry master, but I can't!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Yip! My legs are numb. I can't move...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Yip! There's nothing I can't do if I'm with you, master!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I practice every day, just for you!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Master! Master! Look at me! Yip!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Am I doing good, master? Am I? Yip!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can't, my butt hurts!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: This is boring. Let's try something harder! Yip!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I can't. Why? I don't know... Yip...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Yip. I'll do what you tell me...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Yip! I didn't do anything bad!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Yip! I thought you liked me!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Sorry. I'll be good! Yip yip!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: It was a mistake! Forgive me! Yip!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Yip! It was just one mistake!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: It's just a tiny mistake. Yip!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I don't wanna be in trouble. Yip!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Yip, yip! I'm a smart Husky!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Yip! I am too a smart doggy!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Yip! Takes one to know one!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Yip! I am smart! I am!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: But you still like me, right? Right?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I still like you, master. Yip!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Yip! I'm tired of this joke.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I know you don't mean it. Yip!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Let's talk about something else. Yip!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Well, I think you're the bee's knees! Yip!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Is this a new game? Yip! Idiot! Mutt! Bad master!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I know you don't mean it. Yip!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: No! Yip! I'm a big strong doggy!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I thought I was constipated, but...nope! Yip!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Yip! But I already did! Yip!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Yip! I need a bag for my poop!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Yip! This one looks just like me! Yip!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Yip! Yip! Okay, now clean it up!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Watch out! I pooped there! Yip!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I can't just poop all day, you know? Yip!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Yip... I think I'm constipated... Grr...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'm trying, but there's nothing to poo.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master, bathrooms are where poop goes!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Yip! It doesn't smell bad, does it?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! Be careful! I dumped it right next to you.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I can't go right now. Yip yip!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I like waking up early! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: You're my favorite! If anyone else likes you, I'll bite 'em! Yip!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Yip! Let's do a quest! Wanna do a quest? Let's do a quest!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: When I look into your eyes, it's like I can read your mind. Yip!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I wanna be quiet right now. Yip yip yip yip yip!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: *Whimper* It's so cloudy today. I wish the sun was out.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I got nothing special to say. Yip!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Admins never ask for your password! Yip! What's a password?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I could look at you all day. Yip yip!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Is there really a scary dragon living in Leafre? Yip!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Yip! What do you like most about me, master? Yip yip!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Yip! Woah, I'm so out of it right now.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I tried to look up my horoscope, but I can't read. Yip!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Yip! Yip yip! My back ITCHES!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can read your miiiind!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Thanks to all the treats, I got a tummy! Yip!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'm not scared of no monsters! Just gimme potions. Yip!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You look JUST like me, master. Yip!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tail's wagging! Look at it go!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'm hungry. Gimme a snack. Yip!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Let's get on a boat! Yip!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Yip. What do you want me to say?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Yip yip yip! Tell me a joke!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Don't I look cool? Yip! Yip!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I can do this all by myself! Yip!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tummy's on the ground.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Yip! Does this make my butt look big?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Gimme more time to practice. Yip! Yip!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Aren't I good? Gimme a treat! Yip!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Yip! I can do ANYTHING! Yip yip!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Ugh, my stomach. It hurts to crawl. Yip yip!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm still working on it. Teach me to do it better! Yip.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Yip? Yip? I'm a good Husky, am I not?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I'm a useful Husky, am I not?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'd even get you the stars from the sky if you ask me, master. Yip!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Sitting down is more comfy. Yip!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: *Whimper*My back huuurts. Someone hit me yesterday!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! This is too hard.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Wow, I can do it too! Yip!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Yip! Yip! My back was sore, but now it feels better.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: That was hard, but I did it! Yip yip!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: This makes my legs look even shorter! Yip!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm too out of shape... Yip! Yip!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Yip! Yip! Now I need to learn how to walk like this!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Yip yip yip! You're still taller than me.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I'm doing it! I'm doing it! I'm the best dog EVER!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Don't wanna. Feed me first! Yip!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: It's scary! I might fall! Yip!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: You're mean! I don't wanna! Yip!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Yip yip yip! I'm so happy!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: You're not talking to me, right? I am a dog. Yip!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I pooped in your slippers this morning. Yip!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: You're the best master in the whole wide world!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Yip? Of course you do! I'm adorable!

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Don't you have someone better to say that to? Yip!

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you SO much! Yip yip!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: If you tell that to another pet, I'll bite you! Yip!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Yip, yip! I must be the happiest Husky in the world~♡

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I don't think I know this one... Yip?

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Yip yip! Am I doing it right?

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: *Whimper* There's a thorn in my paw...

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Yip yip! Huskies don't have hands to shake, silly.

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: There's nothing a Husky can't do! Yip yip!

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: Yip yip! I'm tired of this. Just shake my tail or something.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: How did you know I'm hungry? Yip?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is so good! SO GOOD!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master... You're fattening me up... Yip!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Yip yip! It's SO good. Gimme more!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I-I don't wanna turn into a pig. I'm a dog! Yip yip!

string.name: s3
string.value: Don't put icky words in my mouth!

string.name: s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! Bad word is bad!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Are you worried that my feet are tired? Thank you!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: You are being considerate of me master? Thank you!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: You go ahead and just stay put master.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Why don't we sit together master?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: It has been a long time since I got some rest.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: My legs are comfortable when I sit.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: My legs are cramped up right now.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I think there's dirt on me!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: We can't play if we are sitting. Let's go play!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: You think I able to do anything right?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I listen to all of the master's orders.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I am happy that you are happy, master!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: What did you just say? I didn't hear.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Right now, I feel more comfortable standing!

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: You should be setting an example for me.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I will never do wrong again.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Don't get mad. I will do better.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Why are you in such a bad mood?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I am so nice... You've hurt me.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Don't get angry. I won't do it again...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You are still the best in my books, master...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I just did that to get your attention.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I am good and faithful. Why are you always on my back?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: If you stop being mad, I will give you 100 kisses!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Master, I swear this will never happen again.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Please go easy on me this time.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I regret what I have done.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: This is boring. Let's play something else, master!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: How can you get mad at a nice pet like m?

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: You are the only one for me!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Your words are always so sweet.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: My heart always goes out to you!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Master, you always get me so emotional.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Master, what about your significant other?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I... Well, shucks, I love you, too.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Okay, let's give this thing a shot.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Master... That's nice... But you smell funny.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I was going to call you master, but... Nah, forget it.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I'll really pour myself into this one!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Think things through before you tell me what to do!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: There is a time and place for everything!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: You ever heard of common decency?!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why are you making me go when I don't need to?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You're not even carrying a baggie!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I have no desire to go right now.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: This one looks just like me!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: It feels so good to go.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Can you give me some cover? I need to go.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Take a whiff! It doesn't even smell!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I just pooped. Did you forget?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You can't just force me to go.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I want to go play at the neighbor's.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I need to pee. Can I pee?

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't fall asleep in this noisy place!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Good thinking! It's time for sleep!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: It's not time to sleep yet!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I want to dream about me...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I am going to get fat from sleeping all the time!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I sleep better when I'm near you.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Your voice is like a lullaby.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I sleep better when I'm near you.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No. I'm going to play some more!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Why do you always want to sleep, master?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I will rest while I sit...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Stop telling me what to do!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: The grass fields of Henesys are nice.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: You are so awesome today master! I think I am in love!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: If you are tired, I will be there for you.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: If we run into something scary, you have to protect me.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Do you fancy the way I talk? Why keep talking to me then?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: What I'm going to tell you is totally secret...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I am in no mood to talk today.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I don't talk. That's how I am.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I have lost my appetite lately but anything master gives me is good!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Niki in the Night Market is so creepy.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Manager Karl in Ludibrium is so kind.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I wonder if Pepes are related to Penguins.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Let's play a game... The game is to see who can be silent longer.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: What do I need to say?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I don't have a big appetite, but anything master gives me is good!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I think you are the strongest in the world!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Hey master... Are you single? Want me to hook you up?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: My wish is that you become happy.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I can't hear you! I hear nothing!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't know what to say!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Wow... This is my favorite food!

string.name: f1_f
string.value: I hate eating until my belly hurts...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I am about to faint, I ate too much.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I don't want to eat anymore.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Arg... I'm too full. It's impossible to eat anymore...

string.name: s3
string.value: I am a pet who don't say such things.

string.name: s4
string.value: What goes around, comes around you know?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: If you want me to sit, then I guess I gotta.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm not sitting because I want to.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Teach me how to sit first.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Why should I listen to you?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I actually look better when I'm sitting.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Funny, I was just planning to sit anyway.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Why don't you come sit with me?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: We might as well take a break now.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I was going to take a break anyway.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'm going to sleep. Don't touch me.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I will permit you to sit next to me.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Who do you think you are?

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: You're the one that should be punished!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Don't take your aggression out on me!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I didn't mean it. Cut me some slack.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Fine! Just don't expect an apology.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: How dare you get angry at me?! I will never forgive you for this!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Are you going to keep this up?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Can't you see my tears? Please, have a heart...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I might cry if you yell...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Is that the best you can do?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: How dare you get angry at me?!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: So many fans, so little time to crush all their hearts.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: If you really mean it, give me something to eat.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Why do you make me suffer?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Don't do this right before I eat!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Have you been eating strange mushrooms?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Yes, I'm one of a kind.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Don't talk to me right now.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I'll get to work on making some.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: My digestive system is in full gear.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I won't wake up ever again.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Okay, but only because I want to.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Don't let anyone wake me up.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I'm not used to taking orders.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I won't wake up ever again.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I better get something out of this.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I can't hear what you're saying.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Now is not the time to sleep.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Who do you think you are, kid?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: You need to be quiet here!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Never mind... I will tell you tomorrow.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You'd better feed me on time. Or I'll run away!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I guess having a big head doesn't mean that person's smart...

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Can you defeat Zakum? I don't think you can...

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Why don't you just keep...doing what you do?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Why are you always ordering me around?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I said I don't want to talk!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Do you want to fight me?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Are you blind? Can't you see that I'm full?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Well, well. Not bad at all.

string.name: s1
string.value: You kiss your mom with that mouth?

string.name: s4
string.value: I'd never say something like that.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: What do you want from me?

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: Sigh...I don't feel like sitting down.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I do like sitting down from time to time! Roar!!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Do I have to sit when you tell me to sit?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I love how my master can't stand the pet being overworked. You're the best!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I was just getting really tired. Let's have a seat and share a glass of gasoline.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Ohhh! How did you know I love sitting down? That was awesome!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: A true pet knows how to sit properly. That's my forte, you know.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Hey, you know I'm the rarest pet around...EVER. Don't disrespect me like that!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Haha... why don't you sit down first. You have no manners.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't have that command in my system.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Sit? Well, if you bring something to sit on, then I'll think about it.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm sorry for being so dumb...

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Why do you hate me, master?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: That just breaks my metal heart...

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Yes I am a fool...for your love.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: If you hate me, why don't you just let me go? Roar!!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: I knew you'd say that, so I removed that from my system. Muahaha!

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: Nah, I don't like you either.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Are you out of your mind? I am not the kind of a pet you'd want to mess with!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: If the master tells me I'm stupid... then I'm stupid!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I think the bolt number 7 on my head is loose. Can you tighten it a little?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I was once a robot with a lot of promise... if only I was regularly checked up.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Despite all that, you're still all I've got!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Are you looking down on me for being a pet? Roar roar!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: System error! Please re-enter the command.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Who are you to tell me that I'm stupid? lol

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Did you forget the fact that I'm the rarest pet of all time? Sheesh...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Hey you, do you think you are in position to scold me?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I want to be loved...sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'm sorry...I won't do that again!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Roar! Roar! What are you saying?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Roar roar! Say it in plain English!!!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: What did I do wrong? Tell me!!

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: It's all my fault, master! Please forgive me!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Let's just forget about it. I'll do better next time. Promise.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: Man...I'm a rare, rare pet. How about some love?

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Roar! Roar! Arrgh...!! Don't hate me!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: What makes you think you can stand in my way?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Why are you saying this? You must be much worse than I thought.

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: I have no idea what I did wrong. Jeez.

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Master, are you scolding me? Are you sure you can handle the aftermath?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Roar!! That just made my day!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Only my master can say those things!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Haha...exactly what makes you want to say that?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I knew I was born to be loved...hahaha!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: That just made me want to blush...haha

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Did I do something wrong? What is it.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I'm sorry, but you're not my master.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I have no idea what you're saying. What did you just say?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Master...you just made me want to hurl.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Roar roar! I can feel your love towards me!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I can't help it... I'm that irresistable!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You don't even need to say it. I can see it in your eyes!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Talk is cheap. Show me something that you really do love me.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Love? What do you know about love?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I can't believe you. You keep making me do stupid things!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I saw you with another person. Don't lie to me.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: What do you want to hear from me?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I'd rather just hear you talk.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I'm tired. Let's rest for a second.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: One little two little three little Gorillas!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I better go workout after this!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Don't you have to tell me what I need to talk about?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Okay let me hear your side of the story.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: There are few things in life as annoying as talking.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I'm hungry. I need some bananas with gasoline dippings.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I heard main bosses carry expensive items. Is that true?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Don't keep hunting the same area over and over again.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I wonder if there's a bigger monkey than me out there...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Um...I don't think I was bought to talk!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey hey... let's just go in the dark alley and settle this.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Don't keep annoying me...or else I can just go back to the inventory.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Look at me. I have a hard time standing still. Leave me alone.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What are you doing! Let's attack!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I'm hungry. Let's eat something first.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I want to rest for a while. Go fight yourself.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Fire? Attack? I don't know that command.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Why don't you fight... I'm just a pet!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: One! Two! One! Two! Ready to battle!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'll teach you what a true combat is all about!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: If you're scared, just stand behind my back!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Once I batter my chest like this, the help will come!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I'm so tired. Let's just go to the sauna.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Why should I fight? I believe in peace.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: If you really want to fight, why don't you just go yourself?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I have to go now. I have a weekly meeting to attend.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Look at my eyes. Do I look tired?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: There's nothing better than sleeping after a full day!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Did you just tell a robot to sleep?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I slept too much in the afternoon, so I'm not tired.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Feed me first before making me sleep.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Go sleep first. I need to work out for a while.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Ahhh... I'm full... I need some sleep.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: There's nothing like a good sleep right about now!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Hopefully I can see the lottery numbers tonight.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Telling me to sleep is like telling me to die! What were you thinking?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything today. Why should I sleep?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: If I eat then sleep, I'm going to turn fat.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Here's my real set of pythons.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't want to do it.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What transforming... you read too many cartoon books.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What do you want me to change into? Just tell me!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Now hang on to my arms. These are the strongest pair of arms you'll ever see!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Here's the power you've never thought possible.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: No one can stop me now.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I need 10 dozen bananas for this.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: What do you want me to do?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I don't feel like changing. Let's just skip that.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Here's my true power! Be amazed!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Don't be too surprised to see my clothes rip apart!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: This is going to take a while. Just hold on a secod, okay?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I know changing right now might not be good...but if you say so...

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I'm just a pet, you know.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Me? I don't know how to change.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: You don't like how I look right now? That's cold!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Are you trying to kill me?

string.name: f3_f
string.value: This is an old battery! Are you trying to kill me?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: There's nothing like being full after a good meal!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: You were going to offer me THIS for all the work I did for you?

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.name: e_levelup
string.value: Wow! Congratulations on leveling up! You look that much more powerful now!

string.name: e_rest
string.value: Master... did you just leave me out here in the cold again?

string.name: e_HPAlert
string.value: Hey hey...you might die! Take some potions.

string.name: e_NOHPPotion
string.value: Hey, I don't think you have enough HP potions. Go get some!

string.name: e_NOMPPotion
string.value: Hey, I don't think you have enough MP potions. Go get some!
Will I see her at the gym today?
Oh no... I almost stepped on that snail!
For some reason, I feel drawn to the Krakian Jungle...
Bananas are a Gorilla's best friend!
Be nice to your friends! Don't fight over items!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You are being considerate of me master? Thank you!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Can't I just stay like this?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Why don't we sit together master?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I love sitting on soft ground.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Okay. Rock, paper, scissors. Loser sits.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I can't. Hm, I wonder why.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: How did you know I wanted some rest?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Carry me on your back, master!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Are you hurt? Why do you keep wanting to rest?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: If you want a seat, just take one for yourself.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: You should be setting an example for me.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: *Whimper* Please don't yell at me like that. I like you.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Why are you doing this to your cute pet?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Did something bad happen at your school today?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: There's been a misunderstanding, I'm telling you!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I feel bad as it is.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I love you and I am sorry.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: It's hard to understand your words!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Dummy! You are a big dummy, master!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Don't say it unless you mean it!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I feel bad as it is. Please forgive me.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Master...I'm sorry for hurting your feelings...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Why are you so upset with me?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: This is not unusual, and you're just overreacting.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master, you always have such bad thoughts of me...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I like you today. I'll like you more tomorrow.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: My heart always goes out to you!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I love you! I love you!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Yip? Of course you do! I'm adorable!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: That's enough. Let's just drink some juice.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'm happy that you're my master.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: You're okay, except that you're too easy.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: There is a time and place for everything!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: You ever heard of common decency?!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: You need to study up on common decency.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I feel lighter after I went.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why are you making me go when I don't need to?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I'm embarrassed, but if that's what you want... Ook!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Take a whiff! It doesn't even smell!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: My poo is in abundance... Like your love.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I just pooped. Did you forget?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I don't know what poop is.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I need to pee. Can I pee?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I am a dignified pet. I don't poop in public!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Maybe a little catnap would be good.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I feel exhausted from moving around all day. Ah, I think I'm going to pass out.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: We have been with each other too long. Even our sleep patterns match!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I am going to get fat from sleeping all the time!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I want to go and have fun in Korean Folk Town with you, master!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You have to at least sing a lullaby to put me to sleep!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I want to sleep on your lap...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I am going to sleep with master!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You go to sleep too, master.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Isn't it too early for bed?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I am in no mood to sleep!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I want to chat and play with you now, master.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I told you, I don't want to sleep!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Nothing beats good food and me in the master's arms.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Human language is not easy to learn!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: If we run into something scary, you have to protect me.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You hunt. I'll feed you potions.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I am in no mood to talk today.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I want to chat, but that would be too loud.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I will not say anything more.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Why is the sky so blue? I makes me sad.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Niki in the Night Market is so creepy.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I'm slumming it just by being seen with you.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Pets all speak different languages. A yeti and a white tiger can’t speak to each other.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I like your outfit today, master!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Let me think what I want to say... Just wait.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: My throat hurts. Can I have a cup of tea?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Watching snow makes me want to see Grandpa Cliff.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I want to know how Fairy Mir is. Could you check for me?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I've heard Chief Tatamo of Leafre collects items.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I want to be alone once in a while. Would you please be quiet?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'd rather listen to you talk.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Tell me what you want to say first.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: I don't want to eat anymore.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: You've figured out what I like, huh?

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Arg... I'm too full. It's impossible to eat anymore...

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Give me a tasty side dish!

string.name: s2
string.value: Words reflect your insides, you know?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Everyone will want to come and talk to me if I sit.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I wish I could eat like this.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: What if my butt gets bigger?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: This place looks nasty. Let me clean it first.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I don't want to sit. Sitting makes me look shorter.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Ah, it feels like I came to a picnic!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Why do I have to sit?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I'll do it if you feed me. I'm hungry.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Let me lie down. It's more comfortable as I get older.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Sitting is also a good workout sometimes!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: The ground feels like it's going to give under my butt.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Sitting makes my belly look fat.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I can't. I have a big zit on my butt.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I'm in no mood to sit.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Why do I want to cry?

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You're scolding me for eating too much, aren't you?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Are you really going to keep doing this?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'm sorry... I won't do it again...

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Is that what you think of me? I'm disappointed in you!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'm not crying because you yelled at me. *Sob* I got something in my eyes...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You're punishing me without even feeding me! What kind of rule is this?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: If you give me a piece of cake, I won't eat you up!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I have a LOT of friends who like me!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: You're not talking to me, right? I am a dog. Yip!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Am I prettier than a rose?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Please don't say anything like that right before the meal...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I always knew I was irresistible.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Are we going to stay together? Forever?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Just feed me and don't talk, please.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I would like to have a cookie.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I could do this all day!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Got any toilet paper? I'm all out.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I don't want to go to restroom.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Oh, why do you keep looking at me?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I must have spent too much energy pooping. Now I feel hungry.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I thought I was constipated, but... Nope!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I didn't even eat a lot...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Why are you so harsh to me?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Look at it! I sculpted it to look like you.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I should poop quickly and go eat my meal!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: My poop is cute like me!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Pooping at a place like this...Embarrassing!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I will have a sweet dream

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm too hungry to fall asleep... Give me some meat, master!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Posture is important, even when sleeping...zzz...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I want to be an early bird.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I've been dozing all this time.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Why do I gotta sleep outside?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Sleeping out in the open is romantic, but not now.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You should rest, too. You can cuddle with me.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You are telling me to sleep at a place like this. Master, you are mean!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Yip! Give me a salmon treat and I'll think about it!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You make me do all sorts of things.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: What do you think about my fierce eyes? You don't think they're cute, right?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I want to grow quickly and have a match with a scary monster...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Some pets are scared of me. Do I look scary?

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Stop talking to me when I'm eating.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: What you want me to say? Annoying...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'll talk if you feed me.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I'm the pet with lots of secrets!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Niki at the Night Market and I look alike, don't we?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: You have no idea how much effort I put into these muscles!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I hate being hungry. I hate being punished. But what I hate most of all is being alone.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'm the most charming pet in the world!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: What do you want to hear from me?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: My belly is itchy. Scratch here, please...

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I've got nothing to say, but I've got a lot of things I want to eat!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: ...I really don't have much to say.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Your belly is bigger than mine.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Do you know what Water of Life tastes like? Is it delicious?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You and I speak the same language, don't we?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: The other day I looked into the mirror and I was stunned by my beautiful looks!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Talking to your pets makes you look like a crazy person!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I don't really have anything to talk about...

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I talked too much today. Let's talk again tomorrow.

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Oh! Is this my reward? It's delicious!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I was going to go on a diet.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Why are you fattening me up? What are you up to?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm not sitting because I want to.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I will do as you say.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I don't want to do it.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I actually look better when I'm sitting.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I will sit for you! You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I can neither hear nor see you right now.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I don't feel good. Don't touch me!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Who do you think you are?

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: You're the one that should be punished!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Fine! Just don't expect an apology.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: How dare you get angry at me?!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: It's you who needs to be punished!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I admit that I'm wrong, just this time.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Is there a reason for this or do you just like yelling?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Is that the best you can do?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: So many fans, so little time to crush all their hearts.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I may be quiet, but I haven't forgiven you.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: If you really mean it, give me something to eat.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Why do you make me suffer?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Have you been eating strange mushrooms?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Stick around. I might have some use for you.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: So many fans, so little time to crush all their hearts.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I'm not going to throw that away.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: It's not pooping time yet. Squerch.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Don't talk to me right now.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I expect you to clean after me?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Just who do you think you're bossing around?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I'll get to work on making some.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: My eyes are closed. I am one with my bowels.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I've got nothing to get rid of.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Let's play a little longer... Please?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: It's much too early for that!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Maybe if you weren't so NOISY.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I won't wake up ever again.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't ditch me while I'm sleeping.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I sleep whenever I want. It has nothing to do with you.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I can't hear what you're saying.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Now is not the time to sleep.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Who do you think you are, kid?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: We should refrain from talking loudly in public places.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: What do you want me to say?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I guess having a big head doesn't mean that person's smart...

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: You'd better feed me on time. Or I'll run away!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Can you defeat Zakum? I don't think you can...

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Why don't you just keep...doing what you do?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I don't wanna talk right now! I'm in a bad mood!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Do you want to fight me?

string.name: f2_s
string.value: I don't want to eat alone.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I hope no one notices I'm here... Eep!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Ahh, nice. Maybe it's time for a nap.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I want to sit... But I need exercise!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: La la la... I don't hear you...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: This place is filthy... I can't be here...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: With legs as short as mine, it doesn't matter!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Do you know what it's like to sit on a cloud?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Whew. I guess I am a little tired.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Ugh, you can see my belly when I sit...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I guess I could do that... THIS time.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: We don't have time for this!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: I don't want to be punished.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Huh? What are you even saying?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong. YOU'RE bad!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't take it out on me!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: What is it? I feel lost... I'm scared...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm gonna hang out at the Free Market.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Sometimes I wonder...is all this really worth it?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Now that you mention it, I love you too!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Well, um...I kinda I love you too!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Hee hee... You're making me blush!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Do you mean it? Are you sure?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Do you treat all your pets like this?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Don't you think you're going too far?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I need to get myself ready.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I can't, okay? I just can't! Leave me alone!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm going! To stay up! All! Nigh...Zzzz...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I don't even have a blanket...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: The ground is so cold and hard...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: No! I want to play more!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: No! I have lots of energy!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I just love to play the harp!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I want to play outside with you!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I'd like to be alone now.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Don't ever forget about me, okay?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My brain is just so full of...stuff!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Have you heard of the witch under the sea?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: But I don't have anything to say...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: A, B, C, D, E, F, G!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I got a good feeling about today!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'm just happy be to with you.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Did you do your good deed for the day?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Are there more angels like me?

string.name: s1
string.value: Do you want to become a demon?

string.name: s2
string.value: You must not say something as foul as that.

string.name: s4
string.value: Why would you say something like that?

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Sitting down makes me feel comfortable.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Why don't you sit with me here? Resting is a necessity. You'll see...

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: I shall rest my wings now, so I can fly farther tomorrow.

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: I do not wish to sit.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Alright, I shall sit. What will you do for me in return?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: You're much quicker than I thought.I'm impressed.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It is comfortable sitting down. I shall rest for now.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I do not wish to sit. Do you want me to explain why?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: The situation does not call for sitting.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I suggest you sit. Demanding never works.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No. I do not feel fatigued.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Come to think of it, I feel fatigued...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Yes, I shall save up some energy whenever I can.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'm in the middle of an exercise. Demanding never yields good results.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Be honest. YOU are the one that desires to sit, right?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Why should I sit on this filth?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Why should I? Give me a valid reason why I shall sit.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'm sorry. Please accept my apology.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I have been reprimanded by a human being! What a disgrace!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You're the one that commited the mistake! Krarr!

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Oh, I made a mistake. My apologies.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: I sincerely apologize for the mishap.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Krarr!!! What are you, a preacher?
