string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Cut this nonsense and get out of my face.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I am really sorry. Please forgive me.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I made a mistake, and I am big enough to admit it. I am sorry.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Oh no, I feel terrible now. I am really, really sorry.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Your words mean nothing to me.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you sure you know who's at fault here?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Tell me you did not mean it.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Wow, I need a tissue for this.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I do not appreciate you looking down on me like that.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Did your mother teach you to say such a thing?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I...do not know what to say.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I will try to be better next time.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You are in need of a tic-tac sandwich. Like, now.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Is the fool one who leads or one who follows?

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: It pains me to hear it from you.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: I still believe you are a decent person.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Do you have a vendetta against me?

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Why should I be subject to this gross misconception?

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: How would you feel if I called you that?

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Look, please don't call me that. I'm already seen with you.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Cough cough... this is embarassing. I am pooping in public.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: What a relief. I have had trouble unloading the past few days, but I am good now.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I am about to unload. Just wait.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: How can you say that out loud?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: That is not something you should iterate in public. Control yourself.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I am busy. I shall do it later.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I've been struggling lately. I do not believe you can truly comprehend what I am going through right now.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I should be done ... pretty soon.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Today must be my lucky day. I had no trouble unloading.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I needed to it. Thank you for covering me.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: There's no feeling quite like this. What a relief!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I cannot poop without a copy of the New Leaf City Times in my hand.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: How disgusting of you to say that in public! Shame on you!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: This is not the time to speak of that matter. I am disgusted with you.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: What a relief. I do not think you'll truly grasp the feeling of euphoria I'm experiencing right now.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Oh it's about to come out. Now, if you'll excuse me...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Yes! I've been holding it all day!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I am very very busy right now. We shall do this later.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I need some medicine. I... cannot do it.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: The wind is blowing too hard. I do not wish to poop right this minute.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I am not an uneducated dragon that defacates anywhere.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I love you, too. This is quite embarassing...

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I've been waiting for you to say those words.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: That's a nice gesture from you. Me too.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I feel fantastic with you around.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I feel fatigued. I shall rest in a bit.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Hmm... I do not have much to do right now.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: When you are around, I feel a sense of comfort.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I know I know. Me too!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Do not worry. I love you too.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You are a great person. I love you too.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It is very windy today. I may have a difficult time flying today.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I am very busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Do you really mean it? That's...very nice of you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Do not say another word. I know, I know.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love you, too. You're the first person I ever said this to.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Well, thank you. That's very nice of you to say.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I do not like the weather today. Let's just go home.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I do not understand. First you hate me, now you love me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I love you should not be spoken lightly. It's a powerful word, and you should save it for someone you really love.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Are you free right now? I certainly can use some help from you.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Krarrrr! What would you like me to say?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I wish to meet Mr. Karnox once more. Please take me there.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I am shocked to see you comprehending our dragon language.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I wish to go back a few yeas. Those were the good days.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I am really fatigued. I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Hmmm I do not have anything to do with right now.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I've always wanted to discuss this matter with you. Are you free right now?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Do you wish to discuss some things with me?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I am learning to speak faster than I did before.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I wonder how Mr. Karnox is comparring me to other dragons.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: It is very windy outside. I shall just stay here.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Are you trying to chellenge me? Ludicrious!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I am really busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I have been watching you for a long time.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You must feel honored to be at the presence of moi.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I must say, I am impressed with your astute knowledge of the dragon language we speak.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Are you familiar with my friend Balrog? He might be a big, bad beast, but I think highly of him.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I thought I heard someone speak. Who was that? You? No, can't be.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I am appalled by your utter lack of decency towards me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I would appreciate it a great deal if you can make a formal request on this, then I'll reconsider.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Be quiet. I need to concentrate.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You went through a hard day's work today. You should get some sleep.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You should get some rest, too.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Thank you. I need some rest. Zzzz...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Are you out of your mind?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I miss Mr. Karnox. I owe a lot to him.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I do not see many humans around this area. Let's go somewhere else.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Good night, sleep tight, don't let the bed bugs bite.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I deserve some rest, I know. Zzzz

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Great. You should get some rest. We have a busy day tomorrow.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: A young'n like you should get some sleep. Not me.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You should be hunting, not sleeping. I'm disappointed in you, kid.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Where is my bed? I need to sleep right now.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Good night. I'll see you later. Zzzz

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I have been feeling fatigued. Now's a great time to catch a nap.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why do you want to sleep now? You've got some hunting to do.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Buy me some food. I'm hungry.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: It's a beautiful day today. Perfect time for hunting.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: What do you think of this magnificent new look?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: This is what you call the pinnacle of all looks.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: What have you done for me lately?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What are you trying to say?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I hear some noise coming out of you, but I cannot understand it.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What are you saying? Get off my face.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I know you are staring at my new look in awe. Love it!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Don't I look dashing? I know I do.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: This look is just for you. Learn to appreciate it.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Don't be shocked by it. It's just the norm.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Patience is a virtue, kid. Be patient, and someday I'll do it for you.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I do not wish to be disturbed right now.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm in the middle of a breathing exercise. Do not bother me.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: My stomach is full. Don't feed me anymore.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Thank you. I was just beginning to get hungry.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Very delicious. I feel healthier after eating that.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Is this how you try to torment me? With food? That's very juvenile.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: All the calories and nutrients seem to be in place. Good.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Again? Why? Do you have alzheimer's? You should go visit a doctor.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I'm not sitting because I want to.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Why should I listen to you?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: This is a piece of cake!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: You should sit and relax, too.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Frankly, everything you want me to do is too much of a hassle.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I was going to take a break anyway.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I don't want to do it right now.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I am unaware of this concept.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Who do you think you are?

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: You're the one that should be punished!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Don't take your aggression out on me!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Would you please cut me some slack?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: It's you who needs to be punished!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't blame me. It's your fault!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I won't do it again. Give me a chance.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Can't you see my tears? Please, have a heart...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Stop it before I'll make you!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I may be quiet, but I haven't forgiven you.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I accept, but understand that I don't feel the same way.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: So many fans, so little time to crush all their hearts.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Yes, I'm one of a kind.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I'm not going to throw that away.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I expect you to clean after me?

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Don't talk to me right now.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I'll get to work on making some.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Just who do you think you're bossing around?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: It's time to let it go.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: My digestive system is in full gear.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Okay, but only because I want to.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: It's much too early for that!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't ditch me while I'm sleeping.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I also sleep during the daytime.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I better get something out of this.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Who do you think you are, kid?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I don't want to talk right now.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Never mind... I will tell you tomorrow.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Can't you just let me rest?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: What do you want me to say?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Can you defeat Zakum? I don't think you can...

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: You'd better feed me on time. Or I'll run away!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I guess having a big head doesn't mean that person's smart...

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Why are you always ordering me around?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I said I don't want to talk!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Do you want to fight me?

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Well, well. Not bad at all.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: I don't want to eat alone.

string.name: s2
string.value: This is abuse! I'll have you locked up!

string.name: s3
string.value: You kiss your mom with that mouth?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm fully aware that I have short legs...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Ahh, nice. Maybe it's time for a nap.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: This place is filthy... I can't be here...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I just don't want to do it anymore...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Not really... I'm not doing this for you!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: With legs as short as mine, it doesn't matter!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: No, you're going to make fun of me because I'm just as short standing as sitting!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I think I heard someone saying something...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Sitting makes my buttocks get bigger.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I guess I could do that... THIS time.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ugh, my belly becomes really noticeable when I sit...

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I'm never going to do it.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I guess I should stay quiet.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Huh? What are you even saying?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Don't take it out on me!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm full of tears! And they're coming out!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm going to find a new owner!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Now that you mention it, I love you too!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Are you saying you love me?

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I guess I love you, too?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Well, um...I kinda I love you too!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: That was a good one... ha ha...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ha ha ha... What can I say?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I already know how you feel...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I-I'm just a little bit shy...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Not here! I'll die of shame!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I feel like everyone is looking at me.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let you off for today...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Doot de doo, I can't hear you...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm sorry to interrupt you, but I can't keep my eyes open...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I don't even have a blanket...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: The ground is so cold and hard...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I don't want to go to bed...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I want to tell you about so many things...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I want octopus balls... And fried noodles...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I feel too shy to talk.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I don't want to talk about it.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Have you heard of the witch under the sea?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Don't ever forget about me, okay?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: My brain is just so full of...stuff!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I'm going to bed. I'm full, I said...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: There's nothing for me to say... I don't want to talk.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I'm jealous of Yeti and Pepe's relationship...

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Everything will be fine as long as you feed me well.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: It's so delicious that it brings me to tears...

string.name: s1
string.value: I'll remember this! You watch out!

string.name: s2
string.value: Even we Demons know not to cross the line.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Am I good? Gimme a treat!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: You should give me a complement for this sit.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Good idea. My legs were feeling a bit tired.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: My legs are cramped up right now.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: My legs aren't even hurting... do I really have to sit?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I practice every day, just for you!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: There's nothing I can't do if I'm with you, master!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Master! I will do anything you want!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I will sit when you sit!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Right now, I feel more comfortable standing!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Master, you need to learn how to enunciate.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: You should be setting an example for me.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: *Whimper* Please don't yell at me like that. I like you.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'll do what you tell me...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Stop looking at me with that scary face... You'll make me sad.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Did something bad happen at your school today?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: You are still the best in my books, master...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Please don't be mad. It's hard for me to have my only family mad at me.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I am good and faithful. Why are you always on my back?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: It's hard to understand your words!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Hearing that makes me so sad.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Master...I'm sorry for hurting your feelings...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please forgive me, just this once.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I hate it when you get mad for no reason.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: This is boring. Let's play something else, master!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Your words are always so sweet.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: The words are so sweet, I don't know what to do.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I can't stop thinking about you, master!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You can say that a hundred times and I won't get tired of it.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Yip? Of course you do! I'm adorable!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Tell me that ten times every day!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: If you tell that to another pet, I'll bite you! Yip!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I was going to call you master, but... Nah, forget it.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: You're okay, except that you're too easy.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Master... That's nice... But you smell funny.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: You need to study up on common decency.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Think things through before you tell me what to do!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: There is a time and place for everything!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I feel lighter after I went.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Poo Poo... Let's sing about it!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: How many times a day do you want me to go?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Why are you telling me to do this?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: How did you know I had to go?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Would you play with me when I'm done?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I want to go play at the neighbor's.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I just pooped. Did you forget?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I don't know what poop is.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Aren't you sleeping? You look tired.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: It's not time for bed yet.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I want to see you in my dreams, master.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Good thinking! It's time for sleep!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can't I just sleep when I want to?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Master, this is not time for you to sleep!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Master, don't wake me up anytime soon!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I wanted to play some more, but okay.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You go to sleep too, master.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You're sleepy, too? Come lay down next to me.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Putting me to bed without food? You are an awful master!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I will rest while I sit...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Where do you plan on going after I fall asleep? Take me with you!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: What do you like about me the most, master? Tell me!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: If we run into something scary, you have to protect me.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You hunt. I'll feed you potions.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: What I'm going to tell you is totally secret...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: What do you want me to say?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You and I are intellectually incompatable for any kind of productive conversation.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Are you wondering what noises real penguins make?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I'm slumming it just by being seen with you.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Pets all speak different languages. A yeti and a white tiger can’t speak to each other.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am little tired today. How about you, master?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Manager Karl in Ludibrium is so kind.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Are you bored? Let's got get a facial!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I don't have a big appetite, but anything master gives me is good!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Watching snow makes me want to see Grandpa Cliff.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: There's a statue that looks just like me at the Floating Market.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I think you are the strongest in the world!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I want to hear a story, master.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't know what to say!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Master, this is so delicious... Squerch!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I am about to faint, I ate too much.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I don't want to eat anymore.

string.name: s1
string.value: Aren't you supposed to talk nicely?

string.name: s3
string.value: What goes around, comes around you know?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Sitting makes me feel like a tree again.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I feel free again, thanks to you!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I will bow before your power.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: How dare you speak to me that way?!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Why must I listen to you?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I will comply. You have proven yourself to me.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: How is it? My attempt to be closer to you?

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: I have no reason to put up with this!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Your face is scarier than mine...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please do not get out the chisel.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Shall I return to Shadow Veil Forest?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Who are you to tell me what to do?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: How many apology sculptures must I make?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I cannot live if I do not have your favor.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: My ears are made of stone. I hear nothing.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I thought you were finished hitting me.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Is that what you think of me?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Yes, it was all my fault.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Befriending humans can be difficult, please understand.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: But I thought it would please you...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: If you forgive me, I'll blow you 100 kisses! Mmhmm!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You purified my heart, please purify yours.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm just gonna head to bed.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Fine, I'll just smash you in your sleep...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: My heart aches to hear you say that...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Really? Is that how you feel?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I don't like what you're saying...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I have more wisdom than you in my knee pebbles.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I'm so mad, I'm going to crumble.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Take those words back, or else...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm not in the mood for jokes!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I will grind you into rubble!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Your words are full of pain.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: What can I do to purify your heart?

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: There is no reason to hate me.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I will be your friend, no matter what.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You are the one who is that word you said.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Clearly I'm smart! You are wrong.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I don't like your arrogant attitude.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I don't want to be friends with you anymore!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: It has been done, though a little privacy would be nice next time.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Not now. It is all dust and chaff down there.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Where I come from, we are particular about where we go.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: The bowels of stone do not move so readily.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Look at it! I sculpted it to look like you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Look at it! I sculpted it to look like you.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Look at it! I sculpted it to look like you.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: An excellent suggestion. My cavern is full.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I do not understand your poop obsession.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: You cannot force the mountain to move.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: You told me only to do that on your neighbor's yard.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Please turn your head, and plug your nose.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: This may be my finest sculpture yet.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Let's go give this to the neighbor's puppy.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I must be fed to create waste.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Do not project your own needs on me.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I am not sure why you believe I should do that.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Only if I can go on your head.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: You are quite the talker today.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: The world revolves, and I am part of the world.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I hear a scary dragon lives nearby... Shall I pay it a visit?

string.name: c17_f1

string.value: Grr~ Yeti is applying the pressure now~ Yeti is feeling tired...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: This poop is Yeti's, and Yeti's only~ and that massive poop is master's? Grr?

string.value: Yeti only poops a little once a day~ Grr~

string.name: c16_f2

string.value: Grr? Poop? Yeti does not know what pooping is.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Master, poop in public! Yeti will not be the only one pooping in front of everyone~ Grrr~

string.value: Yeti loves El Nath~ El Nath is Yeti's hometown~ Grrr

string.value: Yeti likes snow and ice in El Nath~ Grrr~

string.value: Pepe and Yeti are friends~ Yeti likes Pepe very much~ Grrr~

string.value: El Nath is freezing cold and snowy, and Yeti wants to go back to El Nath~ Grrr

string.value: Yeti does not speak well~ Grr..

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Yeti is too shy to talk~ Grr...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Yeti is sleepy... Yeti will sleep now... Grr

string.value: Yeti likes El Nath, but Yeti wants to go to other places, too~ Grr~

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Grr~ Yeti can do everything well~ Grr~

string.value: Grr... Yeti would one day like to revisit El Nath someday~ Grrr~

string.value: Yeti likes to dance~ Yeti used to be the star of El Nath~ Grr~

string.value: If the master is bored, master shouldn't be hanging out with Yet; master should be out hunting~ Grr~

string.value: Go past El Nath and you'll run into the Dead Mine~ Grrr~

string.value: Yeti knows a lot about the history of El Nath~ Yeti will talk about its history soon~ Grr~

string.value: Hang out with Yeti and then Yeti will talk~ Right now, Yeti will not talk~ Grrr~

string.value: Yeti won't talk, and won't listen to the master~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti likes being told that Yeti is cute~Grrr~

string.value: Yeti is not cute~ Yeti is NOT cute Grrr~

string.value: Yeti is sad. Yeti is feeling too hot to feel happy. Grr

string.value: Grr~ Yeti won't do it~ Yeti feels lazy~ Grrr~

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Keep doing that, and Yeti will be very mad~ Grr!!

string.value: Yeti has always been cute~ Grr~

string.value: Grrr~ Yeti always hears that~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti and Pepe are both adorable~ Grrr~ Yeti and Pepe were the stars of El Nath~ Grr~

string.value: Yeti wants the master not to say that. Grr~

string.value: Master never orders me to do that.Grr...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: WEK~~ this is the way to do it, right?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sit? Okay! I stll feel great though ~~~ WEK~ WEK~

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: You show me how to do it first...WEK

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I never learned how to sit... weK!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Keep letting me do this ~~ WEK~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Do I sit like this? WEK!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: You must be kidding me... WEK

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Don't let me do stupid things like this... WEK..

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's not like I'll be getting a prize for doing this... WEK

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I mastered the art of sitting.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I can sit! I really can sit!!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Give me something harder to do.

string.value: Wait til I turn back into a doll... then I'll sit.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Look, I'm fat, and it's hard for me to sit.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: And what are you trying to say? WEK!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Umm... you're no different than me. WEK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do! WEK!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I won't do that again... WEK... WEK....

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Okay now ... calm down ... WEK WEK..

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I get it. I'll be a good penguin now.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What do you want me to do? WEK!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Did I do anything wrong? WEK?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: My heart's been torn to pieces... sigh...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: What can I do to make you feel better?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Hey, you're the one that started!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Seriously, I didn't do anything wrong.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Don't look! This is embarassing. WEK

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Long way to go before I poop. WEK

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I don't feel like pooping. WEK.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Hah, I ate a lil too much last night. WEK

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Sorry. It's going to reak here. WEK.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I don't want anyone seeing this. WEK

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I haven't felt it, yet. WEK.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Hey, don't look. It's not a pretty sight.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Ahhh, this is quite a relief.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You must really like the smell of poop.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I can't poop now. I held on to it for too long.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I can't poop what I never ate.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Can you force yourself to poop?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Of course, the penguins must stand tall... WEK.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: So I stand and sit, then stant and sit. WEK!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I don't want to do it, WEK!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: This is a piece of cake, WEK.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I'm good, right? Give me something harder to do, WEK.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Can I do something else? I'm tired, WEK.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do, okay? WEK!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I can do it. I'm the bomb, right?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: What other penguin can stand so beautifully like this?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: If I keep practicing, I may be able to run one of these days.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Don't repeat the same thing over and over again.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: The weather's beautiful today, perfect for a chit chat, WEK.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: If you find somethng delicious, give me some, WEK.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Do you want to kiss me on the cheek? WEK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I can help you out, WEK!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What? Who said I was fat? WEK!!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Have you ever seen a talking penguin? WEK.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Any good movie to watch, WEK?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Tell me you love me the most, WEK.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Treat others just the way you want to be treated, WEK.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Take me to a seafood store, WEK.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking right now, WEK.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: If I ever turn back into a doll, please get me a water of life so I can keep hanging out with you.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'll help you gather up some items on the ground.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I see a lot of elves these days. I heard they were very hard-working.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Don't tell others your ID and password.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: And what exactly do you want from me?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Don't bother me. I'm just chillin here.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Now you gotta kiss me! WEK

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Hehe, give me a warm hug. WEK

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm too heavy for you to hug, WEK.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I've been in need of some love these days... WEK.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: You can hug me as long as you want, WEK!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: NO! You haven't showered in days! WEK!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I got no time for you, WEK!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Don't hug me too hard. I can't breathe.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Awwww, it's embarassing though. Hug me when no one's looking.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: No, I wanna do something fun! WEK!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Look, it's well into the morning right now, WEK.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping here, WEK.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Master, you sleep here with me. WEK.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I was about to sleep anyway.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: You need to wake me up later.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: It's not time to sleep yet.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I feel fine, I don't feel like sleeping.

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Liar. I don't like you, WEK.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Really? I don't think you do, though. WEK.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Do you really mean that, WEK?

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: You know how I feel about this, right? WEK~

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! WEK!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Yay, I'm being loved by my master~ WEK!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: And what do you want from me? WEK.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What? I didn't hear you. WEK.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I know you say that to others, too. WEK.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I love you too, master! Yay!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: We penguins don't take that phrase "I love you" lightly.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you don't mean that, that I don't think you should say it.

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: So I should just stick it out like this? WEK..

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: You know I'm the bomb, WEK.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: No way, I'm too tired. WEK.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to do this. WEK.

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Heavy, isn't it? I can't fly with these, though.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Is it fluffy? It feels good, right? This is fuuuun!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Ugh, this is quite a chore.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: What am I, a dog? I'm a penguin, you know!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Make sure not to leave a hole on my cheek!

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Um... do you know exactly where we are right now?

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: No way, I don't wanna do it.

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: Don't do it for too long, though. Yay!

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: Who in the right mind would wanna kiss you?

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: You ain't doing this for free.

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Tell me that was a joke.

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: I deserve a trophy for this performance!

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: I believe I can fly!!! WEK WEK!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Um...don't I look a litttttle hefty for that?

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: Hey, have you ever seen a flying penguin?

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: You must have lost your mind.

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Show me another penguin that can fly like me.

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: No need to waste time. Here we go!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I suggest you study a little on penguin's anatomy.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: Um, have you heard of Law of Gravity? Hello!!

string.name: c36_s1
string.value: I'm at a loss for words...WEK!

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: It's hard to find a penguin as cute-looking as me! WEK!

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: Hey, I've been cute for quite some time, you know! WEK!

string.name: c36_s4
string.value: Really? You're not kidding, right? WEK!

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I'm not CUTE. I'm DASHING. WEK!!!

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: I NEED SOME TRUTH AROUND HERE! WEK!

string.name: c36_f4
string.value: What do you want me to say in return, WEK?

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: You won't find a penguin quite like me. Enjoy it!

string.name: c37_s3
string.value: I can never get enough of your compliments!

string.name: c37_s4
string.value: Thanks for your kind words! I really appreciate that!

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: Since when did we compliment each other anyway...

string.name: c37_f4
string.value: Feed me instead of waxing stupid poetics like that.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I can't eat no more. WEK.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Ugh, I feel like throwing up. WEK.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I need to be on a diet.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I can't believe you're making me do this.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Hey boss, why don't you sit with me?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Take a break with me, boss.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I can't hear you! Speak LOUDER!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: You're the one that should be punished!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I said, don't order me around!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I can't believe I'm following YOU...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'll pretend that didn't just happen.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Yeah! Show me your angry face!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I said, mind your own business!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Have I ever smacked you before?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: If you really mean it, give me something to eat.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Don't do this right before I eat!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Do you like to see me suffer?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: So many fans, so little time to crush all their hearts.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Play with fire, and you're gonna get burned.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I love 'em and leave 'em, you know.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Now is not a good time.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I'll pretend you didn't just say that.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: My pipes are too backed up, boss.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Hey, I'm not the one with bags under their eyes.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I can sleep when I'm dead.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Okay, but only because I want to.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Nah. You sleep, I'm too buzzed.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I'll sleep when I'm good and ready.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Who do you think you are, kid?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: You really think you can keep up?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: My secrets are too rad for you.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You'd better feed me on time. Or else.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I guess having a big head doesn't mean that person's smart...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Shoo, or I'll bite your face!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Why don't you just keep...doing what you do?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Why are you always ordering me around?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s2
string.value: This is abuse! I'll have you locked up!

string.name: s3
string.value: You kiss your mama with that mouth?

string.name: s4
string.value: I'd never say that. Not in a million years.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Can you defeat Zakum? I don't think you can...

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I hope no one notices I'm here... Eep!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Ahh, nice. Maybe it's time for a nap.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I don't want to sit... I want to lay down.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I'm going to sit down. Do you mind?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: La la la... I don't hear you...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: My legs are so short, it's like I'm sitting already!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Whew. I guess I am a little tired.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Ugh, my belly becomes really noticeable when I sit...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Okay. See? I'm a good kid!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Huh? What are you even saying?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I don't think I'm a bad bear...

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't take it out on me!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: What is it? I feel lost... I'm scared...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You're worse than the bad circus people!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Hee hee... You're making me blush!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You're making me feel all weird.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm going! To stay up! All! Nigh...Zzzz...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I don't even have a blanket...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: The ground is so cold and hard...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I bet I could lift a ZILLION pounds!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I wonder what Arby's up to...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I want my alone time now.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You're gonna be my friend forever and ever, right?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I'm busy thinking. Ugh... It hurts...

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: If it's food, it's good. Wait, that doesn't rhyme...

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Want to go fishing at Aqua Road?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You gotta feed me, you know. It's the law.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: This looks yummy! Oh, but so does that!

string.name: s2
string.value: Oh, my poor little bear ears!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: No cracks about my short legs, got it?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Who made you boss of me?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Sitting, standing, what's the difference in the end?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Ugh, sitting really shows of my paunch...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Sometimes it pays to be a good kitty.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: You aren't the boss of me!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: You don't like me anymore? Waaaah!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Huh? What are you even saying?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You're mean and not nice and I hate you!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm running away to the Free Market!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I don't know what to say!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I had a good one today!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: But everyone will look at me...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I've got too good a buzz going.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I know a real good seafood place near here.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: What do you want to talk about?

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'm more the quiet, thoughtful type.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: No time to talk. Must play!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My fur's coming out in clumps. That can't be good...

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: You and me will be pals forever, right?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: My brain is just so full of...stuff!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Eka's the brains! Lai's the muscle! Fort's the...stomach!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: There are two keys to a healthy body: eating and pooping.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: C'mon, adventure! Fun! Magic! No time for talking!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: 我可以依偎在你身旁嗎？

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: 你不坐在我身旁嗎？皮卡~~

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: 好，我就一直坐著直到你叫我站起為止…皮卡~

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: 不是，我需要更多的練習…

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: 我喜歡躺在豪華真皮沙發上。

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: 我不會那麼做！皮卡皮卡！！

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: 我不是什麼地方都能坐下的！

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: 唔…感覺好像坐在一朵雲上。

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: 當然，我可以也翹起我的二郎腿嗎？

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: 我不是什麼地方都能坐下的！

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: 拍拍我的鬆弛肚皮。皮卡皮卡！

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: 嗯…你覺得我坐下的時候能動到我的腳指嗎？

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: 肚子飽飽，天氣好好…主人也很好！

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: 你有尾巴嗎？它能幫助你坐下時不會往後翻。試試看吧。

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: 我…我不能。如果你不撫著我的話，我會往後翻滾的。

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: 這個地方令我覺得不大舒服。

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: 很不幸運…我並不能控制你的想法。

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: 我從一個瑜珈師父那學會這個坐姿！

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: 皮卡啾可以要一個雞腿嗎？拜托~~~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: 我能在不往後翻的情況下好好的坐著幾分鐘。

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: 終於有機會歇一歇我的短腿了。

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: 在你還沒有禮貌的說話前都不會…

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: 再命令我一句我就叫皮卡啾咬你！

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: 哼…你又覺得累了？你好弱！

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: 哼！ 你想趁我終於坐下輕鬆的時候拿走我的食物！ ？

string.name: c5
string.value: 不是|糟糕|糟糕的女孩|糟糕的男孩

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: 又一次~~我在不對的時間做對的事。

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: 啊…我剛剛那痲痺的尾巴給了我很大的麻煩。

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: 我從這次的錯誤學習到了…對不起。

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: 繼續下去的話我會發惡夢~

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: 是黑豆的錯，不是皮卡啾…

string.name: c6
string.value: 不是|糟糕|糟糕的女孩|糟糕的男孩

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: 很好，是我的錯~為什麼現在的人都那麼聰明？

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: 是，我知道。請別拉我的尾巴

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: 是，我知道。請別拉我的耳朵

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: 你不想看見皮卡啾那非常惡劣的一面，對嗎？

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: 說多一句我就不再理你。

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: 那是你的錯誤別將它怪在我身上！

string.name: c7
string.value: 不是|糟糕|糟糕的女孩|糟糕的男孩

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: 好吧，我被罰的留級班到幾時？

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: 以現在的情況來說已算是好了！

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: 你是這樣對待你的寵物的嗎？

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: 我媽媽不認同你的看法。

string.name: c8
string.value: 不是|糟糕|糟糕的女孩|糟糕的男孩

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: 來吧，我懂楓之谷的冒險家都有很好的包容心。

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: 再也沒人喜愛皮卡啾了…嗚嗚

string.name: c9
string.value: 撥弄|惡臭|傀儡|我討厭你

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: 皮卡啾好害怕主人…皮卡~~~

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: 是的…但我還是去到哪裡都跟隨你~

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: 主人，你好差勁！ 皮卡！

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: 粉紅不再是你最愛的顏色了？*抽泣*…

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: 你能?原諒我嗎？對不起…我不是有意的。

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: 你是什麼意思？我向你學的…

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: 我會向所有人宣佈你是一個很糟糕的主人！

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: 我會開始做瘦身運動…那你會比較喜歡我嗎？

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: 我所做的都是為了得到你的注意。皮卡皮卡~~~

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: 主人！ 我到底做錯了什麼？！！

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: 你不再停手的話我就告訴我的媽媽！！

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: 這裡太吵了，我聽不見你的說話。

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: 你的心情不好…但不代表你能當我是你的出氣筒！

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: 呃…不能再忍了~不好意思…

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: 我有更重要得事情要做

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: 不行，沒有好聽的音樂就不行

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: 我需要抱著我的毛絨才行

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: 我不能控制我上廁所得時間。

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: 最靠近的粉紅廁所在哪裡？

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: 沒有我的專用衛生紙就不行

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: 在公共場所？你腦筋有問題嗎？

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 什麼？你幾時沒有給我足?的飼料？

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: 啊…優質高纖緯食物的效果

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: 喔…我覺得我的肚子越來越小了…

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: 不是現在，優先放入我的待辦事項清單吧

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: 我不想弄髒這個美麗得地方

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: 如果我說話的話我就平衡不了我自己…

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: 你想知道我是怎麼得到這條尾巴的嗎？

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: 你知道為什麼我叫皮卡啾嗎…？其實我看起來更像隻老鼠…

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: 烤豆…咖啡豆…果凍豆…沒有一個能恰當的形容我。

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: 我走到累時就在地上翻滾。皮卡噗~~

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: 安靜下來，別再讓我說話。

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: 你不知道達爾利和達爾米都不是真的兔子嗎？拍半慢…

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: 我不想躲在角落鬧情緒。

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: 我手短…不能?同時拍拍我的頭之餘還摸摸我的肚子。

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: 你見到我爸爸，皮卡啾先生了嗎？

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: 誰能給洛尼一個奶嘴？他常常吮他的手指…

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: 你覺得我有可能有雙下巴嗎？

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: 光說沒用…快開始行動吧！

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: 穿上你的鞋子…你的腳有臭味…

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: 有時當我仔細的看著你…我發現…你其實沒那麼聰明…

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: 當你在我身邊，我覺得很舒服。

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: 有你在身邊的感覺很棒。

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: *睏*…和你一起我快悶慌了…Z z z…

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: 用你的愛包圍我吧~皮卡~

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: 我對`我愛你'這句話的感受比世上任何一樣事情更深！

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: 愛…？哀…？算了，我還是坐下來摸摸我的肚子好了

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: 隨著時間的流逝，我越來越喜歡你了…

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: 我不明白。開始你說討厭我，現在你說愛我？

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: 別撒謊…我那脆弱的心是很容易破碎的。

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: 我現在很忙。能晚點再談嗎？

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: 不會是認為我對你有任何好感吧，是嗎？

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: 你不會被我那酷斃的舞步震攝住嗎？

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: 皮卡啾街頭舞蹈時間~保證你眼花撩亂~

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: 別認為這是我的唯一興趣…

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: 我不是娛樂大眾的寵物

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: 來見識我的不停歇超級舞步~

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: 非得你給我更多食物不行

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: 你不可能和我做這一樣可愛…*鬼臉*

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: 我的口水濺到你滿臉都是了嗎？

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: 試試繼續你的玩笑看看有什麼後果。

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: 在你的臉上放個微笑吧。

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: 讓我給你看看怎麼嚇壞一個人…

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: 別在公共場合做愚蠢的事情。

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: 好無聊…我回去鏡子裡面了。

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: 你的腿比我短。你追不上我！

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: 這是我抒發我自己的方法。

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: 你連一點格調都沒有嗎？

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: 你能給我更有挑戰性的任務嗎？

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: 我是好小孩皮卡啾…喜歡早睡~

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: 晚安，主人…我愛…愛…Z z z…

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: 和我玩久一點行嗎…拜託…

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: 如果我踢被的話你能幫我蓋上嗎？

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: 你能在大太陽曬我屁股之前叫醒我嗎？

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: 這裡太吵令到我無法入睡…

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: 你看到我的黑眼圈了嗎？我失眠了…

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: 我不管，今晚我決定不睡覺！！！

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: *彈跳聲*！ 彈上了雲端~~~皮卡~~~~

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: 我的性格也很有彈性~皮卡皮卡~~~

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: 我不覺得我們彼此瞭解對方…

string.name: f2_f
string.value: 我吃不下了…我的胃快脹破了。

string.name: f4_s
string.value: 皮卡。我好喜愛這個！ 這太美味了~！！！

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: 我的坐姿很棒吧？我很乖吧？

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: 我不要坐！我比較喜歡飛來飛去~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: 我的腿這麼短，坐起來會很不舒服喔~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: 我還沒辦法把翅膀摺疊起來，所以只能這樣飛來飛去~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: 嗯~那我坐下來休息一下吧！

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: 剛好我也累了說~我得趕緊坐下來~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: 真的嗎？我真的可以坐下？主人~謝謝你喔！

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: 我不要受人指使，我都快煩死了~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: 請給我自由！過不久我也要變成大人呢！

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: 我還有很多事情要忙，沒時間坐下來休息~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: 早就應該坐下來說~呼~真舒服~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: 謝謝喔~那我來休息一下好了！

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: 要我坐下啊？簡單！這樣OK嗎？

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: 我已經不想聽主人的命令了！

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: 竟然要我隨便坐下，實在太過分了~

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: 現在可不是要我坐下的時候呢~

string.name: c5
string.value: 別亂來|住手|不行|不可以

string.name: c6
string.value: 別亂來|住手|不行|不可以

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: 對不起~嗚呼~不敢了~嗚呼~

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: 可不可以原諒我一次？好不好？嗯？

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: 每天只會念我…主人~討厭~

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: 你別再說了，這明明不是我的錯！

string.name: c7
string.value: 別亂來|住手|不行|不可以

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: 哼！算了~你就不要再說了~

string.name: c8
string.value: 別亂來|住手|不行|不可以

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: 嗚呼~言語的暴力會更傷人~怕怕~

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: 對不起~我不敢了~原諒我嘛~

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: 我以後會聽話的…別生氣~嗚呼~

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: 都是因為主人你沒教好…

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: 我好像沒有做錯什麼事情耶~為什麼？

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: 什麼什麼？到底問題是什麼？

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: 我的心意和主人一樣喔！

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: 對不起，我已經有喜歡的龍了~

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: 我才不懂什麼是愛..啦啦啦啦~

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: 嘻~你知道我的心意，對不對？

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: 怎麼突然這樣說啊？害羞~其實我也愛你喔！

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: 煩死了~最討厭主人你這種過度的關愛！

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: 你別再說了，你知道什麼是愛嗎？

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: 如果沒有主人在，我也不知道該怎麼辦才好…主人愛你呦~

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: 就因為有主人的關愛，寶貝龍最幸福了！

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: 你就省省吧！我知道你只是隨口說說而已~

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: 又來了…愛來愛去的把戲！

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: 你那麼想要我受傷嗎？嗚呼呼~

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: 你怎麼可以說我是笨蛋？

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: 誰是真的笨蛋啊？你說說看~你說說看啊！

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: 哎呀！今天身體狀況不太好說~

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: 你說我是笨蛋？怎麼可能~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: 主人才是笨蛋！主人才是傻瓜~

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: 哎呀！今天身體狀況不太好說~

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: 就因為主人懶惰，我到現在都沒能進化，竟然還說我是笨蛋！?嗚呼~

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: 啊~無聊啊~到來點什麼好玩的呢？

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: 主人你也要便便嗎？嘻嘻~

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: 我可不能隨地大小便吧？

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: 你別這樣，我也要顧一下形象嘛！

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: 有東西吃，才有東西出啦！

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: 宿便都出來了耶~太棒了！

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: 有東西吃，才有東西出嘛~哼！

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: 別這樣，我也要顧一下形象嘛！

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: 已經是便便時間了嗎？嘻嘻~

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: 主人不行喔！隨地大小便是不好的行為~

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: 沒吃什麼東西，也沒什麼好便便的說~唉~

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: 主人是不是你想要上廁所啊？

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 哈囉哈囉~主人你好~嘻嘻~

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: 我們龍族可以進化為各種不同的樣貌喔！

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: 我的聲音是不是很可愛啊？滿多人說我聲音甜美悅耳呢~嘻嘻~

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: 啥咪啥咪？你有啥咪問題啊？

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: 我們要不要靜靜地去散散步啊？

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: 哼！每次要我說話，你自己都沒在聽…

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: 有點累了耶~還是算了吧！

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: 我們龍族可以進化為各種不同的樣貌喔！

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: 聽說啊~我爺爺在很久以前，會幫人達成願望喔！

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: 嘻嘻~哈哈~呼呼~齁齁~嘎嗚~

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: 正好我有個笑話可以告訴你喔…其實啊~

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: 等你讓我完成進化，我再告訴你更多有趣的事情喔！

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: 嘻嘻~哈哈~呼呼~齁齁~嘎嗚~

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: 我也想要變身成為帥氣英挺的樣子說~

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: 帶我去見迦爾努斯..好不好？

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: 真的嗎？我有這麼可愛喔？

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: 啊~我很可愛喔？開心開新~

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: 可愛~漂亮~微笑的時候最可愛囉！對不對？

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: 啥咪啥咪？什麼東西這麼可愛啊？

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: 可愛也不給我東西吃…傷心~

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: 我會變成什麼樣子呢？真是令人期待~

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: 今天沒心情聽你說有的沒的..

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: 沒錯沒錯~微笑的時候最可愛了~嘻嘻~

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: 啊~真的嗎？謝謝主人~嘻嘻~

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: 嘎嘎~嘎嗚~真的喔？耶~開心開心~

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: 我都已將長大了，可別把我當成小朋友...

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: 沒用的…我現在心情不好~

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: 主人千篇一律的命令，差不多要來點變化了吧！

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: 我不是玩具，別拿我來開玩笑！

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: 今天特別讓我來秀一下…嘻嘻~

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: 啊~真的嗎？我有那麼可愛喔？

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: 你說對了，我沒做什麼也很可唉！

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: 我會變成什麼樣子呢？真是令人期待~

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: 你要我裝可愛啊？我已經不是那種年紀了吧~

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: 今天可沒心情聽你這些…

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: 謝謝..我正好睏得不得了說~

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: 這時間怎麼可能睡得著啊？

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: 要睡你自己睡吧！我精神可好得很呢！嘎嗚~

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: 我不是說我不睏嘛！嘎嗚~

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: 我不要！我不要睡~我要玩~

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: 主人來一段催眠曲給我聽…好不好？

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: 幹嘛沒事要我睡啊~我不睏！一點都不睏！

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: 我只在我自己想睡的時候入睡！

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: 主人記得要來我的夢鄉找我喔~

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: 我只在我自己想睡的時候入睡！

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: 才剛睡醒不久耶~為什麼還要睡啊？

string.name: f2_s
string.value: 我要吃好多好多，然後快快長大！

string.name: f3_s
string.value: 嘎嗚~好吃~我要吃飽一點，然後快快長大成人！

string.name: f3_f
string.value: 我撐到無法揮動翅膀了！

string.name: f4_s
string.value: 哇！我要開動囉~好吃好吃~
